French: Votre symbole dans une toile d'araignée.
Spanish: Tu símbolo capturado en una telaraña.
Portuguese (Brazil): Seu símbolo capturado em uma teia de aranha
Chinese (Simplified): 蜘蛛网缠绕着你的标志
Chinese (Traditional): 用蜘蛛網呈現你的標誌

description: A stone sculpture housing a candle
Japanese: ストーンキャンドル・ランプ

description: A stone sculpture housing a candle
English: A stone hollow filled with candles.
Japanese: 石でできた光源。彫られた穴の中にはロウソクが置かれている
Russian: Камень с углублением, в котором стоят свечи.
French: Un monument en pierre abritant une bougie.
German: Ein ausgehöhlter, mit Kerzen gefüllter Stein.
Spanish: Una piedra hueca llena de velas.
Portuguese (Brazil): Uma pedra oca cheia de velas

description: A stone henge type sculpture
Japanese: ストーンヘンジ

description: A stone henge type sculpture
Japanese: 誰が作ったのだろう？
French: Qui a bien pu créer ça ?

description: A strange wall made of spiders silk
Japanese: クモ糸のカベ

description: A strange wall made of spiders silk
Japanese: 石よりも頑丈

description: A calming pond decorated with candles
Japanese: 池

description: A calming pond decorated with candles
Japanese: 見ているだけで心が落ち着く池

description: A place that followers go to sleep at night. Without enough beds, followers will sleep on the ground, losing faith.
Japanese: 寝袋

description: A place that followers go to sleep at night. Without enough beds, followers will sleep on the ground, losing faith.
English: A place for a Follower to sleep. Very unstable, will often collapse.
Japanese: <color=#FD1D03>信者</color>が寝るための寝床。寝心地は悪く、壊れやすい
Russian: Место, где <color=#FD1D03>последователь</color> может переночевать. Собран наскоро, часто разваливается.
French: Permet à un <color=#FD1D03>adepte</color> de se reposer. Il s'abîmera rapidement.
German: Ein Schlafplatz für <color=#FD1D03>Anhänger</color>. Sehr instabil, stürzt häufig zusammen.
Spanish: Para que tus <color=#FD1D03>adeptos</color> duerman. Muy inestable, se rompe constantemente.
Portuguese (Brazil): Um lugar para o <color=#FD1D03>Seguidor</color> dormir. É muito instável e desaba com frequência.
Chinese (Simplified): 供<color=#FD1D03>教徒</color>睡觉的地方，非常不稳定，会经常颠塌。
Chinese (Traditional): 供<color=#FD1D03>教徒</color>睡覺的地方，非常不穩定，會經常顛塌。
Korean: <color=#FD1D03>추종자</color>들이 잠을 자는 곳입니다. 매우 불안정하며 가끔씩 무너집니다.
PolskI: Miejsce do spania dla Wyznawcy. Bardzo niestabilne, często się zawala.

description: A place that provides more protection from the elements. Followers wake up happier.
Japanese: テント

description: A place that provides more protection from the elements. Followers wake up happier.
English: Upgrade to a more stable shelter, which will collapse less often.
Japanese: 安定感と寝心地が改善した寝床、前よりも壊れにくい
Russian: Место для ночлега, которое разваливается лишь изредка.
French: Faites le bonheur de vos adeptes en leur offrant un abri un peu plus solide.
German: Verbesserter Schlafplatz, der stabiler ist und viel seltener zusammengestürzt.
Spanish: Un lugar más acogedor donde dormir. No se romperá tan rápido como los sacos.
Portuguese (Brazil): Aprimore para um abrigo mais estável que desabará menos vezes.
Chinese (Simplified): 升级为更稳定的休息处，颠塌频率大幅降低。
Chinese (Traditional): 升級為更穩定的休息處，顛塌頻率大幅降低。
Korean: 보다 안정적인 주거지로 업그레이드 되었으며, 보다 덜 자주 무너집니다.
PolskI: Ulepsz schronienie na bardziej stabilne, które będzie rzadziej się zawalać.

description: More protection than Bed 1 or 2. Followers wake up even happier.
Japanese: 寝室

description: More protection than Bed 1 or 2. Followers wake up even happier.
English: Give your Follower the luxury they deserve. Collects Devotion <sprite name="icon_spirits"> while they sleep. Never collapses.
Japanese: 忠実で勤勉な<color=#FD1D03>信者</color>に見合った寝床。決して壊れない
Russian: Место для ночлега, где ваш <color=#FD1D03>последователь</color> может отдохнуть со всеми возможными удобствами. Не разваливается.
French: Offrez à vos <color=#FD1D03>adeptes</color> le confort qu'ils méritent. Ne s'effondrera jamais.
German: Gewähre deinen <color=#FD1D03>Anhängern</color> den Luxus, den sie verdienen. Stürzt nie zusammen.
Spanish: Dale a tus <color=#FD1D03>adeptos</color> el lujo que se merecen. No se romperá nunca.
Portuguese (Brazil): Dê ao seu <color=#FD1D03>Seguidor</color> o luxo que ele merece. Ele nunca desaba.
Chinese (Simplified): 赐给<color=#FD1D03>教徒</color>应得的奢华体验，永远不会颠塌。
Chinese (Traditional): 賜給<color=#FD1D03>教徒</color>應得的奢華體驗，永遠不會顛塌。
Korean: <color=#FD1D03>추종자</color>들에게 어울리는 사치를 제공합니다. 결코 무너지지 않습니다.
PolskI: Podaruj swojemu Wyznawcy luksus, na jaki zasługuje. Zbiera Oddanie <sprite name="icon_spirits"> podczas snu. Nigdy się nie rozpada.

description: A place to safely store dead bodies to avoid other followers getting sick.
Japanese: 土葬穴

description: A place to safely store dead bodies to avoid other followers getting sick.
English: Bury dead Followers in a simple pit. Avoids rotting corpses.
Japanese: 信者の死体を埋めるための穴。死体の腐敗を防ぐ
Russian: Яма, в которой можно похоронить погибшего последователя, чтобы избежать разложения тела.
French: Permet d'enterrer les adeptes morts et de protéger leurs dépouilles de la putréfaction.
German: Begrabe tote Anhänger in einer einfachen Grube. Damit keine verwesenden Leichen herumliegen.
Spanish: Entierra a los adeptos muertos en un foso sencillo, así evitas que se pudran.
Portuguese (Brazil): Enterre os Seguidores mortos de um jeito simples. Evita cadáveres em decomposição.
Chinese (Simplified): 将死去的教徒埋进简单的坑里。避免遗体腐烂。
Chinese (Traditional): 將死去的教徒埋進簡單的坑裡。避免遺體腐爛。
Korean: 단순한 구덩이에 죽은 추종자들을 묻습니다. 썩은 시체를 피할 수 있습니다.
PolskI: Pochowaj martwych Wyznawców w prostym dole. Pozwala uniknąć gnicia zwłok.

description: Allows players to deposit excess fertilizer for the farmers to use.
Japanese: コンポスター

description: Allows players to deposit excess fertilizer for the farmers to use.
English: Deposit fertilizer for farmers to use.
Japanese: 雑草を入れると分解し、肥料へと変えてくれる
French: Permet aux fermiers d'utiliser du fertilisant.
German: Deponiere Dünger, damit Farmer ihn nutzen können.
Spanish: Deposita fertilizante para que lo usen los granjeros.
Portuguese (Brazil): Deposite fertilizantes para os fazendeiros usarem
Korean: 농부들이 사용할 수 있는 퇴비통을 배치합니다.
PolskI: Składuję nawóz do użytku dla rolników.

description: Allows players to deposit dead followers bodies and turn them into fertilizer.
Japanese: 堆肥葬施設

description: Allows players to deposit dead followers bodies and turn them into fertilizer.
English: Deposit dead bodies to turn them into fertilizer.
Japanese: 死体を入れると分解し、肥料へと変えてくれる
Russian: Сооружение, где можно превращать трупы в удобрение.
French: Permet de transformer les cadavres en fertilisant.
German: Deponiere Leichen, um sie in Dünger zu verwandeln.
Spanish: Deposita aquí los cadáveres para convertirlos en fertilizante.
Portuguese (Brazil): Deposite cadáveres para transformá-los em fertilizantes
Chinese (Simplified): 存放遗体并转化为肥料
PolskI: Składuje martwe ciała w celu przekształcenia ich w nawóz.

description: Once per day players can listen to each followers confessions in order to raise thier faith.
Japanese: 告解室

description: Once per day players can listen to each followers confessions in order to raise thier faith.
English: Hear a Follower's confession to increase their Loyalty. Can be used once a day.
Japanese: 信者の告解を聞くことで忠誠心を高めることができる。1日に1度だけ使える
Russian: Помещение, где раз в день можно исповедовать последователя и укрепить его доверие.
French: Écoutez les confessions de vos adeptes pour augmenter leur fidélité. Peut être utilisé une fois par jour.
German: Hör dir die Beichte deiner Anhänger an, um ihre Loyalität zu erhöhen. Kann einmal täglich verwendet werden.
Spanish: Escucha las confesiones de tus adeptos para aumentar su lealtad. Solo se puede usar una vez al día.
Portuguese (Brazil): Ouça as confissões de um Seguidor para aumentar sua Lealdade dele. Pode ser usado uma vez por dia.
Chinese (Simplified): 倾听教徒的告解，提升对方的忠诚度。一天可以使用一次。
Chinese (Traditional): 傾聽教徒的告解，提升對方的忠誠度。一天可以使用一次。
Korean: 추종자들의 충성심을 증가시키기 위해 고해성사를 듣습니다. 하루에 한 번 사용 가능합니다.
PolskI: Wysłuchaj wyznania Wyznawcy, aby zwiększyć jego lojalność. Można użyć raz dziennie.

description: Used for preparing meals from raw ingredients that the followers can eat to replenish their hunger meters.
Japanese: 調理用焚き火

description: Used for preparing meals from raw ingredients that the followers can eat to replenish their hunger meters.
English: Cook raw items and turn them into <color=#FFD201>Meals</color> <sprite name="icon_Meal"> that Followers can eat.
Japanese: 信者の空腹を満たすため、材料を調理して<color=#FFD201>料理</color> <sprite name="icon_Meal">を作ろう
Russian: Сооружение, на котором можно готовить для последователей <color=#FFD201>пищу</color> <sprite name="icon_Meal">.
French: Permet de transformer de la nourriture crue en <color=#FFD201>plats comestibles</color> <sprite name="icon_Meal"> à servir à vos adeptes.
German: Koche rohe Gegenstände und verwandle sie in <color=#FFD201>Mahlzeiten</color> <sprite name="icon_Meal">, die Anhänger essen können.
Spanish: Cocina alimentos crudos y conviértelos en <color=#FFD201>platos</color> <sprite name="icon_Meal"> para que coman tus adeptos.
Portuguese (Brazil): Cozinhe itens crus e prepare <color=#FFD201>Refeições</color> <sprite name="icon_Meal"> para seus Seguidores comerem.
Chinese (Simplified): 烹煮生鲜食材并做成<color=#FFD201>餐点</color> <sprite name="icon_Meal">，供教徒食用。
Chinese (Traditional): 烹煮生鮮食材並做成<color=#FFD201>餐點</color> <sprite name="icon_Meal">，供教徒食用。
Korean: 날것을 요리해 추종자들이 먹을 수 있는 <color=#FFD201>요리</color> <sprite name="icon_Meal">로 만듭니다.
PolskI: Gotuj surowe składniki i zamieniaj je w <color=#FFD201>Posiłki</color><sprite name="icon_Meal">, które Wyznawcy mogą zjeść.

description: Engaging with the dancing firepit will replenish followers faith in you, as well as grant the player 2 extra blue hearts.
Japanese: 大篝火

description: Engaging with the dancing firepit will replenish followers faith in you, as well as grant the player 2 extra blue hearts.
English: Your <color=#FD1D03>Followers</color> will dance here beneath the moonlight to increase their <color=#FD1D03>Loyalty</color> to you.
Japanese: 月の光が降り注ぐ中、<color=#FD1D03>信者たち</color>が心を1つにして踊ることで教祖への<color=#FD1D03>忠誠心</color>が高まる
Russian: Место, где могут плясать по ночам ваши <color=#FD1D03>последователи</color>, повышая своё <color=#FD1D03>доверие</color> к вам.
French: Permet à vos <color=#FD1D03>adeptes</color> de danser sous la lune en votre honneur. Augmente leur <color=#FD1D03>fidélité</color>.
German: Deine <color=#FD1D03>Anhänger</color> werden hier im Mondlicht tanzen, was ihre <color=#FD1D03>Loyalität</color> dir gegenüber erhöht.
Spanish: Tus <color=#FD1D03>adeptos</color> bailarán a la luz de la luna para aumentar su <color=#FD1D03>lealtad</color> hacia ti.
Portuguese (Brazil): Seus <color=#FD1D03>Seguidores</color> dançarão aqui sob o luar para aumentar a <color=#FD1D03>Lealdade</color> deles a você.
Chinese (Simplified): <color=#FD1D03>教徒</color>会在月光之下来此跳舞，提升对你的<color=#FD1D03>忠诚度</color>。
Chinese (Traditional): <color=#FD1D03>教徒</color>會在月光之下來此跳舞，提升對你的<color=#FD1D03>忠誠度</color>。
Korean: 당신의 <color=#FD1D03>추종자</color>들이 달빛 아래 이곳에서 춤추며 당신에 대한 <color=#FD1D03>충성심</color>을 고취시킬 것입니다.
PolskI: Twoi <color=#FD1D03>Wyznawcy</color> zatańczą tutaj w świetle księżyca, aby zwiększyć swoją <color=#FD1D03>Lojalność</color> wobec ciebie.

description: Farm Plots are where players can grow various plants from seeds.
Japanese: 農作地

description: Farm Plots are where players can grow various plants from seeds.
English: Grow a seed into a crop.
Japanese: 種を植えて作物を育てるための場所
Russian: Место, где можно что-нибудь посадить и вырастить.
French: Plantez une graine et laissez la magie opérer.
German: Mach aus einem Samen eine ganze Ernte.
Portuguese (Brazil): Faça uma semente virar uma colheita

description: Farm plot signs can be used by the player to help identify crops.
Japanese: 農作地用の看板

description: Farm plot signs can be used by the player to help identify crops.
English: Organise your farm with this handy signpost.
Japanese: 農地を管理する目的で使われる看板
Russian: Указатель, помогающий понять, какие семена высажены на участке земли.
French: Organisez votre ferme en plaçant ce panneau près d'une parcelle.
German: Organisiere deine Farm mit diesen praktischen Schildern.
Spanish: Organiza tu granja con esta útil señal.
Portuguese (Brazil): Organize sua fazenda com esta placa bem útil
Chinese (Simplified): 这个方便的告示牌能帮你打理农场
Chinese (Traditional): 這個方便的告示牌能幫你打理農場
Korean: 이 유용한 표지판으로 밭을 표시할 수 있습니다.
PolskI: Rozplanuj swoją farmę za pomocą tego poręcznego drogowskazu.

description: Farmer Station's allow followers to water nearby crops
Japanese: 農産作業所

description: Farmer Station's allow followers to tend to nearby crops, water them, and collect the harvest.
English: Assign a farmer to water the crops and collect the harvest.
Japanese: 指示をした信者が水をやったり作物を収穫したりしてくれる
Russian: Домик, позволяющий назначенным последователям поливать всходы и собирать урожай.
French: Le fermier arrose et récolte les plantations.
German: Beauftrage einen Farmer mit der Bewässerung des Getreides und mit der Ernte.
Spanish: Asigna a un granjero para que riegue los cultivos y los coseche.
Portuguese (Brazil): Atribua um fazendeiro para regar e coletar as colheitas
Chinese (Simplified): 指派一位农夫为作物浇水和收割
Chinese (Traditional): 指派一位農夫為作物澆水和收割
Korean: 농부를 할당해 곡식에 물을 주고 수확하게 합니다.
PolskI: Wyznacz rolnika do podlewania upraw i zbierania plonów.

description: Food Storage allows players to keep meals without them going rotten.
Japanese: 食料保管庫

description: Food Storage allows players to keep meals without them going rotten.
English: Store meals here to stop them from <color=#01D5A2>rotting.</color>
Japanese: 料理はここに保管しておくことで、<color=#01D5A2>腐敗</color>を防ぐことができる
Russian: Хранилище для приготовленной еды, в котором она не <color=#01D5A2>сгнивает</color>.
French: Permet de conserver les plats et éviter qu'ils ne <color=#01D5A2>pourrissent</color>.
German: Lagere Lebensmittel hier, um sie vor dem <color=#01D5A2>Vergammeln</color> zu schützen.
Spanish: Almacena comida aquí para que evitar que se <color=#01D5A2>ponga mala</color>.
Portuguese (Brazil): Armazene as refeições aqui para evitar que <color=#01D5A2>apodreçam</color>
Chinese (Simplified): 在此存放餐点可防止食物<color=#01D5A2>腐坏</color>
Chinese (Traditional): 在此存放餐點可防止食物<color=#01D5A2>腐壞</color>
PolskI: Przechowuj tutaj posiłki, aby zapobiec ich <color=#01D5A2>gniciu.</color>

description: Food Storage 2 allows players to keep hold of even more meals without them rotting.
Japanese: 食料保管庫 II

description: Food Storage 2 allows players to keep hold of even more meals without them rotting.
English: Store more meals here to stop them from <color=#01D5A2>rotting.</color>
Japanese: 料理はここに保管しておくことで、<color=#01D5A2>腐敗</color>を防ぐことができる
Russian: Большое хранилище для приготовленной еды, в котором она не <color=#01D5A2>сгнивает</color>.
French: Permet de conserver plus de plats et éviter qu'ils ne <color=#01D5A2>pourrissent</color>.
German: Lagere noch mehr Lebensmittel hier, um sie vor dem <color=#01D5A2>Vergammeln</color> zu schützen.
Spanish: Almacena más comida para que evitar que se <color=#01D5A2>ponga mala</color>.
Portuguese (Brazil): Armazene mais refeições aqui para evitar que <color=#01D5A2>apodreçam</color>
Chinese (Simplified): 在此存放更多餐点可防止食物<color=#01D5A2>腐坏</color>
Chinese (Traditional): 在此存放更多餐點可防止食物<color=#01D5A2>腐壞</color>
PolskI: Przechowuj tu więcej posiłków, aby zapobiec ich <color=#01D5A2> gniciu.</color>

description: Honor the fallen with a proper headstone and gain faith from passing followers.
Japanese: 墓石

description: Honor the fallen with a proper headstone and gain faith from passing followers.
Japanese: 死者を埋葬するための場所

description: All farm plots within range of the Harvest Totem will have an increased growth speed.
Japanese: 豊作のトーテム

description: All farm plots within range of the Harvest Totem will have an increased growth speed.
English: Increase growth speed of all <color=#FFD201>Farm Plots</color> within range.
Japanese: 範囲内にあるすべての<color=#FFD201>農作地</color>の成長速度が上昇する
Russian: Предмет, ускоряющий созревание урожая на всех <color=#FFD201>участках земли</color> в радиусе действия.
French: Augmente la vitesse de croissance de toutes les <color=#FFD201>parcelles agricoles</color> à portée.
German: Erhöhe das Wachstumstempo auf allen <color=#FFD201>Ackerparzellen</color> in Reichweite.
Spanish: Aumenta la velocidad de crecimiento de todas las <color=#FFD201>parcelas</color> que estén dentro del alcance.
Portuguese (Brazil): Aumente a velocidade de crescimento de todos os <color=#FFD201>Terrenos Agrícolas</color> ao alcance.
Chinese (Simplified): 增加范围之内所有<color=#FFD201>农地</color>的作物生长速度。
Chinese (Traditional): 增加範圍之內所有<color=#FFD201>農地</color>的作物生長速度。
Korean: 모든 범위 내의 <color=#FFD201>밭 경작지</color>의 성장 속도를 가속화합니다.
PolskI: Zwiększa szybkość wzrostu wszystkich <color=#FFD201>Działek Rolnych</color> w zasięgu.

description: Healing bays heal sick followers faster than beds. Petals can be used to speed up the recovery process even further.
Japanese: 治療所

description: Healing bays heal sick followers faster than beds. Petals can be used to speed up the recovery process even further.
English: A station for you to heal sick Followers.
Japanese: 病気になった信者が回復するための場所
Russian: Место, где проходят лечение заболевшие последователи.
French: Permet de soigner les adeptes malades.
German: Ein Ort, um kranke Anhänger zu heilen.
Spanish: Para curar a tus adeptos enfermos.
Portuguese (Brazil): Uma estação para você curar Seguidores doentes

description: Healing Bay 2 has an improved follower recovery speed to the regular Healing Bay.
Japanese: 治療所 II

description: Healing Bay 2 has an improved follower recovery speed to the regular Healing Bay.
English: A station for you to heal sick Followers, faster.
Japanese: 病気になった信者が回復するための場所、回復速度が上昇
Russian: Место, где гораздо быстрее проходят лечение заболевшие последователи.
French: Permet de soigner plus rapidement les adeptes malades.
German: Ein Ort, um kranke Anhänger schneller zu heilen.
Spanish: Para curar a tus adeptos enfermos más rápido.
Portuguese (Brazil): Uma estação para você curar Seguidores doentes mais rapidamente
Chinese (Simplified): 治疗生病教徒的地方，速度增加
Chinese (Traditional): 治療生病教徒的地方，速度增加
Korean: 병든 추종자들을 더 빠르게 치료하는 곳입니다.
PolskI: Miejsce umożliwiająca szybsze leczenie chorych Wyznawców.

description: Janitor Stations allow followers to clean up their own poop and vomit.
Japanese: 清掃用具庫

description: Janitor Stations allow followers to clean up their own poop and vomit.
English: A building that allows Followers to clean up their own mess.
Japanese: 信者が汚れを自分でキレイにするための道具が入った施設
Russian: Место, где хранятся хозяйственные инструменты, с помощью которых последователи могут убирать за собой.
French: Permet aux adeptes de nettoyer leurs propres déchets.
German: Ein Gebäude, das Anhängern die Möglichkeit gibt, sich um ihren Dreck zu kümmern.
Spanish: Un edificio que les permite a tus adeptos limpiar sus propios desastres.
Portuguese (Brazil): Uma construção que permite que os Seguidores limpem suas bagunças
Chinese (Simplified): 让教徒自行清理脏乱的建筑
Chinese (Traditional): 讓教徒自行清理髒亂的建築
Korean: 추종자들이 쓰레기를 치울 수 있게 해주는 건물입니다.
PolskI: Budynek, który pozwala Wyznawcom posprzątać własny bałagan.

description: Kitchens allow players to discover and use recipees which can be cooked by the player or queued for followers to prepare.
Japanese: キッチン

description: Kitchens allow players to discover and use recipees which can be cooked by the player or queued for followers to prepare.
Japanese: <color=#FD1D03>信者</color>の空腹を満たすための<color=#FFD201>料理</color> <sprite name="icon_Meal">を作る場所
Russian: Место, где вы можете готовить <color=#FD1D03>пищу</color> для своих <color=#FD1D03>последователей</color>.
French: Cuisinez de bons petits <color=#FD1D03>plats</color> pour vos <color=#FD1D03>adeptes</color>.

description: Lumberjack Stations allow followers to chop and stockpile wood for the player to use.
Japanese: 木材伐採所

description: Lumberjack Stations allow followers to chop and stockpile wood for the player to use.
Japanese: 信者が <sprite name="icon_wood"> を生成する場所
Russian: Место, где последователи могут добывать <sprite name="icon_wood">.
French: Permet à un adepte de couper du <sprite name="icon_wood">.

description: Lumberjack Station 2 allow followers to chop and stockpile more wood for the player to use.
Japanese: 木材伐採所 II

description: Lumberjack Station 2 allow followers to chop and stockpile more wood for the player to use.
Japanese: 信者が <sprite name="icon_wood"> を生成する場所
Russian: Место, где последователи могут добывать <sprite name="icon_wood">.
French: Permet à un adepte de couper du <sprite name="icon_wood">.

description: Stone Mine allow followers to dig and stockpile stone for the player to use.
Japanese: 石材坑道

description: Stone Mine allow followers to dig and stockpile stone for the player to use.
Japanese: 信者が <sprite name="icon_stone"> を生成する場所
Russian: Место, где последователи могут добывать <sprite name="icon_stone">.
French: Permet à un adepte de miner de la <sprite name="icon_stone">.

description: Stone Mine 2 allow followers to dig and stockpile more stone for the player to use.
Japanese: 石材坑道 II

description: Stone Mine 2 allow followers to dig and stockpile more stone for the player to use.
Japanese: 信者が <sprite name="icon_stone"> を生成する場所
Russian: Место, где последователи могут добывать <sprite name="icon_stone">.
French: Permet à un adepte de miner de la <sprite name="icon_stone">.

description: Offering statues allow followers to leave various items for the player to collect and use.
Japanese: 供物台

description: Offering statues allow followers to leave various items for the player to collect and use.
English: A statue where Followers can leave <color=#FFD201>Offerings</color> in your honour.
Japanese: あなたを称える<color=#FFD201>供物</color>を信者が捧げるための場所
French: Permet aux adeptes de déposer des <color=#FFD201>offrandes</color> en votre honneur.
German: Eine Statue, bei der Anhänger zu deinen Ehren <color=#FFD201>Opfer</color> hinterlassen können.
Spanish: Una estatua a la que tus adeptos pueden hacerle <color=#FFD201>ofrendas</color> en tu honor.
Portuguese (Brazil): Uma estátua na qual Seguidores podem deixar <color=#FFD201>Oferendas</color> em sua homenagem.
Chinese (Simplified): 教徒能来这座雕像前为你留下<color=#FFD201>供品</color>。
Chinese (Traditional): 教徒能來這座雕像前留下榮耀你的<color=#FFD201>供品</color>。
Korean: 추종자들이 <color=#FFD201>제물</color>을 바칠 수 있게 해주는 조각상입니다.
PolskI: Posąg, przy którym Wyznawcy mogą zostawiać <color=#FFD201>Ofiary</color> na twoją cześć.

description: The Outhouse is where followers go to use the bathroom. It will overflow if not emptied regularly and the waste can be collected and used as fertilizer.
Japanese: 屋外便所

description: The Outhouse is where followers go to use the bathroom. It will overflow if not emptied regularly and the waste can be collected and used as fertilizer.
English: Give your Followers somewhere to relieve themselves.
Japanese: 信者が用を足すための場所
Russian: Помещение, где ваши последователи могут облегчиться.
French: Permet aux adeptes de se soulager.
German: Gib deinen Anhängern einen Ort, an dem sie sich erleichtern können.
Spanish: Dales a tus adeptos un lugar en el que poder liberarse.
Portuguese (Brazil): Dê um lugar para seus Seguidores se aliviarem
Chinese (Simplified): 让你的教徒有地方能释放
Chinese (Traditional): 讓你的教徒有地方能解放
PolskI: Daj swoim Wyznawcom miejsce, w którym mogą sobie ulżyć.

description: The Outhouse 2 is an improved version and holds more waste.
Japanese: 屋外便所 II

description: The Outhouse 2 is an improved version and holds more waste.
English: Give your Followers somewhere nice to relieve themselves. Higher capacity.
Japanese: 信者が用を足すための場所。より心地よく使えるほか、容量が増加している
Russian: Помещение с большей вместимостью, где ваши последователи могут облегчиться в комфортной обстановке.
French: Permet aux adeptes de se soulager. Plus grande capacité.
German: Gib deinen Anhängern einen Ort, an dem sie sich erleichtern können. Größeres Fassungsvermögen.
Spanish: Dales a tus adeptos un lugar en el que poder liberarse. Mayor capacidad.
Portuguese (Brazil): Dê um bom lugar para seus Seguidores se aliviarem. Tem maior capacidade.
Chinese (Simplified): 让你的教徒有个好地方能释放，可供更多人使用。
Chinese (Traditional): 讓你的教徒有個好地方能解放，可供更多人使用。
Korean: 추종자들에게 용변을 해결할 멋진 공간을 제공합니다. 수용도가 높습니다.
PolskI: Daj swoim Wyznawcom miejsce, w którym mogą sobie ulżyć. Zwiększona pojemność.

description: A wooden floor to help keep things looking tidy and to prevent nature from taking over.
Japanese: 木板

description: A wooden floor to help keep things looking tidy and to prevent nature from taking over.
Japanese: かわいらしい木製の床板
French: Permet de créer de charmants chemins en bois.

description: can use this to create water sections in your base
Japanese: 水辺タイル

description: can use this to create water sections in your base
English: Create a beautiful pond for your Followers to admire.
Japanese: 信者の心を癒すような美しい池を作ろう
Russian: Часть красивого водоёма, которым могут любоваться ваши последователи.
French: Permet de créer de jolis étangs que vos adeptes pourront admirer.
German: Erschaffe einen tollen Teich, den deine Anhänger bewundern können.
Spanish: Crea un precioso estanque para que tus adeptos lo admiren.
Portuguese (Brazil): Crie um lindo lago para seus Seguidores admirarem
Chinese (Simplified): 建个美丽池塘供教徒欣赏
Chinese (Traditional): 建個美麗池塘供教徒欣賞
PolskI: Stwórz piękny staw, który będą mogli podziwiać twoi Wyznawcy.

description: A jail to hold insubordinates.
Japanese: 首枷

description: Dissenting followers slowly gain faith once in prison, until they are reformed.
Japanese: 反抗的な信者を捕らえておくための場所

description: When in range, Propaganda Speakers give followers Pray and Work boosts, but will detract Faith.
Japanese: プロパガンダ用スピーカー

description: When in range, Propaganda Speakers give followers Pray and Work boosts, but will detract Faith.
English: Ensure your Followers hear your message. When within range of speakers, Followers will work and pray 20% faster.
Japanese: あなたの言葉を確実に信者へと届けるためのもの。スピーカーの範囲内にいる信者の作業速度と祈念生成速度が20%上昇する
Russian: Рупоры, разносящие вашу речь по всему поселению. В радиусе действия громкоговорителей последователи работают и молятся на 20% быстрее.
French: Permet de diffuser votre propagande. Les adeptes à portée travailleront et prieront 20 % plus vite.
German: Stelle sicher, dass deine Anhänger deine Botschaft hören. In Reichweite der Sprecher arbeiten und beten Anhänger 20 % schneller.
Spanish: Asegúrate de que tu palabra llega a oídos de tus seguidores. Los adeptos que estén dentro del rango de alcance trabajarán y rezarán un 20 % más rápido.
Portuguese (Brazil): Garanta que seus Seguidores ouçam sua palavra. Quando estiverem dentro do alcance dos alto-falantes, os Seguidores trabalharão e rezarão 20% mais rápido.
Chinese (Simplified): 确保教徒听见你发言。教徒在传声筒范围内时，工作与祈祷速度增加 50%
Chinese (Traditional): 確保教徒聽見你的話語。教徒在傳聲筒範圍內時，工作與祈禱速度增加 50%
Korean: 추종자들에게 당신의 메시지를 전달합니다. 연사의 범위 내에 있는 추종자들이 20% 더 빠르게 일을 하고 기도합니다.
PolskI: Upewnij się, że Twoi Wyznawcy słyszą Twoje przesłanie. Gdy znajdują się w zasięgu głośników, będą pracować i modlić się o 20% szybciej.

description: Missionary's allow players to send their followers away on a quest to return with a new follower, or a variety of other resources.
Japanese: 宣教師

description: Missionary's allow players to send their followers away on a quest to return with a new follower, or a variety of other resources.
English: Send your Followers on a holy quest to gather resources. That is, if they make it back alive...
Japanese: 信者を聖なる宣教の使命へと派遣することで、新しい信者や食料、木材、石材、金銭を集めることができる。もちろん、無事に生きて戻ってくればの話だが
Russian: Здание, где можно снарядить в путь последователя. Миссионеры возвращаются с новыми последователями, пищей, дровами, камнями или монетами — если выживают.
French: Permet de former des missionnaires pour recruter de nouveaux adeptes, collecter de la nourriture, du bois, de la pierre ou des pièces. Du moins, s'ils reviennent en vie...
German: Schicke deine Anhänger auf eine heilige Mission, um neue Anhänger zu rekrutieren und Nahrung, Holz, Stein oder Gold zu sammeln. Nun, falls sie es lebendig zurückschaffen.
Spanish: Encarga a tus adeptos misiones sagradas para que recluten a más seguidores, recolecten comida, madera, piedra u oro. Eso si vuelven con vida.
Portuguese (Brazil): Envie seus Seguidores em missões sagradas para recrutar novos Seguidores, coletar comida, madeira, pedras ou ouro. Isso se conseguirem voltar com vida.
Chinese (Simplified): 派你的教徒展开教团任务，招募新教徒，收集食物、木材、石材或黄金。前提是教徒出去之后能活着回来。
Chinese (Traditional): 派你的教徒展開神聖任務，招募新教徒，收集食物、木材、石材或黃金。前提是教徒出去之後能活著回來。
Korean: 추종자들을 신성한 임무에 파견해 새로운 추종자를 모으고, 음식, 목재, 돌이나 금화를 모읍니다. 물론 돌아올 수 있을 때의 이야기지만...
PolskI: Wyślij swoich Wyznawców na świętą wyprawę w celu zebrania zasobów. To znaczy, jeśli wrócą żywi...

description: Feasts require food to begin. They increase the faith of followers, replenish their hunger and give the player 2 Blue Hearts.
Japanese: 宴用の食卓

description: Feasts require food to begin. They increase the faith of followers, replenish their hunger and give the player 2 Blue Hearts.
English: Throw a grand feast for your Followers.
Japanese: 信者にごちそうを振舞おう
Russian: Стол, за которым можно устроить большой пир для последователей.
French: Organisez un grand banquet pour vos adeptes !
German: Organisiere ein großes Festmahl für deine Anhänger.
Spanish: Celebra un banquete para tus adeptos.
Portuguese (Brazil): Faça um grande banquete para seus Seguidores
PolskI: Zorganizuj wielką ucztę dla swoich Wyznawców.

description: Seed Silo's allow players to store their seeds, allowing the followers to sow them.
Japanese: 種サイロ

description: Seed Silo's allow players to store their seeds, allowing the followers to sow them.
English: Put seeds here for your Followers to sow.
Japanese: ここに保管した種は、信者が農作地に埋めてくれる
Russian: Место для хранения семян, которые сеют фермеры.
French: Placez des graines ici pour que vos adeptes les sèment.
German: Lagere hier Samen, die deine Anhänger aussähen können.
Spanish: Mete semillas aquí para que las siembren tus adeptos.
Portuguese (Brazil): Coloque sementes aqui para que seus Seguidores as plantem
Chinese (Simplified): 将种子放在这里供教徒播种
Chinese (Traditional): 將種子放在這裡供教徒播種
PolskI: Umieść tutaj nasiona, które zasieją twoi Wyznawcy.

description: Fertiliser Silo's allow players to store their Fertiliser, allowing the followers use on farm plots.
Japanese: 肥料サイロ

description: Fertiliser Silo's allow players to store their Fertiliser, allowing the followers use on farm plots.
English: Put fertiliser here for your Followers to use on Farm Plots.
Japanese: ここに保管した肥料は、信者が農作地で活用してくれる
Russian: Место для хранения удобрений, которые земледельцы используют на участках земли.
French: Placez du fertilisant ici pour que vos adeptes l'utilisent sur les parcelles agricoles.
German: Lagere hier Dünger, den deine Anhänger auf den Ackerparzellen nutzen können.
Spanish: Mete fertilizante para que tus adeptos lo usen en las parcelas.
Portuguese (Brazil): Coloque fertilizantes aqui para seus Seguidores usá-los em Terrenos Agrícolas
Chinese (Simplified): 将肥料放在这里供教徒在农地上使用
Chinese (Traditional): 將肥料放在這裡供教徒用在農地上
Korean: 추종자들이 밭 경작지에 사용할 퇴비를 저장합니다.
PolskI: Umieść tutaj nawóz, który twoi Wyznawcy będą mogli wykorzystać na Działkach Rolnych.

description: Surveillance Towers allow the Player to see what followers are thinking, as well as viewing their other attributes.
Japanese: 監視塔

description: Surveillance Towers allow the Player to see what followers are thinking, as well as viewing their other attributes.
English: Peer into the minds of your Followers.
Japanese: 信者の思考を見透かすことができる
Russian: Башня, позволяющая вам заглянуть в сознание своих последователей.
French: Lisez les pensées de vos adeptes.
German: Erhalte Einblick in die Gedanken deiner Anhänger.
Spanish: Adéntrate en las mentes de tus adeptos.
Portuguese (Brazil): Dê uma espiada nas mentes de seus Seguidores

description: Scarecrow 2 will trap the birds that try to steal seeds from the farm plots.
Japanese: 罠付きかかし

description: Scarecrow 2 will trap the birds that try to steal seeds from the farm plots.
English: Catches birds that try to steal the seeds from <color=#FFD201>Farm Plots</color> within range.
Japanese: 範囲内の<color=#FFD201>農作地</color>に植えられた種を狙う鳥を捕まえてくれる
Russian: Чучело, которое ловит птиц, пытающихся украсть семена с <color=#FFD201>участков земли</color> в радиусе действия.
French: Piège les oiseaux qui tentent de voler les graines des <color=#FFD201>parcelles agricoles</color> à proximité.
German: Fängt Vögel, die Saatgut von <color=#FFD201>Ackerparzellen</color> in Reichweite stehlen.
Spanish: Atrapa a los pájaros que intentan robar las semillas de las <color=#FFD201>parcelas</color> que estén dentro de su alcance.
Portuguese (Brazil): Captura os pássaros que tentam roubar sementes dos <color=#FFD201>Terrenos Agrícolas</color> dentro do alcance
Chinese (Simplified): 捕捉企图偷走<color=#FFD201>农地</color>范围内种子的鸟
Chinese (Traditional): 捕捉企圖偷走範圍內<color=#FFD201>農地</color>裡種子的鳥
Korean: 범위 내 <color=#FFD201>밭 경작지</color>에서 씨앗을 훔치려는 새들을 잡아냅니다.
PolskI: Łapie ptaki, które próbują ukraść nasiona z <color=#FFD201>Działek Rolnych</color> w zasięgu.

description: All farm plots within range of the Harvest Totem will have an increased growth speed as well as generating devotion.
Japanese: 祈念豊作のトーテム

description: All farm plots within range of the Harvest Totem will have an increased growth speed as well as generating devotion.
English: Increase the growth speed of <color=#FFD201>Farm Plots</color> within range, while slowly generating Devotion <sprite name="icon_spirits">.
Japanese: 範囲内にあるすべての<color=#FFD201>農作地</color>の成長速度が上昇する。加えてゆっくりと祈念 <sprite name="icon_spirits"> を生成する
Russian: Предмет, ускоряющий созревание урожая на всех <color=#FFD201>участках земли</color> в радиусе действия и медленно накапливающий преданность <sprite name="icon_spirits">.
French: Augmente la vitesse de croissance des <color=#FFD201>parcelles agricoles</color> à portée tout en générant une petite quantité de dévotion <sprite name="icon_spirits">.
German: Erhöhe das Wachstumstempo von <color=#FFD201>Ackerparzellen</color> in Reichweite und erzeuge gleichzeitig mit der Zeit Hingabe <sprite name="icon_spirits">.
Spanish: Aumenta la velocidad de crecimiento de las <color=#FFD201>parcelas</color> que estén dentro del alcance y va generando devoción poco a poco <sprite name="icon_spirits">.
Portuguese (Brazil): Aumente a velocidade de cultivo dos <color=#FFD201>Terrenos Agrícolas</color> dentro do alcance enquanto gera Devoção <sprite name="icon_spirits"> lentamente.
Chinese (Simplified): 增加范围之内<color=#FFD201>农地</color>的作物生长速度，同时缓慢提升虔诚度<sprite name="icon_spirits">。
Chinese (Traditional): 增加範圍之內<color=#FFD201>農地</color>的作物生長速度，同時緩慢產生虔誠值 <sprite name="icon_spirits">。
Korean: 범위 내의 <color=#FFD201>밭 경작지</color>의 성장 속도를 가속화하고, 천천히 헌신<sprite name="icon_spirits">을 생성합니다.
PolskI: Zwiększa szybkość wzrostu <color=#FFD201>Działek Rolnych</color> w zasięgu, jednocześnie powoli generując oddanie <sprite name="icon_spirits">.

description: The Refinery is used to refine raw materials. This includes gold nuggets to coins, coins to gold bars, wood logs to planks and stone to bricks.
Japanese: 精錬所

description: The Refinery is used to refine raw materials. This includes gold nuggets to coins, coins to gold bars, wood logs to planks and stone to bricks.
English: Consecrate resources into: <sprite name="icon_LogRefined"> <sprite name="icon_StoneRefined"> <sprite name="icon_GoldRefined">
Japanese: 資源を聖別して <sprite name="icon_LogRefined"> <sprite name="icon_StoneRefined"> <sprite name="icon_GoldRefined"> を精錬できる
Russian: Место, где последователи могут превращать материалы в <sprite name="icon_LogRefined">, <sprite name="icon_StoneRefined"> и <sprite name="icon_GoldRefined">.
French: Permet de créer les ressources sacrées suivantes : <sprite name="icon_LogRefined"> <sprite name="icon_StoneRefined"> <sprite name="icon_GoldRefined">
German: Weihe Ressourcen zu: <sprite name="icon_LogRefined"> <sprite name="icon_StoneRefined"> <sprite name="icon_GoldRefined">
Spanish: Consagra recursos para: <sprite name="icon_LogRefined"> <sprite name="icon_StoneRefined"> <sprite name="icon_GoldRefined">
Portuguese (Brazil): Consagre recursos para: <sprite name="icon_LogRefined"> <sprite name="icon_StoneRefined"> <sprite name="icon_GoldRefined">
Chinese (Simplified): 将资源圣化为：<sprite name="icon_LogRefined"><sprite name="icon_StoneRefined"><sprite name="icon_GoldRefined">
Chinese (Traditional): 將資源聖化為：<sprite name="icon_LogRefined"> <sprite name="icon_StoneRefined"> <sprite name="icon_GoldRefined">
Korean: 자원을 다음의 자원으로 변경시킵니다: <sprite name="icon_LogRefined"> <sprite name="icon_StoneRefined"> <sprite name="icon_GoldRefined">
PolskI: Poświęć zasoby na: <sprite name="icon_LogRefined"> <sprite name="icon_StoneRefined"> <sprite name="icon_GoldRefined">

description: The Refinery is used to refine raw materials. This includes gold nuggets to coins, coins to gold bars, wood logs to planks and stone to bricks.
Japanese: 精錬所 II

description: The Refinery is used to refine raw materials. This includes gold nuggets to coins, coins to gold bars, wood logs to planks and stone to bricks.
English: Consecrate resources into: <sprite name="icon_LogRefined"> <sprite name="icon_StoneRefined"> <sprite name="icon_GoldRefined">
Japanese: 資源を聖別して <sprite name="icon_LogRefined"> <sprite name="icon_StoneRefined"> <sprite name="icon_GoldRefined"> を精錬できる
Russian: Место, где последователи могут превращать материалы в <sprite name="icon_LogRefined">, <sprite name="icon_StoneRefined"> и <sprite name="icon_GoldRefined">.
French: Permet de créer les ressources sacrées suivantes : <sprite name="icon_LogRefined"> <sprite name="icon_StoneRefined"> <sprite name="icon_GoldRefined">
German: Weihe Ressourcen ein zu: <sprite name="icon_LogRefined"> <sprite name="icon_StoneRefined"> <sprite name="icon_GoldRefined">
Spanish: Consagra recursos para: <sprite name="icon_LogRefined"> <sprite name="icon_StoneRefined"> <sprite name="icon_GoldRefined">
Portuguese (Brazil): Consagre recursos para: <sprite name="icon_LogRefined"> <sprite name="icon_StoneRefined"> <sprite name="icon_GoldRefined">
Chinese (Simplified): 将资源圣化为：<sprite name="icon_LogRefined"><sprite name="icon_StoneRefined"><sprite name="icon_GoldRefined">
Chinese (Traditional): 將資源聖化為：<sprite name="icon_LogRefined"> <sprite name="icon_StoneRefined"> <sprite name="icon_GoldRefined">
Korean: 자원을 다음의 자원으로 변경시킵니다: <sprite name="icon_LogRefined"> <sprite name="icon_StoneRefined"> <sprite name="icon_GoldRefined">
PolskI: Poświęć zasoby na: <sprite name="icon_LogRefined"> <sprite name="icon_StoneRefined"> <sprite name="icon_GoldRefined">

description: Scarecrow will scare the birds away from stealing seeds from the farm plots.
Japanese: かかし

description: Scarecrow will scare the birds away from stealing seeds from the farm plots.
English: Prevents birds from stealing the seeds from <color=#FFD201>Farm Plots</color> within range.
Japanese: 範囲内の<color=#FFD201>農作地</color>に植えられた種を狙う鳥を追い払ってくれる
Russian: Чучело, отпугивающее птиц от <color=#FFD201>участков земли</color> в радиусе действия.
French: Empêche les oiseaux de voler les graines des <color=#FFD201>parcelles agricoles</color> à proximité.
German: Hält Vögel davon ab, Saatgut von <color=#FFD201>Ackerparzellen</color> in Reichweite zu stehlen.
Spanish: Evita que los pájaros roben las semillas de las <color=#FFD201>parcelas</color> que estén dentro de su alcance.
Portuguese (Brazil): Impede que os pássaros roubem sementes dos <color=#FFD201>Terrenos Agrícolas</color> dentro do alcance.
Chinese (Simplified): 防止鸟偷走<color=#FFD201>农地</color>范围内的种子。
Chinese (Traditional): 防止鳥偷走範圍內<color=#FFD201>農地</color>裡的種子。
Korean: 범위 내 <color=#FFD201>밭 경작지</color>에서 씨앗을 훔치려는 새들을 막습니다.
PolskI: Zapobiega kradzieży nasion przez ptaki z <color=#FFD201>Działek Rolnych</color> znajdujących się w zasięgu.

description: Shrines are where followers will pray and generate devotion which can ben used to unlock buildings.
Japanese: 祭壇

description: Shrines are where followers will pray and generate devotion which can ben used to unlock buildings.
English: A place for your <color=#FFD201>Followers</color> to pray. The shrine will hold the Devotion <sprite name="icon_spirits"> they create.
Japanese: <color=#FFD201>信者</color>が祈りを捧げるための場所。信者が生み出した祈念 <sprite name="icon_spirits"> は祭壇に蓄えられる
Russian: Место, где ваши <color=#FFD201>последователи</color> могут молиться. Алтарь накапливает выраженную ими преданность <sprite name="icon_spirits">.
French: Permet à vos <color=#FFD201>adeptes</color> de prier. L'Autel conservera la dévotion <sprite name="icon_spirits"> générée.
German: Ein Ort, an dem deine <color=#FFD201>Anhänger</color> beten können. Der Schrein speichert die Hingabe <sprite name="icon_spirits">, die sie erschaffen.
Spanish: Un lugar para que tus <color=#FFD201>adeptos</color> recen. El santuario guardará la devoción <sprite name="icon_spirits"> que los adeptos generen.
Portuguese (Brazil): Um lugar para seus <color=#FFD201>Seguidores</color> rezarem. O santuário manterá a Devoção <sprite name="icon_spirits"> que gerar.
Chinese (Simplified): 让你的<color=#FFD201>教徒</color>祈祷之处。圣坛会保留教徒产生的虔诚度<sprite name="icon_spirits">。
Chinese (Traditional): 讓你的<color=#FFD201>教徒</color>祈禱之處。聖壇會保留教徒產生的虔誠值 <sprite name="icon_spirits">。
Korean: <color=#FFD201>추종자</color>들이 기도를 드리는 곳. 성지에서 생성되는 헌신<sprite name="icon_spirits">을 축적합니다.
PolskI: Miejsce do modlitwy dla <color=#FFD201>Wyznawców</color>. Kapliczka będzie przechowywać stworzone przez nich Oddanie <sprite name="icon_spirits">.

description: Shrine 2 upgrades the shrines capacity, allowing it to store more devotion.
Japanese: 祭壇 II

description: Shrine 2 upgrades the shrines capacity, allowing it to store more devotion.
English: Upgrade your shrine to increase its maximum capacity to 30x <sprite name="icon_spirits"> Devotion.
Japanese: より発展した祭壇。祈念 <sprite name="icon_spirits"> の最大貯蓄量が30に増加する
Russian: Улучшенный алтарь, накапливающий до 30 ед. преданности <sprite name="icon_spirits">.
French: Améliore votre Autel pour pouvoir conserver jusqu'à 30 de dévotion <sprite name="icon_spirits">.
German: Verbessere deinen Schrein, um seine Maximalkapazität auf 30 <sprite name="icon_spirits"> Hingabe zu erhöhen
Spanish: Mejora tu santuario para aumentar su capacidad a x30 de devoción <sprite name="icon_spirits">.
Portuguese (Brazil): Aprimore seu santuário para aumentar sua capacidade máxima para 30x <sprite name="icon_spirits"> Devoção
Chinese (Simplified): 升级版圣坛，保留的虔诚度上限增加至 30 点<sprite name="icon_spirits">
Chinese (Traditional): 升級版聖壇，保留的虔誠值上限增加至 30 點 <sprite name="icon_spirits">
PolskI: Ulepsz swoją Kapliczkę, aby zwiększyć jej maksymalną pojemność do 30x <sprite name="icon_spirits"> Oddania.

description: Passive Shrines are an alternate place for followers to pray throughout the day and deposit Devotion.
Japanese: 礼拝像

description: Passive Shrines are an alternate place for followers to pray throughout the day and deposit Devotion.
English: A place for Followers who are not worshipping to pray throughout the day and deposit Devotion.
Japanese: 祈りを捧げる以外の作業をしている信者からも祈念を集め、蓄えておくための場所
Russian: Здание, где не занятые молением последователи могут помолиться на протяжении дня и выразить свою преданность.
French: Permet aux adeptes qui ne prient pas auprès de l'Autel de générer de la dévotion au cours de la journée.
German: Ein Ort, an dem Anhänger tagsüber beten und Hingabe hinterlegen können, wenn sie dir nicht am Schrein huldigen.
Spanish: Un lugar para que los adeptos ociosos recen durante el día y donde puedan depositar su devoción.
Portuguese (Brazil): Um lugar para os Seguidores que não estiverem adorando rezarem no decorrer do dia e depositarem Devoção.
Chinese (Simplified): 让白天时不奉拜的教徒来此祈祷，储存虔诚度。
Chinese (Traditional): 讓白天時不負責奉拜的教徒來此祈禱，儲存虔誠值。
Korean: 하루 종일 기도와 헌신을 바치지 않을 신자들을 위한 장소입니다.
PolskI: Miejsce dla Wyznawców, którzy nie oddają czci Bogu, aby modlić się przez cały dzień i złożyć Oddanie.

description: Passive Shrine 2 is an alternate place for followers to pray throughout the day and deposit Devotion with a higher capacity than Passive Shrines.
Japanese: 礼拝像 II

description: Passive Shrine 2 is an alternate place for followers to pray throughout the day and deposit Devotion with a higher capacity than Passive Shrines.

description: The Temple is where players can perform Sermons, to shape the cults belief system. It's also where the player performs Rituals, to gain perks and upgrades and where they can access the Doctrines, which track player and cult progress.
Japanese: 教会堂

description: The Temple is where players can perform Sermons, to shape the cults belief system. It's also where the player performs Rituals, to gain perks and upgrades and where they can access the Doctrines, which track player and cult progress.
English: Establish a Temple to preach Sermons and perform Rituals.
Japanese: 説教や儀式を行うための教会堂
Russian: Здание, в котором можно читать проповеди и проводить ритуалы.
French: Le cœur de votre culte. Permet de prononcer des sermons et de réaliser des rituels.
German: Erbaue einen Tempel, um Predigten abzuhalten und Rituale durchzuführen.
Spanish: Construye un templo para dar sermones y celebrar rituales.
Portuguese (Brazil): Crie um Templo para pregar Sermões e realizar Rituais.
Chinese (Simplified): 建造圣殿以便布道和举行仪式。
Chinese (Traditional): 建造聖殿以便講道和舉行儀式。
PolskI: Stwórz Świątynię, w której można głosić Kazania i odprawiać Rytuały.

description: Temple 2 is a nicer looking version of Temple 1
Japanese: 教団 II

description: Temple 2 is a nicer looking version of Temple 1
English: Upgrade Temple and Shrine. Collect more Devotion and allow more Followers to pray.
Japanese: 教会堂と祭壇をアップグレードする。より多くの祈念を集め、より多くの信者が祈りを捧げることができる
Russian: Улучшенные храм и алтарь, которые позволяют хранить больше преданности и привлекать больше последователей к молитве.
French: Permet d'améliorer le Temple et l'Autel. Augmente votre dévotion et le nombre d'adeptes pouvant prier en même temps.
German: Verbessere deinen Tempel und den Schrein. Erhalte mehr Hingabe und ermögliche mehr Anhängern, zu beten.
Spanish: Mejora el templo y el santuario. Recolecta más devoción y da cabida a más adeptos para que recen.
Portuguese (Brazil): Aprimore Templo e Santuário. Colete mais Devoção para que mais Seguidores rezem.
Chinese (Simplified): 升级版圣殿和圣坛，能收集更多虔诚度，让更多追随者祈祷。
Chinese (Traditional): 升級版聖殿和聖壇，能收集更多虔誠值，讓更多追隨者祈禱。
Korean: 사원과 성지를 업그레이드 합니다. 더 많은 헌신을 모으며 더 많은 추종자들이 기도를 할 수 있습니다.
PolskI: Ulepsz Swiątynię i Kapliczkę. Zbierz więcej Oddania i pozwól modlić się większej liczbie wyznawców.

Japanese: 教団 III

description: The Chopping Shrine allows followers to chop wood at a faster rate.
Japanese: 伐採の祭壇

description: The Chopping Shrine allows followers to chop wood at a faster rate.
Japanese: 木材の伐採速度が上昇する
Russian: Небольшой алтарь, который ускоряет вырубку деревьев.
French: Permet de couper du bois plus rapidement.
Portuguese (Brazil): Permite que as madeiras sejam cortadas mais rapidamente.

description: The Mining Shrine allows followers to mine rock at a faster rate.
Japanese: 採鉱の祭壇

description: The Mining Shrine allows followers to mine rock at a faster rate.
Japanese: 石の採掘速度が上昇する
Russian: Небольшой алтарь, который ускоряет добычу камня.
French: Permet de miner de la pierre plus rapidement.
Portuguese (Brazil): Permite uma mineração de pedras mais rápida.

description: The Foraging Shrine allows followers to forage at a faster rate.
Japanese: 収集の祭壇

description: The Foraging Shrine allows followers to forage at a faster rate.
Japanese: 食料の収集速度が上昇する
Russian: Небольшой алтарь, который ускоряет сбор съедобных даров леса.
French: Permet de cueillir et récolter plus rapidement.

description: The Demon Summoner allows the Player to turn followers into 'Demons' Which join the player in battle and periodically attack enemies.
Japanese: 悪魔召喚陣

description: The Demon Summoner allows the Player to turn followers into 'Demons' Which join the player in battle and periodically attack enemies.
English: A building in which you can have a Follower possessed by the spirit of a demon and join you on a crusade.
Japanese: 信者の体に悪魔の魂を呼び出すことで、悪魔へと変身させるための召喚陣。変身した悪魔は戦闘に加わってくれる
Russian: Здесь вы можете вселить дух демона в одного из своих последователей, чтобы взять его с собой в поход.
French: Permet à un adepte d'être possédé par l'esprit d'un démon et de vous accompagner dans les donjons.
German: Ein Gebäude, in dem du einen Dämon vom Geist eines Anhängers Besitz ergreifen lassen kannst, damit dieser dich auf deinem Kreuzzug begleitet.
Spanish: Un edificio en el que puedes hacer que uno de tus adeptos sea poseído por el espíritu de un demonio y te acompañe en tus cruzadas.
Portuguese (Brazil): Uma construção na qual um Seguidor pode ser possuído pelo espírito de um demônio e juntar-se à sua cruzada.
Chinese (Simplified): 你可以在这座建筑里让恶魔灵魂附身一位教徒，跟你一起投入圣战。
Chinese (Traditional): 你可以在這座建築裡讓惡魔靈魂附身一位教徒，跟你一起投入聖戰。
Korean: 악령에게 홀린 추종자를 획득하고 성전에 참여하게 하는 건물입니다.
PolskI: Budynek, w którym Wyznawca może zostać opętany przez ducha demona i dołączyć do krucjaty.

description: item on ground
Japanese: ゲロ

description: item on ground
Japanese: ウンチ

description: item on ground
Japanese: 信者の死体

description: The Demon Summoner allows the Player to turn followers into 'Demons' Which join the player in battle and periodically attack enemies.
Japanese: 悪魔召喚陣 II

description: The Demon Summoner allows the Player to turn followers into 'Demons' Which join the player in battle and periodically attack enemies.
English: Upgraded Demonic Summoning Circle. Summon 2 demons at a time.
Japanese: 強化された悪魔召喚陣。悪魔を同時に2体召喚できる
Russian: Улучшенный круг призыва демонов, который позволяет вселять демонов в 2 последователей одновременно.
French: Cercle d'invocation démoniaque amélioré. Permet d'invoquer deux démons en même temps.
Spanish: Círculo de invocación demoníaca mejorado. Invoca a 2 demonios a la vez.
Portuguese (Brazil): Círculo de Invocação Demoníaca aprimorado. Invoca 2 demônios por vez.
Chinese (Simplified): 升级版恶魔召唤阵，能一次召唤2只恶魔
Chinese (Traditional): 升級版惡魔召喚陣，能一次召喚 2 隻惡魔
Korean: 업그레이드된 악마 소환진입니다. 한 번에 악마 둘을 소환합니다.
PolskI: Ulepszony Demoniczny Krąg Przywoływania. Przywołuje 2 demony jednocześnie.

description: The Demon Summoner allows the Player to turn followers into 'Demons' Which join the player in battle and periodically attack enemies.
Japanese: 悪魔召喚陣 III

description: The Demon Summoner allows the Player to turn followers into 'Demons' Which join the player in battle and periodically attack enemies.
English: Upgraded Demonic Summoning Circle. Summon 3 demons at a time.
Japanese: 強化された悪魔召喚陣。悪魔を同時に3体召喚できる
Russian: Улучшенный круг призыва демонов, который позволяет вселять демонов в 3 последователей одновременно.
French: Cercle d'invocation démoniaque amélioré. Permet d'invoquer trois démons en même temps.
Spanish: Círculo de invocación demoníaca mejorado. Invoca a 3 demonios a la vez.
Portuguese (Brazil): Círculo de Invocação Demoníaca aprimorado. Invoca 3 demônios por vez.
Chinese (Simplified): 升级版恶魔召唤阵，能一次召唤3只恶魔
Chinese (Traditional): 升級版惡魔召喚陣，能一次召喚 3 隻惡魔
Korean: 업그레이드된 악마 소환진입니다. 한 번에 악마 셋을 소환합니다.
PolskI: Ulepszony Demoniczny Krąg Przywoływania. Przywołuje 3 demony jednocześnie.

description: This is level 2 of the missionary. Missionary's allow players to send their followers away on a quest to return with a new follower, or a variety of other resources.
Japanese: 宣教師 II

description: This is level 2 of the missionary. Missionary's allow players to send their followers away on a quest to return with a new follower, or a variety of other resources.
English: Send two Followers on a holy quest at once. Followers will have a higher likelihood of success and complete their mission more quickly.
Japanese: 3人の信者を聖なる宣教の使命へと派遣する。宣教の成功率が高まり、宣教が完了するまでの時間が短くなる
Russian: Здание, где можно снарядить в путь 3 последователей одновременно. Миссионеры находят искомое с большей вероятностью и возвращаются быстрее.
French: Permet d'envoyer jusqu'à trois missionnaires en même temps. Ils finiront leur mission plus rapidement et auront plus de chances de la réussir.
German: Entsende drei Anhänger gleichzeitig auf eine heilige Mission. Die Anhänger werden größere Erfolgschancen haben und ihre Mission schneller abschließen.
Spanish: Envía a tres seguidores a la vez a una misión sagrada. Los adeptos tendrán una mayor probabilidad de salir victoriosos y completar la misión en menos tiempo.
Portuguese (Brazil): Envie três Seguidores em uma missão sagrada de uma vez só. Os Seguidores têm maior chance de completar sua Missão com sucesso e mais rapidamente.
Chinese (Simplified): 一次能派三位教徒展开神圣任务。教徒成功的机率增加，完成传教的速度提升。
Chinese (Traditional): 一次能派三位教徒展開神聖任務。教徒成功的機率增加，完成傳教的速度提升。
Korean: 한 번에 성스러운 임무를 위해 추종자 셋을 보냅니다. 추종자들이 임무를 성공할 확률이 높고 더 빠르게 돌아옵니다.
PolskI: Wyślij dwóch Wyznawców na świętą misję jednocześnie. Wyznawcy będą mieli większe szanse powodzenia i szybciej ukończą misję.

description: This is level 3 of the missionary. Missionary's allow players to send their followers away on a quest to return with a new follower, or a variety of other resources.
Japanese: 宣教師 III

description: This is level 3 of the missionary. Missionary's allow players to send their followers away on a quest to return with a new follower, or a variety of other resources.
English: Send three Followers on a holy quest at once. Followers will have an even higher likelihood of success and complete their mission even more quickly.
Japanese: 3人の信者を聖なる宣教の使命へと派遣する。宣教の成功率がさらに高まり、宣教が完了するまでの時間がさらに短くなる
Russian: Здание, где можно снарядить в путь 3 последователей одновременно. Миссионеры находят искомое с повышенной вероятностью и возвращаются быстрее.
French: Permet d'envoyer jusqu'à trois missionnaires en même temps. Ils finiront leur mission encore plus rapidement et auront bien plus de chances de la réussir.
German: Entsende drei Anhänger gleichzeitig auf eine heilige Mission. Die Anhänger werden noch größere Erfolgschancen haben und ihre Mission noch schneller abschließen.
Spanish: Envía a tres seguidores a la vez a una misión sagrada. Los adeptos tendrán una mayor probabilidad de salir victoriosos y completar la misión en menos tiempo todavía.
Portuguese (Brazil): Envie três Seguidores em uma missão sagrada de uma vez só. Os Seguidores têm chance ainda maior de completar sua Missão com sucesso e mais rapidamente.
Chinese (Simplified): 一次能派三位教徒展开神圣任务。教徒成功的机率进一步增加，完成传教的速度进一步提升。
Chinese (Traditional): 一次能派三位教徒展開神聖任務。教徒成功的機率進一步增加，完成傳教的速度進一步提升。
Korean: 한 번에 성스러운 임무를 위해 추종자 셋을 보냅니다. 추종자들이 임무를 성공할 확률이 더 높고 훨씬 빠르게 돌아옵니다.
PolskI: Wyślij trzech Wyznawców na świętą misję jednocześnie. Wyznawcy będą mieli jeszcze większe szanse powodzenia i ukończą misję jeszcze szybciej.

description: This is leve 2 of the kitchen. Kitchens allow players to discover and use recipees which can be cooked by the player or queued for followers to prepare.
Japanese: キッチン II

description: This is leve 2 of the kitchen. Kitchens allow players to discover and use recipees which can be cooked by the player or queued for followers to prepare.
English: This Kitchen will not require a furnace to be able to cook meals.
Japanese: 料理を作る際に焚き火を必要としないキッチン
Russian: Конструкция для приготовления пищи, которая не требует топлива.
French: Permet de préparer des plats sans devoir alimenter le feu.
German: Diese Küche benötigt keinen Ofen, um dort Mahlzeiten kochen zu können.
Spanish: Esta cocina no requiere una fuente de calor para preparar comida.
Portuguese (Brazil): A Cozinha não precisará mais de uma fornalha para cozinhar refeições.
Chinese (Simplified): 这间厨房不需要火炉也能烹煮餐点。
Chinese (Traditional): 這間廚房不需要火爐也能烹煮餐點。
Korean: 주방은 요리를 요리하기 위해 화로를 필요로하지 않습니다.
PolskI: Ta kuchnia nie wymaga pieca, by móc przyrządzać posiłki.

description: Farmer Station's allow followers to tend to nearby crops, water them, and collect the harvest.
Japanese: 農産作業所 II

description: Farmer Station's allow followers to tend to nearby crops, water them, and collect the harvest.
English: Farmers will be able to harvest your crops and deposit them in a chest for you to collect.
Japanese: 割り振られた信者が農作物を収穫し、箱に集めてくれる
Russian: Место, где хранятся садовые инструменты. Последователи будут складывать собранный урожай в сундук, из которого вы сможете его забрать.
French: Les fermiers récolteront les plantations et les déposeront dans un coffre.
German: Die Farmer können deine Feldfrüchte für dich ernten und sie in einer Truhe deponieren, aus der du sie einsammeln kannst.
Spanish: Los granjeros recolectarán los cultivos por ti y depositarán la cosecha en un cofre.
Portuguese (Brazil): Fazendeiros poderão fazer as colheitas e depositá-las em um baú para você coletá-las.
Chinese (Simplified): 农夫可以为你收割作物，并存放在箱子内供你囤积粮食。
Chinese (Traditional): 農夫可以為你收割作物，並存放在箱子內供你囤積食物。
Korean: 농부들이 곡식을 수확하고 상자에 배치할 수 있게 됩니다.
PolskI: Rolnicy będą mogli zbierać plony i umieszczać je w skrzyniach, z których będzie można je odebrać.

description: A statue of the Lambs head.
English: A statue of the mighty Lamb
Japanese: 偉大なる子羊をかたどった石像

description: Notifying a player that you can only build this particular structure once
English: This structure is only built once.
Japanese: この建築物は1つしか建築できない。
Russian: Эту постройку можно возвести один раз.
German: Gebäude kann nur einmal gebaut werden.
Spanish: Esta estructura solo se puede construir una vez.
Portuguese (Brazil): Esta estrutura é construída apenas uma vez.
Chinese (Simplified): 此建筑物只能建造一次。
Chinese (Traditional): 此建築物只能建造一次。
Korean: 이 건물은 한 번만 지을 수 있습니다.
PolskI: Ta konstrukcja jest budowana tylko raz.

description: A decoration structure you can build that is a trophy to killing a particular boss. {0} will be the name of the boss
Japanese: {0} を殺した証の記念碑
Russian: Доказательство того, что {0} уже не восстанет.
German: Eine Trophäe für das Töten von {0}

description: Description of a decoration structure you can build that is a trophy to killing a particular boss. {0} will be the name of the boss
Japanese: {0} の記念碑

description: DECORATION ICONS: https://www.dropbox.com/sh/g89o8ztnnnza8pl/AABlSXf_QVzAq5JhtVu44FLWa?dl=0
This is leve 2 of the kitchen. Kitchens allow players to discover and use recipees which can be cooked by the player or queued for followers to prepare.
English: When cooking you will be able to create a 'Blessed' meal which will satisfy a Follower's hunger far more effectively.
Japanese: 信者の満腹度をより効果的に満たす「祝福された」料理を作ることができる
Russian: Место, где можно приготовить благословенные блюда, насыщающие последователей гораздо быстрее.
French: Donne la possibilité de préparer des plats bénis, bien plus consistants.
German: Beim Kochen wirst du „gesegnete“ Mahlzeiten herstellen können, die den Hunger deiner Anhänger weit effektiver stillen.
Spanish: Cuando cocines podrás preparar un plato «bendito», el cual saciará el hambre de uno de tus adeptos mucho más que un plato normal.
Portuguese (Brazil): Ao cozinhar, você poderá criar uma refeição "Abençoada" que saciará a fome de um Seguidor com muito mais eficiência.
Chinese (Simplified): 烹煮时，你将能制作“祝福”餐点，这种餐点补充教徒饱足感的效率更高。
Chinese (Traditional): 烹煮時，你將能製作「祝福」餐點，這種餐點補充教徒飽足程度的效率更高。
Korean: 요리를 할 때 '축복받은' 음식을 만들어 추종자의 허기를 보다 효율적으로 채울 수 있습니다.
PolskI: Podczas gotowania będziesz w stanie stworzyć "Błogosławiony" posiłek, który znacznie skuteczniej zaspokoi głód Wyznawców.

description: The Demon Summoner allows the Player to turn followers into 'Demons' Which join the player in battle and periodically attack enemies.
English: Possess a Follower with the spirit of a demon so that they can join you on your next Crusade.
Japanese: 信者の体に悪魔の魂を呼び降ろす。変身した悪魔は次の戦闘に加わってくれる
Russian: Место, где можно вселить дух демона в одного из последователей, чтобы взять его с собой в поход.
French: L'esprit d'un démon possède le corps d'un adepte et lui permet de vous accompagner dans un donjon.
German: Du kannst einen Dämon von einem Anhänger Besitz ergreifen lassen, damit dieser dich auf deinem nächsten Kreuzzug begleitet.
Spanish: Uno de tus adeptos es poseído por el espíritu de un demonio y se unirá a ti en tu próxima cruzada.
Portuguese (Brazil): Deixe um Seguidor possuído pelo espírito de um demônio para que ele te acompanhe na sua próxima Cruzada.
Chinese (Simplified): 使恶魔灵魂附身一位教徒，以便加入你的下一场圣战。
Chinese (Traditional): 使惡魔靈魂附身一位教徒，以便加入你的下一場聖戰。
Korean: 추종자 하나를 악령에게 홀리게 해 다음 성전 때 합류하게 합니다.
PolskI: Opętaj Wyznawcę duchem demona, aby mógł dołączyć do ciebie podczas następnej Krucjaty.

description: A little shrine of a monster
Japanese: マッシブモンスターの祭壇

description: A little shrine of a monster
Japanese: 強きモンスターに祈りを捧げよ
French: Priez le monstre sacré de cet autel.

description: A little flower pot
Japanese: 花瓶の柱

description: A little flower pot
English: Small flower pots strung upon a post.
Japanese: 小さな花瓶が括りつけられた木の柱
Russian: Маленькие цветочные горшки, подвешенные к столбам.
French: Des petits pots de fleurs suspendus à des rondins de bois.
German: Kleine Blumentöpfe, die an Pfosten hängen.
Spanish: Unas pequeñas macetas colgadas de un poste.
Portuguese (Brazil): Pequenos vasos de flores amarrados em um poste

description: A lantern
Japanese: リーフランプ

description: A lantern
English: To illuminate the lush green surrounds.
Japanese: 緑豊かな場所を照らしてくれる
French: Pour illuminer la végétation luxuriante de votre base.
Spanish: Para iluminar el exuberante entorno vegetal.
Portuguese (Brazil): Para iluminar os ambientes ricos em vegetação

description: A flower vase
Japanese: 花瓶

description: A flower vase
English: A delicate addition to any base.
Japanese: どんな場所でも華やかな雰囲気にしてくれる装飾品
French: Une touche florale pour agrémenter votre base.
German: Eine zierliche Ergänzung für jedes Lager.
Spanish: Dale un toque delicado a tu secta.
Chinese (Simplified): 让任何根据地更添风雅
Chinese (Traditional): 讓任何根據地更添風雅

description: A watering can
Japanese: ジョウロ

description: A watering can
Japanese: 実際に使用するためのものではない
Russian: Украшение, не предназначенное для поливания цветов.

description: A wheel barrow with flowers in it
Japanese: フラワーカート（小）

description: A wheel barrow with flowers in it
English: The bounty of springtime, on wheels.
Japanese: 春が詰め込まれたカート
French: La beauté du printemps, sur des roulettes.
German: Die Fülle des Frühlings, auf Rädern.
Spanish: El botín de la primavera sobre ruedas.
Portuguese (Brazil): A dádiva da natureza sobre rodas
Chinese (Traditional): 春季的贈禮，拉車有輪子

description: A little fountain where the water comes out the eyes of a shrine so it looks like it is weeping
Japanese: 嘆きの祭壇

description: A little fountain where the water comes out the eyes of a shrine so it looks like it is weeping
English: A shrine in memory of a sorrowful soul.
Japanese: 悲しみに涙を流す魂を模した祭壇
French: Un autel érigé à la mémoire d'une âme en peine.
German: Ein Schrein im Andenken an eine traurige Seele.
Spanish: Un santuario en honor a un alma en pena.
Portuguese (Brazil): Um santuário em memória de uma alma pesarosa

Japanese: 花タイル
ところどころに花が咲いている、青々とした芝
French: De jolies fleurs poussant sur de l'herbe bien verte.
German: Grünes Gras, auf dem Blumen wachsen.
Spanish: Un manto de hierba con flores.
Chinese (Simplified): 绿草与生意盎然的花朵
Chinese (Traditional): 綠草與生意盎然的花朵
PolskI: Zielona trawa, na której rosną kwiaty.

Japanese: 干し草タイル

English: Hay to lay upon the ground.
Japanese: 干し草を敷き詰めた地面
Russian: Высушенная трава, которой можно выстелить землю.
French: Plus confortable pour les pattes de vos adeptes.
German: Heu, das auf dem Boden verteilt werden kann.

Japanese: 木板タイル
木製の板。道を作るのに最適
French: Des planches de bois, idéales pour créer des chemins.
German: Holzbohlen, die perfekt geeignet sind, um darauf zu gehen.
Spanish: Tablas de madera, perfectas para caminar sobre ellas.
Portuguese (Brazil): Tábuas de madeira, perfeitas para serem pisadas

Japanese: 模様付きタイル
木製の板には奇妙な模様が描かれている…
French: Des planches de bois portant d'étranges marques...
Spanish: Tablas de madera con unas marcas un tanto extrañas...
Portuguese (Brazil): Tábuas de madeira com marcações estranhas...
Chinese (Simplified): 带有诡异印记的铺地木板……
Chinese (Traditional): 帶有詭異印記的鋪地木板……

Japanese: レッドカーペットタイル

description: do we want all these tiles lol?
Japanese: セレブご用達
Russian: Дорожка для тех, чья важность неоспорима.

description: lol it does seem liike a lot!
Japanese: 丸石タイル
頑丈でいて、どこか懐かしい
Russian: Плитка, напоминающая о дорожках в саду.
Spanish: Robusto y con un toque nostálgico.

Japanese: 石畳タイル
石が無駄なく敷き詰められている
French: Là où il y a une volonté, il y a un chemin en briques.

Japanese: マグマタイル
足元には気を付けて…
French: Attention où vous mettez les pattes...

description: can use this to create water sections in your base
Japanese: 水辺タイル

description: can use this to create water sections in your base
English: Create a beautiful pond for your Followers to admire.
Japanese: 信者の心を癒すような美しい池を作ろう
Russian: Часть красивого водоёма, которым могут любоваться ваши последователи.
French: Permet de créer de jolis étangs que vos adeptes pourront admirer.
German: Erschaffe einen tollen Teich, den deine Anhänger bewundern können.
Spanish: Crea un precioso estanque para que tus adeptos lo admiren.
Portuguese (Brazil): Crie um lindo lago para seus Seguidores admirarem
Chinese (Simplified): 建个美丽池塘供教徒欣赏
Chinese (Traditional): 建個美麗池塘供教徒欣賞
PolskI: Stwórz piękny staw, który zachwyci twoich Wyznawców.

Japanese: モザイクタイル
模様が規則的に配置されたタイル
Spanish: Un patrón colocado a la perfección.

Japanese: 黄金タイル

English: You are the Leader, after all...
Japanese: 教祖様がこういう趣味なら、どうぞご自由に…
Russian: Покрытие для тех, кто в своём поселении может делать что хочет.
French: Pour une base qui en jette.
German: Immerhin bist du hier der Anführer …

Japanese: 森の小道タイル
自然に包まれたい人に
French: Pour être au plus près de la nature.

Japanese: ドロタイル
最上品質のドロだけを集めて作られたもの
Russian: Лучшие грязевые ванны у вас под ногами.
French: Il y a une certaine beauté dans cette crasse...
German: Besteht nur aus dem feinsten Dreck.
Spanish: El barro de la mayor calidad, por supuesto.

English: A trophy for killing The One Who Waits.
Japanese: 待ち受けし者を殺した証の記念碑

Spanish: Un trofeo por matar a Aquel Que Espera.
Portuguese (Brazil): Um troféu por matar Aquele Que Espera
Chinese (Simplified): 击杀待终冠主的纪念品
Chinese (Traditional): 擊殺待終冠主的紀念品

Japanese: 全能の目
Portuguese (Brazil): Olho Que Tudo Vê da Testemunha
Chinese (Traditional): 見證者的全知全能之眼

description: A building with big eye, the building shows a timelapse video of the your base being developed
English: See the development of your cult over the days.
Japanese: 教団が日に日に成長しゆく様子を見守る目
Russian: Глаз, следящий за развитием вашего культа.
French: Permet de voir le développement de votre culte au fil des jours.
German: Sieh dir die Entwicklung deines Kultes an.
Spanish: Mira cómo se ha desarrollado la secta con el paso de los días.
Portuguese (Brazil): Veja o desenvolvimento do seu culto ao longo dos dias.
Chinese (Simplified): 查看圣教这几天的发展情况。
Chinese (Traditional): 觀看教會連日以來的建設發展。
PolskI: Obserwuj rozwój swojego kultu na przestrzeni dni.

description: Farmer Station's allow followers to tend to nearby crops and water them
English: Farmer Station's allows Followers to water nearby crops.
Japanese: 農産作業所を設置すると、信者が近くの作物に水をやってくれる
Russian: Место, где хранятся садовые инструменты. Вы можете поручить последователю поливать всходы.
French: Le Poste de fermier permet aux adeptes d'arroser les cultures à proximité.
German: Farmen ermöglichen Anhängern, Feldfrüchte in der Nähe zu bewässern.

French: Permet de ressusciter en sacrifiant un adepte lorsque vous mourrez dans un donjon pour la première fois.

description: Pack of decoration buildings
Japanese: 装飾品・基礎セット

description: Pack of decoration buildings
English: Unlocks <color=#FFD201>Basic Decorations.</color> A collection of simple decorations, to beautify your base.
Japanese: <color=#FFD201>装飾品・基礎セット</color>をアンロックする。教団本部を美しく飾るためのシンプルな装飾品がそろったセット
Russian: Набор <color=#FFD201>простых предметов</color> для украшения вашего поселения.
French: Débloque un ensemble de <color=#FFD201>décorations simples</color> pour embellir votre base.
German: Schaltet <color=#FFD201>Einfache Dekorationen</color> frei. Eine Sammlung einfacher Dekorationen zur Verschönerung deines Basislagers.
Spanish: Desbloquea <color=#FFD201>decoraciones básicas</color>. Una colección de adornos sencillos para hacer de tu campamento un lugar más acogedor.
Portuguese (Brazil): Desbloqueia <color=#FFD201>Decorações Básicas</color>. Uma coleção de decorações simples que deixam sua base mais bonita.
Chinese (Simplified): 解锁<color=#FFD201>基本装饰。</color>这是一系列简单的装饰，可装扮你的根据地。
Chinese (Traditional): 解鎖<color=#FFD201>基本裝飾。</color>這是一系列簡樸的裝飾，可美化你的根據地。
Korean: <color=#FFD201>기본 장식품</color>을 해금합니다. 단순한 장식품 목록으로 기지를 아름답게 꾸밀 수 있습니다.
PolskI: Odblokowuje <color=#FFD201> Dekoracje podstawowe.</color> Kolekcja prostych dekoracji do upiększenia twojej bazy.

description: Pack of decoration buildings
Japanese: 装飾品・骨セット

description: Pack of decoration buildings
English: Unlocks <color=#FFD201>Bone Decorations.</color> A collection of terrifying buildings built from enemy bones. Some decorations will give your Follower's faith when admired.
Japanese: <color=#FFD201>装飾品・骨セット</color>をアンロックする。敵の骨から作られた恐ろしい見た目の装飾品のセット。一部の装飾品は、信者の信仰を上昇させることもある
Russian: Набор <color=#FFD201>жутких предметов из костей ваших врагов</color>. Некоторые из них при созерцании усиливают веру последователей.
French: Débloque un ensemble de <color=#FFD201>décorations terrifiantes</color> faites des ossements de vos ennemis. Certaines décorations augmentent la foi des adeptes qui les admirent.
German: Schaltet <color=#FFD201>Knochendekoration</color> frei. Eine Sammlung furchteinflößender Gebäude aus den Knochen deiner Gegner. Einige Dekorationen gewähren deinen Anhängern beim Bewundern Glauben.
Spanish: Desbloquea <color=#FFD201>decoraciones de hueso</color>. Una colección de construcciones hechas con los huesos de tus enemigos. Algunas decoraciones aportan fe a tus adeptos cuando los admiran.
Portuguese (Brazil): Desbloqueia <color=#FFD201>Decorações de Ossos</color>. Uma coleção de construções aterrorizantes feitas de ossos. Quando admiradas, algumas decorações darão fé aos Seguidores.
Chinese (Simplified): 解锁<color=#FFD201>骨头装饰。</color>一系列采用敌人骨头建造的恐怖建筑物。某些装饰会在教徒欣赏时为其提供信仰值。
Chinese (Traditional): 解鎖<color=#FFD201>骨頭裝飾。</color>一系列採用敵人骨頭建造的恐怖建築物。某些裝飾會在教徒欣賞時為其提供信仰值。
Korean: <color=#FFD201>뼈 장식품</color>을 해금합니다. 무시무시한 장식품 목록으로 적들의 뼈로 만들어졌습니다. 특정 장식품은 예찬 시 추종자에게 신앙을 주기도 합니다.
PolskI: Odblokowuje <color=#FFD201> Dekoracje kościane.</color> Kolekcja przerażających budynków zbudowanych z kości pokonanych. Niektóre elementy dodadzą Twoim wyznawcom wiary, gdy będą je podziwiać.

description: A shrine flame is an upgrade in which a small fire burns in front of the shrine to make it more effective.
English: Light the cleansing fire and harvest more Devotion.
Japanese: 浄化の炎が灯り、祈念の収集量が増加する
Russian: Очищающее пламя, которое позволяет получать больше преданности.
French: Allume un feu purificateur qui permet de récolter plus de dévotion.
German: Entfache das reinigende Feuer und ernte mehr Hingabe.
Spanish: Enciende un fuego purificador y cosecha más devoción.
Portuguese (Brazil): Acenda o fogo purificador e colha mais Devoção.
Chinese (Simplified): 点燃净化之火，获得更多虔诚度。
Chinese (Traditional): 點燃淨化之火，獲得更多虔誠值。
Korean: 정화의 불길을 밝히고 헌신을 더 많이 수확합니다.
PolskI: Rozpal oczyszczający ogień i zbierz więcej Oddania.

description: A shrine flame is an upgrade in which a small fire burns in front of the shrine to make it more effective.
Japanese: 炎の祭壇

description: This is the upgraded version of the shrine flame - which is an upgrade in which a small fire burns in front of the shrine to make it more effective.
English: Feed the cleansing fire and harvest more Devotion.
Japanese: 浄化の炎が燃え上がり、祈念の収集量が増加する
Russian: Яркое очищающее пламя, которое позволяет получать больше преданности.
French: Attise le feu purificateur qui permet de récolter plus de dévotion.
German: Nähre das reinigende Feuer und ernte mehr Hingabe.
Spanish: Alimenta el fuego purificador y cosecha más devoción.
Portuguese (Brazil): Alimente o fogo purificador e colha mais Devoção.
Chinese (Simplified): 助长净化之火，获得更多虔诚度。
Chinese (Traditional): 助長淨化之火，獲得更多虔誠值。
Korean: 정화의 불길을 키워 헌신을 더 많이 수확합니다.
PolskI: Podsycaj oczyszczający ogień i zbieraj więcej Oddania.

description: This is the upgraded version of the shrine flame - which is an upgrade in which a small fire burns in front of the shrine to make it more effective.
Japanese: 炎の祭壇 II

description: This is the third and highest upgrade for of the shrine flame - which is an upgrade in which a small fire burns in front of the shrine to make it more effective.
English: Blaze the cleansing fire and harvest more Devotion.
Japanese: 浄化の炎が燃え盛り、祈念の収集量が増加する
Russian: Бушующее очищающее пламя, которое позволяет получать больше преданности.
French: Alimente le feu purificateur qui permet de récolter plus de dévotion.
German: Lass das reinigende Feuer lodern und ernte mehr Hingabe.
Spanish: Alimenta aún más el fuego purificador y cosecha más devoción.
Portuguese (Brazil): Incendeie o fogo purificador e colha mais Devoção.
Chinese (Simplified): 闪耀净化之火，获得更多虔诚度。
Chinese (Traditional): 閃耀淨化之火，獲得更多虔誠值。
Korean: 정화의 불기를 불태워 헌신을 더 많이 수확합니다.
PolskI: Roznieć oczyszczający ogień i zbierz więcej Oddania.

description: This is the third and highest upgrade for of the shrine flame - which is an upgrade in which a small fire burns in front of the shrine to make it more effective.
Japanese: 炎の祭壇 III

description: This is an upgraded version of the central shrine that is the middle of your base. It allows more Followers to pray there.
Japanese: 祭壇 II

description: This is an even more upgraded version of the central shrine that is the middle of your base. It allows more Followers to pray there.
Japanese: 祭壇 III

description: This is the highest upgraded version of the central shrine that is the middle of your base. It allows more Followers to pray there.
Japanese: 祭壇 IV

description: A passive shrine is just a small shrine you can put anywhere in your base and a Follower will randomly come up and put devotion in to it.
Japanese: 礼拝像

description: Like the shrine flame, this is a flame that makes the passive shrine more effective
English: The cleansing fire will draw forth more Devotion.
Japanese: 浄化の炎によって、祈念の収集量が増加する
Russian: Очищающее пламя, которое позволяет получать больше преданности.
French: Permet de générer plus de dévotion.
German: Das reinigende Feuer wird mehr Hingabe hervorbringen.
Spanish: El fuego purificador atraerá más devoción.
Portuguese (Brazil): O fogo purificador atrairá mais Devoção.
Chinese (Simplified): 净化之火将引出更多虔诚度。
Chinese (Traditional): 淨化之火將引出更多虔誠值。
Korean: 정화의 불길이 더 많은 헌신을 끌어모읍니다.

description: Like the shrine flame, this is a flame that makes the passive shrine more effective
Japanese: 炎の礼拝像

Japanese: 礼拝像 III

Russian: Улучшение, уменьшающее расходы на ритуалы на 25%.
French: Diminue le coût des rituels de 25 %.

description: Buff for temple (Sermons, Ritualss)
Japanese: 儀式割引

description: Buff for temple (Sermons, Ritualss)
Japanese: 儀式のコストが50%減少する
Russian: Улучшение, уменьшающее расходы на ритуалы на 50%.
French: Diminue le coût des rituels de 50 %.

description: Buff for temple (Sermons, Ritualss)
Japanese: 儀式割引 II

description: Followers will donate coins into the collection box at the end of a sermon
Japanese: 集金箱

description: Followers will donate coins into the collection box at the end of a sermon
English: A <color=#FFD201>Collection Box</color> will appear in your temple so Followers can express their appreciation for your Sermons.
Japanese: 教会堂内に<color=#FFD201>集金箱</color>が出現し、あなたの説教への感謝を金銭という形で信者が表現できるようになる
Russian: <color=#FFD201>Ящик для пожертвований</color>, который можно установить в храме, чтобы последователи могли выражать вам благодарность за проповеди.
French: Une <color=#FFD201>boîte de collecte</color> apparaîtra dans votre Temple pour que vous adeptes puissent y déposer des dons après vos sermons.
German: Eine <color=#FFD201>Kollektenbox</color> erscheint in deinem Tempel, damit deine Anhänger ihre Anerkennung für deine Predigten zum Ausdruck bringen können.
Spanish: Aparecerá una <color=#FFD201>caja de donativos</color> en tu templo para que tus adeptos demuestren su aprecio por tus sermones.
Portuguese (Brazil): Uma <color=#FFD201>Caixa do Dízimo</color> aparecerá no seu templo para que os Seguidores possam expressar como apreciam seus Sermões.
Chinese (Simplified): 你的圣殿将设置<color=#FFD201>募款箱</color>，让教徒对你的布道表达感激。
Chinese (Traditional): 你的聖殿將設置<color=#FFD201>募款箱</color>，讓教徒對你的講道表達感激。
Korean: <color=#FFD201>헌금함</color>은 사원에 나타나 추종자들이 당신의 설교에 대한 감사를 표할 수 있게 해줍니다.
PolskI: W świątyni pojawi się <color=#FFD201> Skrzynka kolekcjonerska </color>, dzięki której obserwujący będą mogli wyrazić swoje uznanie dla twoich kazań.

description: Followers will donate coins into the collection box at the end of a sermon
English: A <color=#FFD201>Collection Box II</color> will appear in your temple so Followers can express their appreciation for your Sermons even more.
Japanese: 教会堂内に<color=#FFD201>集金箱</color>が出現し、あなたの説教への感謝をより多くの金銭という形で信者が表現できるようになる
Russian: <color=#FFD201>Ящик для пожертвований</color>, который можно установить в храме, чтобы последователи могли ещё активнее выражать вам благодарность за проповеди.
French: Une <color=#FFD201>boîte de collecte II</color> apparaîtra dans votre Temple pour que vous adeptes puissent y déposer plus de dons après vos sermons.
German: Eine <color=#FFD201>Kollektenbox II</color> erscheint in deinem Tempel, damit deine Anhänger ihre Anerkennung für deine Predigten noch deutlicher zum Ausdruck bringen können.
Spanish: Aparecerá una <color=#FFD201>caja de donativos II</color> en tu templo para que tus adeptos demuestren todavía más su aprecio por tus sermones.
Portuguese (Brazil): Uma <color=#FFD201>Caixa do Dízimo II</color> aparecerá no seu templo para que os Seguidores possam expressar ainda mais como apreciam os seus Sermões.
Chinese (Simplified): 你的圣殿将设置<color=#FFD201>募款箱 II</color>，让教徒对你的布道表达更深的感激。
Chinese (Traditional): 你的聖殿將設置<color=#FFD201>募款箱 II</color>，讓教徒對你的講道表達更深的感激。
Korean: <color=#FFD201>헌금함</color>은 사원에 나타나 추종자들이 당신의 설교에 대한 감사를 더 많이 표할 수 있게 해줍니다.
PolskI: W świątyni pojawi się <color=#FFD201> Skrzynka kolekcjonerska II </color>, dzięki której wyznawcy będą mogli jeszcze bardziej wyrazić swoje uznanie dla twoich kazań.

description: Followers will donate coins into the collection box at the end of a sermon
Japanese: 集金箱 II

Russian: Улучшение, сокращающее перерыв между ритуалами на 25%.
French: Diminue le temps de recharge des rituels de 25 %.
Spanish: Reduce el tiempo de recarga de los rituales un 25 %.
Portuguese (Brazil): Diminui o tempo de recarga dos Rituais em 25%
