Korean: 충성심이 높은 추종자들은 더 많은 <color=#FFD201>헌신</color> <sprite name="icon_spirits">을 생성해냅니다. 그렇기에 더 많은 추종자에 더 많은 충성심을 가지고 있다면, 더 빠르게 새로운 <color=#FFD201>능력</color>을 획득할 수 있습니다.
PolskI: Wyznawcy o wyższym poziomie Lojalności generują więcej <color=#FFD201>Poświęcenia</color> <sprite name="icon_spirits">. Im więcej masz Wyznawców i im są bardziej lojalni, tym szybciej zdobędziesz nowe <color=#FFD201>umiejętności.</color>

description: More information for the tutorial about blessing meals
Japanese: 祝福された料理

description: More information for the tutorial about blessing meals
English: You can now create 'Blessed' meals which will satisfy Follower's hunger significantly more.
Japanese: 信者の満腹度を大幅に満たす「祝福された」料理を作れるようになりました。
Russian: Теперь вы можете готовить благословенные блюда, насыщающие последователей гораздо быстрее.
French: Vous pouvez maintenant préparer des plats bénis, bien plus consistants.
German: Du kannst jetzt „Gesegnete Mahlzeiten“ herstellen, die den Hunger deiner Anhänger bedeutend besser stillen.
Spanish: Ahora puedes preparar platos «bendecidos» que saciarán el hambre de tus adeptos más que los platos normales.
Portuguese (Brazil): Agora você pode criar refeições "Abençoadas" que saciarão consideravelmente mais a fome de seus seguidores.
Chinese (Simplified): 现在起，你能制作“祝福”餐点，这种餐点能更大程度补充教徒的饱足感。
Chinese (Traditional): 現在起，你能製作「祝福」餐點，這種餐點能補充教徒更多的飽足程度。
Korean: 이제 '축복받은' 음식을 만들어 추종자들의 허기를 더 크게 채워줄 수 있습니다.
PolskI: Teraz możesz tworzyć 'Błogosławione' posiłki, które znacznie bardziej zaspokajają głód Wyznawców.

description: More information for the tutorial about blessing meals
English: When cooking, target the yellow area to bless the meal.
Japanese: 料理を作る際、黄色いエリアを狙うことで料理を祝福することができます。
Russian: Для этого останавливайте указатель в жёлтом поле во время приготовления пищи.
French: Lorsque vous cuisinez un plat, visez la zone jaune pour bénir le plat.
German: Beim Kochen solltest du den gelben Bereich anpeilen, um die Mahlzeit zu segnen.
Spanish: Cuando cocines, apunta al área amarilla para bendecir el plato.
Portuguese (Brazil): Ao cozinhar, mire na área amarela para abençoar a refeição.
Chinese (Simplified): 烹煮时，瞄准黄色区域对餐点施加祝福。
Chinese (Traditional): 烹煮時，瞄準黃色區域對餐點施加祝福。
Korean: 요리를 할 때 노란색 지점을 노리면 음식에 축복을 가할 수 있습니다.
PolskI: Podczas gotowania celuj w żółty obszar, aby błogosławić posiłek.

description: More information for the tutorial about Followers levelling up
English: Each time a Follower levels up, they will generate additional <color=#FFD201>Devotion</color> <sprite name="icon_spirits"> when at a Sermon or worshipping at the Shrine. So be sure to cultivate their <color=#FFD201>Loyalty.</color>
Japanese: レベルアップした信者は、説教を聞いた際や祭壇で祈りを捧げる際に<color=#FFD201>祈念</color> <sprite name="icon_spirits"> を追加で生成します。信者の<color=#FFD201>忠誠心</color>をどんどん高めていきましょう！
Russian: С каждым новым уровнем последователи выражают больше <color=#FFD201>преданности</color> <sprite name="icon_spirits"> на проповедях и у алтаря.
French: Lorsqu'un adepte gagne des niveaux, il génère plus de <color=#FFD201>dévotion</color> <sprite name="icon_spirits"> en entendant un sermon ou en priant. Tâchez d'augmenter sa <color=#FFD201>fidélité</color> !
German: Jedes Mal, wenn sich die Stufe eines Anhängers erhöht, erzeugt er zusätzliche <color=#FFD201>Hingabe</color> <sprite name="icon_spirits"> bei einer Predigt oder beim Gebet am Schrein. Achte also darauf, <color=#FFD201>Loyalität</color> zu kultivieren!
Spanish: Cada vez que un adepto suba de nivel, generará más <color=#FFD201>devoción</color> <sprite name="icon_spirits"> al escuchar uno de tus sermones o cuando rece en el santuario. ¡Así que acuérdate de asegurarte su <color=#FFD201>lealtad</color>!
Portuguese (Brazil): Ao subir de nível, o seguidor gera <color=#FFD201>Devoção</color> <sprite name="icon_spirits"> adicional enquanto estiver em um Sermão ou adorando em um Santuário. Então, lembre-se de cultivar sua <color=#FFD201>Lealdade!</color>
Chinese (Simplified): 教徒每次升级后，都会在参加布道或在圣坛奉拜时产生额外的<color=#FFD201>虔诚度</color> <sprite name="icon_spirits">。因此请务必增加教徒的<color=#FFD201>忠诚度！</color>
Chinese (Traditional): 教徒每次升級後，都會在參加講道或在聖壇奉拜時產生額外的<color=#FFD201>虔誠值</color> <sprite name="icon_spirits">。因此請務必增加教徒的<color=#FFD201>忠誠度！</color>
Korean: 추종자의 레벨이 상승할 때마다, 추종자들은 추가로 설교나 성지에서 숭배를 할 때<color=#FFD201>헌신</color> <sprite name="icon_spirits">을 생성해냅니다. 그러니 <color=#FFD201>충성심</color>을 함양하는 걸 잊지 마세요!
PolskI: Za każdym razem, gdy Wyznawca awansuje, generuje dodatkowe <color=#FFD201>Poświęcenie</color> <sprite name="icon_spirits"> podczas Kazań lub modlitwy przy Świątyni. Dbaj więc o ich <color=#FFD201>Lojalność.</color>

description: More information for the tutorial about Followers levelling up
English: Increase a Follower's <color=#FFD201>Loyalty</color> to level them up, and they will reward you with Devotion <sprite name="icon_spirits"> and a Commandment Stone Fragment! <sprite name="icon_DoctrineStone">
Japanese: 信者の<color=#FFD201>忠誠心</color>を高めると信者がレベルアップし、祈念 <sprite name="icon_spirits"> や戒律石のかけら <sprite name="icon_DoctrineStone"> を獲得することができます。
Russian: Последователи получают новый уровень, когда проникаются к вам достаточным <color=#FFD201>доверием</color>. После этого они выражают вам свою преданность <sprite name="icon_spirits"> и дают осколок скрижали <sprite name="icon_DoctrineStone">.
French: Augmentez la <color=#FFD201>fidélité</color> de vos adeptes pour qu'ils gagnent des niveaux et vous offrent de la dévotion <sprite name="icon_spirits"> et un fragment de pierre de commandement <sprite name="icon_DoctrineStone"> !
German: Steigere die <color=#FFD201>Loyalität</color> eines Anhängers, um seine Stufe zu erhöhen, dann wird er dich schließlich mit Hingabe <sprite name="icon_spirits"> und einem Gebotsstein-Fragment <sprite name="icon_DoctrineStone"> belohnen.
Spanish: Aumenta la <color=#FFD201>lealtad</color> de tus adeptos para que suban de nivel, y ellos te lo recompensarán con devoción <sprite name="icon_spirits"> y un fragmento de piedra de los mandamientos <sprite name="icon_DoctrineStone">!
Portuguese (Brazil): Aumente a <color=#FFD201>Lealdade</color> de um Seguidor para ele subir de nível, e ele te recompensará com Devoção <sprite name="icon_spirits"> e um Fragmento de Pedra da Lei! <sprite name="icon_DoctrineStone">
Chinese (Simplified): 增加教徒的<color=#FFD201>忠诚度</color>能使其升级，教徒也会提升虔诚度 <sprite name="icon_spirits"> 和戒律石碎块 <sprite name="icon_DoctrineStone">！
Chinese (Traditional): 增加教徒的<color=#FFD201>忠誠度</color>能使其升級，教徒也會產生虔誠值 <sprite name="icon_spirits"> 和戒律石碎塊 <sprite name="icon_DoctrineStone">！
Korean: 추종자의 <color=#FFD201>충성심</color>을 증가시키면 추종자들은 당신에게 헌신 <sprite name="icon_spirits">과 계명석 조각 <sprite name="icon_DoctrineStone">을 줄 것입니다!
PolskI: Zwiększ <color=#FFD201>Lojalność</color> Wyznawcy, by awansował, a nagrodzi cię Poświęceniem <sprite name="icon_spirits"> i fragmentem Kamienia Przykazania! <sprite name="icon_DoctrineStone">

description: More information for the tutorial about Followers levelling up
English: You can also give them <color=#FFD201>gifts,</color> complete <color=#FFD201>quests</color> for them, perform <color=#FFD201>Sermons</color> and many other actions.
Japanese: 信者に<color=#FFD201>贈り物</color>を渡す、頼まれた<color=#FFD201>クエスト</color>をこなす、<color=#FFD201>説教</color>などのアクションを行うことでも、忠誠心は上昇します。
Russian: Чтобы повышать доверие, читайте <color=#FFD201>проповеди</color>, дарите <color=#FFD201>подарки</color> и выполняйте <color=#FFD201>просьбы</color> своих последователей.
French: Vous pouvez également leur offrir des <color=#FFD201>cadeaux</color>, accomplir des <color=#FFD201>quêtes</color> pour eux, prononcer des <color=#FFD201>sermons</color>, et bien plus encore.
German: Du kannst Anhängern auch <color=#FFD201>Geschenke</color> machen, <color=#FFD201>Quests</color> für sie erledigen, <color=#FFD201>Predigten</color> halten und viele weitere Aktionen durchführen.
Spanish: También puedes darles <color=#FFD201>regalos</color>, completar <color=#FFD201>misiones</color>, dar <color=#FFD201>sermones</color>, etc.
Portuguese (Brazil): Você também pode dar <color=#FFD201>presentes</color> para ele, completar <color=#FFD201>missões</color>, pregar <color=#FFD201>Sermões</color> e muitas outras ações.
Chinese (Simplified): 你也能送教徒<color=#FFD201>礼物</color>、替教徒完成<color=#FFD201>任务</color>、<color=#FFD201>布道</color>，以及许多其他的行动。
Chinese (Traditional): 你也能送教徒<color=#FFD201>禮物</color>、替教徒完成<color=#FFD201>任務</color>、<color=#FFD201>講道</color>，以及許多其他的行動。
Korean: 또한 추종자들에게 <color=#FFD201>선물</color>을 주거나, <color=#FFD201>임무</color>를 완수해주거나, <color=#FFD201>설교</color> 외에도 다른 다양한 행동을 수행할 수 있습니다.
PolskI: Możesz też dawać im <color=#FFD201>prezenty,</color> wykonywać dla nich <color=#FFD201>zadania,</color> prowadzić <color=#FFD201>Kazania</color> i wiele innych czynności.

description: More information for the tutorial about the Twitch Integration
Japanese: Twitch of the Lamb

description: More information for the tutorial about the Twitch Integration
English: Cult of the Lamb Twitch Integration
Japanese: 『Cult of the Lamb』とTwitchの連携
Russian: Интегрируйте Twitch в игру Cult of the Lamb.
French: Intégration Twitch dans Cult of the Lamb
Spanish: Integración en Twitch de la Secta del Cordero
Portuguese (Brazil): Integração de Cult of the Lamb com a Twitch
Korean: Cult of the Lamb Twitch 연동
PolskI: Integracja Cult of the Lamb z Twitch

description: More information for the tutorial about the Twitch Integration
English: Viewers can spend Channel Points which fill up your Twitch Totem Bar. When this bar is full you will receive a reward!
Japanese: 視聴者はTwitchのチャンネルポイントを使ってトーテムバーを満たすことができ、バーが満タンになるとあなたのもとへ報酬が送られます！
Russian: Зрители тратят баллы канала, заполняя шкалу тотема Twitch. Когда шкала заполнится, вы получите награду.
French: Vos spectateurs peuvent dépenser des points pour remplir la barre du totem. Lorsque cette barre est pleine, vous recevez une récompense !
German: Zuschauer können Kanalpunkte für deine Twitch-Totem-Anzeige ausgeben. Ist sie voll, erhältst du eine Belohnung!
Spanish: Los espectadores usan puntos de canal para llenar la barra tótem de Twitch. Al llenarse, recibes una recompensa.
Portuguese (Brazil): Espectadores podem encher a Barra de Totem da Twitch com Pontos do Canal e ganhar uma recompensa ao terminar!
Chinese (Simplified): 观众可以花费忠诚点数，累积你的 Twitch 图腾柱条。集满之后，你就能获得奖励！
Chinese (Traditional): 觀眾可以花費忠誠點數，累積你的 Twitch 圖騰柱條。集滿之後，你就能獲得獎勵！
Korean: 시청자들이 채널 포인트를 소모해 Twitch 토템 바를 채울 수 있습니다. 바가 가득 차면 보상을 얻습니다!
PolskI: Widzowie mogą wydawać Punkty Kanału, które napełniają pasek Twitch Totemu. Gdy pasek się zapełni, otrzymasz nagrodę!

description: More information for the tutorial about the Twitch Integration
English: Help or Hinder events will happen automatically. They allow viewers to vote on either giving you a bonus or punishing you!
Japanese: 自動で発生する「支援か妨害か」イベントでは、あなたを応援するか邪魔するか、視聴者が自由に投票することができます！
Russian: Голосования начинаются автоматически. Зрители смогут упростить ваше прохождение или усложнить его.
French: Lors des événements « aider ou entraver », les spectateurs pourront voter pour vous donner un bonus ou vous punir !
German: Events zum Helfen oder Hindern starten automatisch. Nach Zuschauerwahl erhältst du einen Bonus oder wirst bestraft!
Spanish: En los eventos automáticos Ayudar o Entorpecer, los espectadores decidirán darte una bonificación o castigarte.
Portuguese (Brazil): Eventos de Ajudar ou Complicar são automáticos. Neles, os espectadores votam para dar uma mãozinha ou uma voadora!
Chinese (Simplified): 帮忙还是阻碍活动会自动发生，让观众投票给你奖励，或是惩罚你！
Chinese (Traditional): 幫忙還是阻礙活動會自動發生，讓觀眾投票給你獎勵，或是懲罰你！
Korean: 도움 혹은 방해 이벤트는 자동으로 일어납니다. 시청자들이 이를 통해 당신에게 보너스를 주거나 벌을 줄 수 있습니다!
PolskI: Wydarzenia Pomocy lub Przeszkody będą odbywać się automatycznie. Pozwalają widzom głosować, czy dać ci bonus, czy cię ukarać!

description: More information for the tutorial about the Twitch Integration
English: Allow viewers to enter a raffle to create your next follower. The follower will be designed by the viewer and will display their name above them at all times.
Japanese: 抽選で選ばれた視聴者は信者を作成できます。選ばれた視聴者がデザインした信者の頭上には、常にその視聴者の名前が表示されます。
Russian: Вы можете устроить розыгрыш между зрителями. Победитель получит право создать последователя и дать ему свой псевдоним, который будет постоянно отображаться у него над головой.
French: Organisez un tirage au sort pour créer votre prochain adepte. Le vainqueur décidera de son apparence et son nom sera toujours affiché au-dessus de lui.
German: Erlaube Zuschauern mithilfe einer Ziehung, deinen nächsten Anhänger zu gestalten. Der Name des Zuschauers, der ihn entwirft, wird permanent über ihm eingeblendet.
Spanish: Permite a los espectadores participar en un sorteo para crear y diseñar a tu próximo adepto. Llevará su nombre encima en todo momento.
Portuguese (Brazil): Deixe que os espectadores participem de um sorteio para criar seu próximo seguidor. O seguidor será criado pelo espectador e sempre exibirá o nome dele.
Chinese (Simplified): 让观众参加抽奖，创建你的下一位教徒。这位教徒将由观众负责设计，并且随时在教徒上方显示观众的名字。
Chinese (Traditional): 讓觀眾參加抽獎，创建你的下一位教徒。這位教徒將由觀眾負責設計，並且隨時在教徒上方顯示觀眾的名字。
Korean: 시청자를 추첨에 참가시켜 다음 추종자를 만들게 하세요. 시청자가 디자인한 추종자는 시청자의 이름이 붙은 채로 항상 나타납니다.
PolskI: Pozwól widzom wziąć udział w losowaniu, by stworzyć twojego następnego Wyznawcę. Wyznawca zostanie zaprojektowany przez widza i będzie miał zawsze wyświetlane jego imię.

Spanish: Los <color=#FFD201>adeptos</color> depositarán sus recursos aquí cuando tú no estes.
Portuguese (Brazil): <color=#FFD201>Seguidores</color> depositam recursos aqui na sua ausência.
Chinese (Simplified): <color=#FFD201>教徒</color>会在你离开时将资源存放在此。
Chinese (Traditional): <color=#FFD201>教徒</color>會在你離開時將資源存放在此。
Korean: 당신이 없을 때 <color=#FFD201>추종자</color>들은 이곳에 자원을 넣습니다.
PolskI: <color=#FFD201>Wyznawcy</color> zostawiają tu zasoby, gdy cię nie ma.

description: When you get a new follower you can choose to convert them to your cult or consume them for a monster heart
Japanese: 祈念 <sprite name="icon_spirits"> <color=#FFD201>x10</color>を手に入れる
French: Permet de gagner <color=#FFD201>10</color> de dévotion <sprite name="icon_spirits">.
Chinese (Simplified): 获得 <color=#FFD201>10 点</color>虔诚度<sprite name="icon_spirits">
Chinese (Traditional): 獲得 <color=#FFD201>10 點</color>虔誠值 <sprite name="icon_spirits">

Japanese: 派遣内容を選択する

description:
Describes what the percentage is all about 
  on the missionary screen
English: Send Followers away for a few days to spread the word of the Lamb. The percentage indicates the chance of success... or death.
Japanese: 信者を数日間派遣し、子羊に関する評判を広める。表示された数値は成功率…逆に言えば死亡率を示している。
Russian: Ваши последователи на несколько дней отправятся проповедовать учение ягнёнка. Вероятность успеха (или гибели) указана в процентах.
French: Envoyez des adeptes en mission durant quelques jours pour répandre la parole sainte de l'Agneau. Le pourcentage indique les chances de succès... ou de mort.
German: Entsende Anhänger für einige Tage, um das Wort des Lamms zu verbreiten. Die Prozentzahl zeigt die Chancen auf Erfolg … oder auf ein vorzeitiges Ableben an.
Spanish: Enviar adeptos a que difundan la Palabra del Cordero durante unos días. El porcentaje indica la probabilidad de éxito... o muerte.
Portuguese (Brazil): Envie Seguidores para disseminarem a palavra do Cordeiro por alguns dias. A porcentagem indica a chance de sucesso... ou morte.
Chinese (Simplified): 派教徒外出几天，传播圣羊的话语。百分比代表成功机率……或死亡。
Chinese (Traditional): 派教徒外出幾天，傳播聖羊的話語。百分比代表成功機率……或死亡。
Korean: 어린 양의 말씀을 전파하기 위해 며칠 동안 추종자를 파견합니다. 확률은 성공하느냐... 아니면 죽느냐를 나타냅니다.
PolskI: Wyślij Wyznawców na kilka dni, by szerzyli słowo Baranka. Procent oznacza szansę powodzenia... lub śmierci.

description: Generic when something is full
Japanese: 満タン

Japanese: 集める

English: The lingering presence of {0} can be felt.
Japanese: {0} の邪悪な気配を感じる。
Russian: Земля пропитана силой епископа этих мест.
French: Une présence inquiétante se fait sentir... {0}, est-ce toi ?
German: Die Präsenz von {0} ist immer noch spürbar.
Portuguese (Brazil): A presença sinistra de {0} pode ser sentida.
Chinese (Simplified): 感受到了{0}留存许久的影响力。
Chinese (Traditional): 感受到了{0}留存許久的影響力。
PolskI: Utrzymująca się obecność {0} może być odczuwalna.

description: Debuff player receives
English: <shake>... red hearts have been converted into blue hearts.
Japanese: <shake>…レッドハートがブルーハートに変換された。
French: <shake>... Les cœurs rouges ont été transformés en cœurs bleus.
German: <shake>... rote Herzen wurden in blaue Herzen umgewandelt.
Spanish: <shake>Los corazones rojos se han vuelto azules.
Portuguese (Brazil): <shake>... corações vermelhos foram convertidos em corações azuis.</shake>
PolskI: <shake>... czerwone serca zostały zamienione na niebieskie serca.

description: Debuff player receives
Japanese: <shake>…タロットカード「{0}」を失った。
French: <shake>... La carte de tarot {0} a été perdue.
Portuguese (Brazil): <shake>... a carta de tarô {0} foi perdida.</shake>

description: Debuff player receives
English: <shake>... enemy projectiles have increased in speed.
Japanese: <shake>…敵の遠距離攻撃の速度が上昇した。
French: <shake>... Les projectiles adverses sont plus rapides.
Spanish: <shake>Los proyectiles enemigos han aumentado de velocidad.

description: Debuff player receives
English: <shake>... higher chance of encountering special enemies.
Japanese: <shake>…特殊な敵に遭遇する確率が上昇した。
French: <shake>... Vous avez plus de chances de rencontrer des ennemis spéciaux.
German: <shake>... höhere Wahrscheinlichkeit, auf besondere Gegner zu treffen.
Portuguese (Brazil): <shake>... maior chance de encontrar inimigos especiais.</shake>
PolskI: <shake>... zwiększona szansa na spotkanie specjalnych wrogów.

description: Debuff player receives
Japanese: <shake>…敵の体力が増加した。
French: <shake>... Les ennemis ont plus de vie.

description: Debuff player receives
Japanese: <shake>…すべての悪魔がいなくなった。
French: <shake>... Tous les démons ont été bannis.

description: Debuff player receives
Japanese: <shake>…ダンジョン内で集めた資源がなくなった。
French: <shake>... Les nouveaux objets collectés ont disparu.
Portuguese (Brazil): <shake>... os recursos coletados na masmorra desapareceram.</shake>

description: Debuff player receives
Japanese: <shake>…回避の距離が短くなった。
French: <shake>... La distance d'esquive a été réduite.
Portuguese (Brazil): <shake>... a distância de esquiva foi reduzida.</shake>

description: Debuff player receives
Japanese: <shake>…呪い使用時の消費祈念量が2倍になった。
French: <shake>... Le coût en ferveur des maléfices a doublé.
Spanish: <shake>Las maldiciones consumen el doble de fervor.
Portuguese (Brazil): <shake>... maldições consomem o dobro de Fervor.</shake>
PolskI: <shake>... klątwy zużywają dwa razy więcej Gorliwości.

description: Debuff player receives
Japanese: <shake>…すべての特殊ハートが消えた。</shake>
French: <shake>... Tous les cœurs spéciaux ont disparu.</shake>

description: Displayed on cooking fire / kitchen UI to swap to ingredients
Japanese: 材料

description: Displayed on cooking fire / kitchen UI to choose a meal recipe to cook
Japanese: レシピを選ぶ

description: Look in to the darkness, used on fox encounters
Japanese: 闇を覗き込む

description: Requires fuel to cook a meal
English: Add fuel to the fire pit
Japanese: 炎に燃料を加えよう

description: There's no fuel to cook a meal
Japanese: 燃料無し

description: Displayed on the temple boss door when its locked
Japanese: カギがかかっている

description: Will you make a donation of a certain amount?
Japanese: 寄付をする

description: The player sacrifices a red heart to gain a buff or debuff from the blood sacrifice totem
English: A single red heart was sacrificed.
Japanese: レッドハートを1つ捧げた。
Russian: Принесено в жертву одно красное сердце.
French: Un cœur rouge a été sacrifié.
German: Ein einzelnes rotes Herz wurde geopfert.
Spanish: Se ha sacrificado un corazón rojo.

description: The buff or debuff the player receives
Japanese: …何も起こらなかった。

description: The buff or debuff the player receives
Japanese: …武器の与ダメージが上昇した。
French: ... Les dégâts des armes ont augmenté.
Spanish: El daño de las armas ha aumentado.
Portuguese (Brazil): ... o dano da arma foi aumentado.

description: The buff or debuff the player receives
Japanese: …ハートを授かった。

description: The buff or debuff the player receives
Japanese: …病みし心臓を授かった。

description: The buff or debuff the player receives
Japanese: …スピリットハートを授かった。

description: The buff or debuff the player receives
English: ... a tarot card received in return.
Japanese: …タロットカードを1枚授かった。
French: ... Carte de tarot gagnée en retour.
Spanish: Has recibido una carta del tarot.
Portuguese (Brazil): ... uma carta de tarô recebida em troca.

description: The gamble beast statue talking about wanting gold
English: <shake> The statue of the beast desires gold. </shake>
Japanese: <shake>獣の石像は黄金を欲している。</shake>
French: <shake> La statue bestiale réclame de l'or. </shake>
German: <shake> Die Statue der Bestie begehrt Gold. </shake>
Spanish: <shake>La estatua de la bestia desea oro.</shake>
Portuguese (Brazil): <shake> A estátua da besta deseja ouro. </shake>

description: The result of giving up cold for a reward. This specific result is triggered when the player steals all the gold in the tile first before gambling
English: ... the given gold was stolen, the statue is <color=red> ANGRY. </color>
Japanese: …捧げられた黄金が盗まれ、石像は<color=red>怒っている。</color>
Russian: Отданные монеты были украдены, изваяние <color=red>впало в ярость</color>.
French: ... L'or offert a été volé. La statue est <color=red>FURIEUSE.</color>
German: ... das abgegebene Gold wurde gestohlen, die Statue ist <color=red>WÜTEND</color>.
Spanish: El oro ha sido robado, la estatua está <color=red>ENFADADA</color>.
Portuguese (Brazil): ... o ouro fornecido foi roubado, e a estátua está <color=red>FURIOSA.</color>
Chinese (Simplified): ……奉上的黄金遭窃，雕像<color=red>发怒了。</color>
Chinese (Traditional): ……奉上的黃金遭竊，雕像<color=red>發怒了。</color>
Korean: ... 황금이 모두 도둑질 당했으며, 조각상은 <color=red> 화가 났습니다. </color>
PolskI: ... dane złoto zostało skradzione, posąg jest <color=red> ZŁY. </color>

description: The result of giving gold
English: ... the statue of the beast gives {0}
Japanese: …獣の石像は {0} を授けた。
German: ... die Statue der Bestie gibt dir Folgendes: {0}
Spanish: La estatua de la bestia te ofrece: {0}.

description: The result of giving gold
English: ... the statue rewards an abundance of <color=#FFD201>food.
Japanese: …獣の石像は大量の<color=#FFD201>食料</color>を授けた。
French: ... La statue bestiale vous offre une abondance de <color=#FFD201>nourriture</color>.
German: ... die Statue gewährt dir einen Überfluss an <color=#FFD201>Nahrung</color>.
Spanish: La estatua te recompensa con una gran cantidad de <color=#FFD201>comida</color>.

description: The result of giving gold
English: ... the statue rewards a <color=red>Heart of the Heretics
Japanese: …獣の石像は<color=red>異端者の心臓</color>を授けた。
French: ... La statue bestiale vous offre un <color=red>cœur d'hérétique</color>.
German: ... die Statue gewährt dir ein <color=red>Herz des Ketzers</color>.
Spanish: La estatua te recompensa con un <color=red>corazón de hereje</color>.
Portuguese (Brazil): ... a estátua provê um <color=red>Coração de Herege.</color>
Chinese (Simplified): ……雕像的奖励是一颗<color=red>异教徒之心
Chinese (Traditional): ……雕像的獎勵是一顆<color=red>異教徒之心

description: The result of giving gold
English: ... the statue rewards a rare <color=#FFD201>Follower skin.
Japanese: …獣の石像はレアな<color=#FFD201>信者スキン</color>を授けた。
French: ... La statue bestiale vous offre une <color=#FFD201>apparence rare d'adepte</color>.
German: ... die Statue gewährt dir eine seltene <color=#FFD201>Anhänger-Skin</color>.
Spanish: La estatua te recompensa con una <color=#FFD201>forma de adepto rara</color>.
Portuguese (Brazil): ... a estátua provê um <color=#FFD201>visual de Seguidor</color> raro.
Chinese (Simplified): ……雕像的奖励是稀有的<color=#FFD201>教徒皮肤。
Chinese (Traditional): ……雕像的獎勵是稀有的<color=#FFD201>教徒外觀。

description: The result of giving gold
Japanese: …獣の石像は<color=#FFD201>生命力</color>を授けた。
French: ... La statue bestiale vous offre de la <color=#FFD201>vie</color>.

description: Flip a decoration to face the opposite direction
Japanese: 装飾品の反転

description: A well that you throw coins into for good luck used as a bank, in the location Midas's Cave
Japanese: ミダスの井戸

description: Withdrawing funds from a bank account
Japanese: 引き出す

description: Depositing funds into a bank account
Japanese: 預ける

description: Deposit gold amount to bank
Japanese: {0} 枚預けますか？

description: When a follower has upgraded you can interact with them to receive a reward
Japanese: 忠誠なる報酬を受け取る

description: When you return to the follower who gave you a quest to complete it
Japanese: クエストを完了する

description: Used in quests get x meals
Japanese: 料理

description: This is when you are able to speak to a follower. The format is "Speak to [Follower Name]" - the followers name will be added in code. So we just need the translation for "speak to..."
Japanese: 話す：

description: When unlocking a locked door
Japanese: カギを開ける

description: When rescuing a new follower
Japanese: 助ける

description: When going through a door or a portal to the next area of the game
Japanese: 先に進む

description: When you interact with a broken object so that you can repair it
Japanese: 修理する

description: When you try to leave the base but you haven't indoctrinated your new followers yet this warning shows
Japanese: 教団を後にする前に信者を教化しよう
French: Enrôlez les recrues avant de partir.
Spanish: Adoctrinar nuevos adeptos antes de irte
Portuguese (Brazil): Doutrine Novos Seguidores antes de Sair
Chinese (Simplified): 离开前请先教化新追随者
Chinese (Traditional): 離開前請先灌輸信仰給新追隨者

description: If you deposit money into the midas well, it will be proccessed for 3 days than you can collect your reward. This text explains the reward you get
English: The <color=#FFD201>Gods of Gold</color> have rejected your offering...
Japanese: <color=#FFD201>黄金の神々</color>はあなたの捧げものを拒んだようだ…
French: Les <color=#FFD201>Dieux de l'opulence</color> ont refusé votre offrande...
German: Die <color=#FFD201>Götter der Goldmünzen</color> haben dein Opfer abgelehnt …
Spanish: Los <color=#FFD201>Dioses del Oro</color> han rechazado tu ofrenda...
Portuguese (Brazil): Os <color=#FFD201>Deuses do Ouro</color> rejeitaram sua oferenda...

description: If you deposit money into the midas well, it will be proccessed for 3 days than you can collect your reward. This text explains the reward you get

Portuguese (Brazil): Os <color=#FFD201>Deuses do Ouro</color> estão alegres com a sua oferenda...

Chinese (Traditional): <color=#FFD201>黃金眾神</color>對你的供品感到滿意……

description: Explains what kind of demon the follower will turn into and what the demon does
Japanese: オルクス

description: Explains what kind of demon the follower will turn into and what the demon does
English: Melee attacks closest enemy every few seconds.
Japanese: 数秒ごとに近くの敵に近接攻撃をする
Russian: Наносит ближайшему врагу удар каждые несколько секунд.
French: Attaque au corps à corps l'ennemi le plus proche.
German: Greift den nächsten Gegner alle paar Sekunden mit Nahkampfangriffen an.
Spanish: Golpea con ataques cuerpo a cuerpo al enemigo más cercano durante unos segundos.
Portuguese (Brazil): Realiza ataques corpo a corpo periodicamente no inimigo mais próximo
Chinese (Simplified): 每隔几秒钟近战攻击最近的敌人
Chinese (Traditional): 每隔幾秒鐘近戰攻擊最近的敵人
Korean: 몇 초마다 가장 가까이 있는 적을 근접 공격합니다.
PolskI: Atakuje w zwarciu najbliższego wroga co kilka sekund.

description: Explains what kind of demon the follower will turn into and what the demon does
English:
Melee attacks closest enemy every few seconds.
Disciple Bonus: leaves enemy poisoned
Japanese:
数秒ごとに近くの敵に近接攻撃をする
忠誠度ボーナス： 敵を毒状態にする
Russian:
Наносит ближайшему врагу удар каждые несколько секунд.
Сила доверия: отравляет врага.
French:
Attaque au corps à corps l'ennemi le plus proche.
Bonus de disciple : empoisonne l'adversaire.
German:
Greift den nächsten Gegner alle paar Sekunden mit Nahkampfangriffen an.
Jüngerbonus: Gegner werden vergiftet.
Spanish:
Golpea con ataques cuerpo a cuerpo al enemigo más cercano durante unos segundos.
Bonus de adepto: envenena al enemigo.
Portuguese (Brazil):
Realiza ataques corpo a corpo periodicamente no inimigo mais próximo
Bônus de Discípulo: envenena o alvo
Chinese (Simplified):
每隔几秒钟近战攻击最近的敌人
门徒加成：使敌人中毒
Chinese (Traditional):
每隔幾秒鐘近戰攻擊最近的敵人
門徒加成：使敵人中毒
Korean:
몇 초마다 가장 가까이 있는 적을 근접 공격합니다
사도 보너스: 적을 중독 상태에 빠뜨립니다
PolskI:
Atakuje w zwarciu najbliższego wroga co kilka sekund.
Bonus ucznia: zatruwa wroga

description: Explains what kind of demon the follower will turn into and what the demon does
Japanese: ヴェスタ

description: Explains what kind of demon the follower will turn into and what the demon does
English: Shoots a projectile at an enemy every few seconds.
Japanese: 数秒ごとに敵に向かって遠距離攻撃を放つ
Russian: Стреляет во врагов каждые несколько секунд.
French: Tire un projectile vers l'ennemi le plus proche.
German: Schießt alle paar Sekunden Projektile auf einen Gegner.
Spanish: Dispara un proyectil a un enemigo cada varios segundos.
Portuguese (Brazil): Atira projéteis periodicamente em um inimigo
Chinese (Simplified): 每隔几秒钟朝一名敌人发射投射物
Chinese (Traditional): 每隔幾秒鐘朝一名敵人發射投射物
Korean: 몇 초마다 적을 향해 투사체를 발사합니다.
PolskI: Wystrzeliwuje pocisk wprost we wroga co kilka sekund.

description: Explains what kind of demon the follower will turn into and what the demon does
English:
Shoots a projectile at an enemy every few seconds.
Disciple Bonus: less time between shots.
Japanese:
数秒ごとに敵に向かって遠距離攻撃を放つ
忠誠度ボーナス： 攻撃頻度が上昇する
Russian:
Выпускает во врага снаряд каждые несколько секунд.
Сила доверия: стреляет быстрее.
French:
Tire un projectile vers l'ennemi le plus proche.
Bonus de disciple : diminution du temps de recharge des projectiles.
German:
Schießt alle paar Sekunden Projektile auf einen Gegner.
Jüngerbonus: Verkürzt Abstände zwischen den Schüssen.
Spanish:
Dispara un proyectil a un enemigo cada varios segundos.
Bonus de adepto: dispara con más frecuencia.
Portuguese (Brazil):
Atira projéteis periodicamente em um inimigo
Bônus de Discípulo: menos tempo entre tiros
Chinese (Simplified):
每隔几秒钟朝一名敌人发射投射物
门徒加成：发射间隔缩短
Chinese (Traditional):
每隔幾秒鐘朝一名敵人發射投射物
門徒加成：發射間隔縮短
Korean:
몇 초마다 적을 향해 투사체를 발사합니다
사도 보너스: 사격 준비시간이 감소합니다
PolskI:
Wystrzeliwuje pocisk we wroga co kilka sekund.
Bonus ucznia: krótszy czas między strzałami.

description: Explains what kind of demon the follower will turn into and what the demon does
Japanese: ウォセグス

description: Explains what kind of demon the follower will turn into and what the demon does
Japanese: ドロップした信力を自動で集める

description: Explains what kind of demon the follower will turn into and what the demon does
English:
Automatically collect dropped Fervour.
Disciple Bonus: gain additional 10% Fervour on pick up.
Japanese:
ドロップした信力を自動で集める
忠誠度ボーナス： 信力の獲得量が10%上昇する
Russian:
Собирает усердие.
Сила доверия: увеличивает собранное усердие на 10%.
French:
Récupère automatiquement la ferveur.
Bonus de disciple : augmente de 10 % la ferveur collectée.
German:
Sammelt hinterlassenen Eifer automatisch ein.
Jüngerbonus: Erhalte beim Einsammeln zusätzlich 10 % Eifer.
Spanish:
Recolecta el fervor automáticamente.
Bonus de adepto: gana un 10 % de fervor.
Portuguese (Brazil):
Coleta o fervor deixado automaticamente
Bônus de Discípulo: ganha 10% de fervor adicional ao coletar
Chinese (Simplified):
自动收集掉落的热诚
门徒加成：拾取时额外获得 10% 的热诚
Chinese (Traditional):
自動收集掉落的熱誠
門徒加成：拾取時額外獲得 10% 的熱誠
Korean:
자동으로 떨어진 열정을 수집합니다.
사도 보너스: 추가로 10%의 열정을 수집합니다
PolskI:
Automatycznie zbiera upuszczoną Żarliwość.
Bonus ucznia: dodatkowe 10% Żarliwości przy zbieraniu.

description: Explains what kind of demon the follower will turn into and what the demon does
Japanese: ハトホル

description: Explains what kind of demon the follower will turn into and what the demon does
English: Flies away and returns with red hearts.
Japanese: 飛び去ってレッドハートを持ち帰ってくる
Russian: Улетает и возвращается с красными сердцами.
French: S'envole pour aller chercher des cœurs rouges.
German: Fliegt weg und kehrt mit roten Herzen zurück.
Spanish: Se va volando y vuelve con corazones rojos.
Portuguese (Brazil): Sai voando e retorna com corações vermelhos
Korean: 날아가서 붉은색 하트 하나를 가지고 돌아옵니다.
PolskI: Odlatuje i wraca z czerwonymi sercami.

description: Explains what kind of demon the follower will turn into and what the demon does
English:
Flies away and returns with red hearts.
Disciple Bonus: chance of dropping blue hearts.
Japanese:
飛び去ってレッドハートを持ち帰ってくる
忠誠度ボーナス： 一定確率でブルーハートをドロップする
Russian:
Улетает и возвращается с красными сердцами.
Сила доверия: может принести голубые сердца.
French:
S'envole pour aller chercher des cœurs rouges.
Bonus de disciple : a une chance d'octroyer des cœurs bleus.
German:
Fliegt weg und kehrt mit roten Herzen zurück.
Jüngerbonus: Chance auf blaue Herzen.
Spanish:
Se va volando y vuelve con corazones rojos.
Bonus de adepto: probabilidad de encontrar corazones azules.
Portuguese (Brazil):
Sai voando e retorna com corações vermelhos
Bônus de Discípulo: chance de trazer corações azuis
Chinese (Simplified):
飞行离去后带回红心
门徒加成：有一定机率掉落蓝心
Chinese (Traditional):
飛行離去後帶回紅心
門徒加成：有一定機率掉落藍心
Korean:
날아가서 붉은색 하트 하나를 가지고 돌아옵니다.
사도 보너스: 일정 확률로 파란색 하트를 떨어뜨립니다
PolskI:
Odlatuje i wraca z czerwonymi sercami.
Bonus ucznia: szansa na upuszczenie niebieskich serc.

description: Explains what kind of demon the follower will turn into and what the demon does
Japanese: ピアン

description: Explains what kind of demon the follower will turn into and what the demon does
English: Start your next crusade with half a spirit heart.
Japanese: 聖戦開始時にスピリットハートを半分得る
Russian: Даёт половину эфемерного сердца перед походом.
French: Vous octroie un demi-cœur spirituel au début du donjon.
German: Beginne deinen nächsten Kreuzzug mit einem halben Geisterherz.
Spanish: Comienza tu próxima cruzada con medio corazón fantasma.
Portuguese (Brazil): Inicia sua próxima cruzada com meio coração espiritual
Chinese (Simplified): 下一场圣战开始时拥有半颗灵心
Chinese (Traditional): 下一場聖戰開始時擁有半顆靈心
Korean: 다음 성전을 영혼 하트 반 개를 가지고 시작합니다.
PolskI: Rozpocznij kolejną krucjatę z połową serca ducha.

description: Explains what kind of demon the follower will turn into and what the demon does
English:
Start your crusade run with half a spirit heart.
Disciple Bonus: start with a full spirit heart instead.
Japanese:
聖戦開始時にスピリットハートを半分得る
忠誠度ボーナス： 獲得量が半分ではなく1個になる
Russian:
Даёт половину эфемерного сердца перед походом.
Сила доверия: даёт целое эфемерное сердце перед походом.
French:
Vous octroie un demi-cœur spirituel au début du donjon.
Bonus de disciple : le demi-cœur est remplacé par un véritable cœur spirituel.
German:
Beginne deinen nächsten Kreuzzug mit einem halben Geisterherz.
Jüngerbonus: Beginne stattdessen mit einem ganzen Geisterherz.
Spanish:
Comienza tu próxima cruzada con medio corazón fantasma.
Bonus de adepto: comienza con un corazón fantasma completo.
Portuguese (Brazil):
Inicia sua próxima cruzada com meio coração espiritual
Bônus de Discípulo: inicia com um coração espiritual inteiro
Chinese (Simplified):
圣战开始时拥有半颗灵心
门徒加成：开始时改为拥有一颗灵心
Chinese (Traditional):
聖戰開始時擁有半顆靈心
門徒加成：開始時改為擁有一顆靈心
Korean:
다음 성전을 영혼 하트 반 개를 가지고 시작합니다.
사도 보너스: 대신 영혼 하트 1개를 가지고 시작합니다
PolskI:
Rozpocznij krucjatę z połową serca ducha.
Bonus ucznia: rozpocznij z pełnym sercem ducha.

description: Explains what kind of demon the follower will turn into and what the demon does
Japanese: フォルナクス

description: Explains what kind of demon the follower will turn into and what the demon does
English: Targets a random enemy and explodes near them.
Japanese: ランダムな敵の近くで爆破を起こす
Russian: Подлетает к случайному врагу и взрывается рядом с ним.
French: Cible un ennemi aléatoire et explose à côté de lui.
German: Visiert einen zufälligen Gegner an und explodiert in seiner Nähe.
Spanish: Se fija en un enemigo al azar y explota cerca de él.
Portuguese (Brazil): Escolhe um inimigo aleatório e explode próximo a ele
Chinese (Simplified): 随机锁定一名敌人后在目标附近爆炸
Chinese (Traditional): 隨機鎖定一名敵人後在目標附近爆炸
Korean: 무작위 적을 지정하고 그 주변에서 폭발합니다.
PolskI: Celuje w losowego wroga i wybucha w jego pobliżu.

description: Explains what kind of demon the follower will turn into and what the demon does
English:
Targets a random enemy and explodes near them.
Disciple Bonus: deals more explosion damage.
Japanese:
ランダムな敵の近くで爆破を起こす
忠誠度ボーナス： 爆破ダメージが上昇する
Russian:
Подлетает к случайному врагу и взрывается рядом с ним.
Сила доверия: наносит больше урона.
French:
Cible un ennemi aléatoire et explose à côté de lui.
Bonus de disciple : augmentation des dégâts provoqués par l'explosion.
German:
Visiert einen zufälligen Gegner an und explodiert in seiner Nähe.
Jüngerbonus: Verursacht höheren Explosionsschaden.
Spanish:
Se fija en un enemigo al azar y explota cerca de él.
Bonus de adepto: inflige más daño de explosión.
Portuguese (Brazil):
Escolhe um inimigo aleatório e explode próximo a ele
Bônus de Discípulo: a explosão causa mais dano
Chinese (Simplified):
随机锁定一名敌人后在目标附近爆炸
门徒加成：增加造成的爆炸伤害值
Chinese (Traditional):
隨機鎖定一名敵人後在目標附近爆炸
門徒加成：增加造成的爆炸傷害值
Korean:
무작위 적을 지정하고 그 주변에서 폭발합니다.
사도 보너스: 가하는 폭발 피해량이 증가합니다
PolskI:
Celuje w losowego wroga i wybucha w jego pobliżu.
Bonus dla ucznia: zadaje większe obrażenia od wybuchu.

description: When buying followers from the spider shop seller, sometimes the follower will be old, ill or faithful. Title would read "Buy old (FollowerName)"
Japanese: 高齢の

description: When buying followers from the spider shop seller, sometimes the follower will be old, ill or faithful. Title would read "Buy Sick (FollowerName)"
Japanese: 病気の

description: When buying followers from the spider shop seller, sometimes the follower will be old, ill or faithful. Title would read "Buy Faithful (FollowerName)"
Japanese: 誠実な

description: When sneaking up on a small animal, you can catch them for some meat
Japanese: 捕まえる

description: Interaction label for buying seeds from the seed shop
Japanese: 種屋

description: A bell you can ring which makes all the followers come eat food
Japanese: ディナーベル

description: Used for re-assigning a bed to someone else when you already have someone in it
Japanese: 割り振り直す

description: Used for assigning a bed to someone when it has no one assigned to it
Japanese: 割り振る

description: Shows who lives at a bed
Japanese: <color=yellow>{0}</color> のベッド

description: Shown when a bed is unoccupied i.e no one is sleeping in it
Japanese: 使用者なし

description: When you have a weapon or curse you can 'recycle it' to get gold
Japanese: リサイクル

description: When you find a challenge room - you can accept the challenge to fight certain number of enemies for a reward
Japanese: 試練

description: When you come across a shrine and you can steal it's devotion
Japanese: 祈念を盗む

description: When something will be coming soon. In this case it is a new dungeon that will be added when the game has an update
Japanese: 今後実装予定！

description: Used as interaction for player to read text
Japanese: 読む

description:
Indicator
  If a meal is burnt this will show to clean it up
Japanese: 焦げた料理を掃除する

description: This shows as an option when you are placing a building if you want to flip it
Japanese: 反転

description: Displays the benefits of an upgraded collector demon
Japanese: ハートドロップ強化

description: Displays the benefits of an upgraded projectile demon
Japanese: 射撃クールダウン短縮
German: Die Abklingzeit von Projektilen verringert sich.

description: Displays the benefits of an upgraded Chomper demon
Japanese: 与ダメージ増加

description: Displays the benefits of an upgraded Exploder demon
Japanese: 爆発ダメージ増加

description: Displays the benefits of an upgraded Spirit demon
Japanese: 初期ハート増加
German: Die anfängliche Anzahl von Herzen erhöht sich.

description: Displays the benefits of an upgraded Arrows demon
Japanese: 信力獲得量増加

description: Make a choice
Japanese: 選ぶ

description: Shown when choosing a building to upgrade "Upgrade Bed"
Japanese: <color=yellow>{0}</color> にアップグレード

description:
Indicator 
  Showing you to place a path down in building mode
Japanese: 道を設置

description:
Indicator 
  Shown for when you are done placing paths
Japanese: 決定

description:
Indicator 
  Shown in front of the massive monster shrine to pray at it
Japanese: 祈る

description: When you pray at the red crown shrine this convo will appear saying your possessions are safe on death
English: Your possessions will follow you through death...
Japanese: 持ち物は死後も、あなたに忠誠を誓い続けるだろう…
Russian: Ваши вещи останутся с вами даже после смерти…
French: Vos possessions vous suivront jusque dans l'au-delà...
German: Deine Besitztümer werden dich über den Tod hinaus begleiten …
Spanish: Tus posesiones te acompañarán en la muerte...
Portuguese (Brazil): Suas posses te acompanharão depois da morte...
Chinese (Simplified): 你死后持有物亦将不离身……
Chinese (Traditional): 你死後持有物亦將不離身……
Korean: 당신의 소유물은 죽고 난 후에도 당신과 함께합니다...
PolskI: Twoje rzeczy pójdą za tobą przez śmierć...

description: This is an action for the player to hug someon
Japanese: ハグする

description: spin the reward wheel
Japanese: 回す

description: clam the reward
Japanese: 受け取る

description:
Big Notification 
  When holiday ritual is over
Japanese: 休日が終了した。
French: La fête sainte a pris fin.

description:
Big Notification 
  when follower is waiting to be indoctrinateed at base
Japanese: 教化を待つ信者あり
Spanish: El adepto espera a ser adoctrinado.

description:
Big Notification 
  when youve got a new divine inspiration point which you can use to unlock new buildings
Japanese: 神聖なる啓示が満たされた

description:
Big Notification 
  Completed Follower quest
Japanese: クエストを完了した。

description: Displayed when the fire pit dance has began
Japanese: 大篝火を囲んだ踊りが開始した。
French: Le feu de joie a commencé.

description:
Big Notification 
  Displayed when the feast table has began
Japanese: 宴が開始した。

description:
Big Notification 
  If you fail a quest this is shwn
Japanese: クエストに失敗した。

description: when a folloower has eaten some rotten food which can make them ill
Japanese: が腐った料理を食べた！
French: a mangé de la nourriture pourrie !
Spanish: ha comido algo en mal estado.

description: Usage will be "Follower Name"is dissenting against your faith and spreading falsehoods. <- Stopped dissenting as above
English: is dissenting against your faith and spreading falsehoods.
Japanese: が教団に離反し、ホラ話を言いふらし始めた。
Russian: впадает в инакомыслие и распространяет лживые слухи
French: se rebelle et répand des mensonges sur vous.
German: hat sich von deinem Glauben abgekehrt und verbreitet Unwahrheiten.
Spanish: ha disentido y está divulgando mentiras.
Portuguese (Brazil): está se rebelando contra a sua fé e espalhando mentiras.
Chinese (Simplified): 正在反对你的信仰并散播谎言。
Chinese (Traditional): 正在反對你的信仰並散播謊言。
Korean: 추종자가 당신과 대립하며 거짓된 복음을 전파하고 있습니다.
PolskI: sprzeciwia się twojej wierze i szerzy fałszywe informacje.

description: When a follower becomes sick, and will die soon if not treated
English: has become gravely ill and will die in a few days if not rested.
Japanese: が重い病気にかかった。休ませなければ数日のうちに死ぬだろう。
Russian: тяжело заболевает и нуждается в отдыхе, чтобы не умереть
French: est gravement malade et a besoin de repos de toute urgence pour survivre.
German: ist schwer erkrankt und wird ohne Bettruhe in wenigen Tagen sterben.
Spanish: ha enfermado gravemente y morirá en unos días si no descansa.
Portuguese (Brazil): ficou gravemente doente e morrerá em poucos dias se não descansar.
Chinese (Simplified): 生重病了，不休养的话几天之内将死亡。
Chinese (Traditional): 生重病了，不休養的話幾天之內將死亡。
Korean: 추종자가 점점 몸이 좋지 않아 휴식하지 않으면 며칠 내로 사망할 것입니다.
PolskI: zachorował. Pogorszy się i umrze w przeciągu kilku dni, jeśli nie zostanie mu zapewniony odpoczynek.

description: When your Follower becomes old.
Japanese: が年を取り高齢者となった。

description: When a follower becomes sick
English: has become ill. They will deteriorate if not allowed rest.
Japanese: が病気になった。休ませなければ病状は悪化するだろう。
Russian: заболевает и нуждается в отдыхе, чтобы не заболеть сильнее
French: est malade et a besoin de repos.
German: ist erkrankt. Ohne Bettruhe wird sich der Zustand verschlimmern.
Spanish: ha enfermado. Empeorará si no descansa.
Portuguese (Brazil): ficou doente e definhará se não puder descansar.
Chinese (Simplified): 生病了，不获准休养的话几天之内将恶化。
Chinese (Traditional): 生病了，不獲准休養的話幾天之內將惡化。
Korean: 추종자가 병에 걸렸습니다. 휴식을 취하지 않으면 악화될 것입니다.
PolskI: zachorował. Jego stan będzie się pogarszał, jeśli nie zapewnisz mu odpoczynku.

description: Usage will be "Follower Name" has died
Japanese: が死んだ。

description: Usage will be "Follower Name" has become more devout <- meaning they are more invested & loyal in the Cult now
Japanese: が病気で死んだ。

description: When your Follower dies of old age
Japanese: が寿命で死んだ。

description: Usage will be "Follower Name" has starved to death
Japanese: が餓死した。

description: Played when food has become rotten
English: A meal has become rotten. Build a <color=#FFD201>Food Container</color> to prevent this.
Japanese: 料理が腐った。<color=#FFD201>食料保管庫</color>を建設して料理の腐敗を防ごう。
Russian: Пища протухла (чтобы избежать этого, постройте <color=#FFD201>склад продовольствия</color>)
French: Un plat a pourri. Construisez une <color=#FFD201>réserve de nourriture</color> pour que cela ne se reproduise plus.
German: Eine Mahlzeit ist vergammelt. Baue ein <color=#FFD201>Lebensmittellager</color>, um das zu vermeiden.
Spanish: Un plato se ha puesto malo. Construye un <color=#FFD201>contenedor de comida</color> para evitar que esto ocurra.
Portuguese (Brazil): Uma refeição estragou. Construa um <color=#FFD201>Depósito de Alimentos</color> para impedir isso.
Chinese (Simplified): 有份餐点腐烂了。建造<color=#FFD201>食物储藏容器</color>以避免食物腐坏。
Chinese (Traditional): 有份餐點腐爛了。建造<color=#FFD201>食物儲藏容器</color>以避免食物腐壞。
Korean: 음식이 썩었습니다. 음식이 썩는 것을 막기 위해 <color=#FFD201>음식 보관소</color>를 건설하세요.
PolskI: Posiłek się zepsuł. Zbuduj <color=#FFD201>Pojemnik na jedzenie</color>, aby temu zapobiec.

description: A Follower was killed during a fight pit ritual. Usage will be "Follower Name" was killed in a fight pit.
English: was killed during a Fight Pit Ritual.
Japanese: が死闘の儀式中に殺された。
Spanish: ha muerto en un ritual de la fogata.
Portuguese (Brazil): morreu durante um Ritual de Luta.
Chinese (Simplified): 在决斗场仪式中被杀了。
Chinese (Traditional): 在決鬥場儀式中被殺了。

description: When your Cult's faith is too low for them to put money in the donation box after a sermon
English: Your Cult's Faith is too low for a donation.
Japanese: 教団の信仰レベルが低いため集金できなかった。
Russian: Уровень веры слишком низок для внесения пожертвований
French: La foi de votre culte est trop basse pour recevoir des dons.
German: Der Glaube deines Kults ist zu niedrig für eine Spende.
Spanish: La fe de tu secta está demasiado baja para una donación.
Portuguese (Brazil): A Fé em seu Culto está muito baixa para receber doações.
Chinese (Simplified): 教会的信仰值过低，无法捐献。
Chinese (Traditional): 教會的信仰值過低，無法捐獻。
Korean: 기부하기에 당신의 교단의 신앙이 너무 낮습니다.
PolskI: Wiara twojego Kultu jest zbyt niska, aby złożyć ofiarę.

description: When a follower is no longer ill
Japanese: の病気が治った。

description: When a follower is no longer starving
Japanese: は腹を満たした。
Spanish: ya no se muere de hambre.
Portuguese (Brazil): não está mais morrendo de fome.

description: Follower Name 1 and "Follower Name 2" have become enemies
Japanese: の関係が敵になった。

description: Follower Name 1 and "Follower Name 2" have become friends
Japanese: の関係が友達になった。

description: Follower Name 1 and "Follower Name 2" have fallen in love!
Japanese: が恋愛関係になった！

description: Follower Name 1 was killed during a fight by "Follower Name 2"
English: was killed during a fight by
Japanese: が戦闘で殺された。殺した信者：
French: nous a quittés lors d'un combat contre
German: wurde in einem Kampf getötet von
Spanish: ha muerto en una pelea a manos de

description: Usage will be "Follower Name" is starving
Japanese: は腹を空かせている。
French: est en train de mourir de faim.

description: Used for above "Follower 1" and "Follower 2" have become friends etc,
Japanese: と

description: Your Followers have lost respect for you.
English: Your Followers have lost respect for you.
Japanese: 信者があなたへの敬意を失った。
Russian: Ваши последователи потеряли уважение к вам
French: Vos adeptes ne vous respectent plus.
German: Deine Anhänger haben den Respekt vor dir verloren.
Spanish: Tus adeptos te han perdido el respeto.
Portuguese (Brazil): Seus Seguidores perderam respeito por você.
Chinese (Simplified): 教徒失去了对你的尊敬。
Chinese (Traditional): 教徒失去了對你的尊敬。
Korean: 당신의 추종자들이 당신에 대한 경의를 잃었습니다.
PolskI: Twoi wyznawcy stracili do ciebie szacunek.

description: Displayed when a Follower is converted to a demon
English: has been converted to a demon.
Japanese: が悪魔に変身した。
French: a subi une transformation en démon.
Spanish: se ha convertido en un demonio.

description: Displayed when a Follower is preserved from a demon
Japanese: が悪魔から元に戻った。
Spanish: ha dejado de ser un demonio.

description: Displayed when player has assigned faith enforcer through ritual
English: has been assigned as Loyalty Enforcer.
Japanese: が信仰監視係に任命された。
French: a reçu le rôle de Garde de la foi.
Spanish: ostenta el cargo de custodio de la fe.

description: Displayed when player has assigned tax enforcer through ritual
English: has been assigned as Tax Enforcer.
Japanese: が寄付徴収係に任命された。
French: a reçu le rôle de Garde des dons.
Spanish: ostenta el cargo de recaudador de impuestos.

description:
Displayed when a Follower has been 
  sacrificed outside of the Cult 
  (for example in key room in dungeon
  with Ratoo)
Japanese: が生贄にささげられた。

description: A notification that you can now perform a ritual to upgrade yourself
English: Faith of the Flock Ritual Ready
Japanese: 信者の集い 実行可能
Russian: Всё готово к проведению ритуала «Вера паствы»
French: Rituel de l'Âme du troupeau disponible
Spanish: El ritual Fe del rebaño está listo.
Portuguese (Brazil): Ritual de Fé do Rebanho Pronto
Chinese (Simplified): 众教信仰仪式准备完成
Chinese (Traditional): 徒眾信仰儀式準備完成

description: A notification that you have given a sermon to your followers
Japanese: あなたが説教を行った。

description: A notification that your followers are waiting for your next sermon
English: Your Followers await your daily Sermon.
Japanese: 信者が今日の説教を待っている。
French: Vos adeptes attendent votre sermon quotidien.
German: Deine Anhänger warten auf deine tägliche Predigt.
Spanish: Tus seguidores aguardan tu sermón diario.
Portuguese (Brazil): Seus Seguidores aguardam seu Sermão diário
Chinese (Simplified): 教徒正在等待你每天例行布道
Chinese (Traditional): 教徒正在等待你每天例行講道
PolskI: Twoi wyznawcy czekają na twoje codzienne kazanie.

description: A notification that a folower has died. {0} is where their name will dispay
Japanese: {0} が死んだ。

description: A notification that a folower has died, but your followers believe in the after life so are not as sad. {0} is where their name will dispay
English: {0} has died. <color=#FFD201> Belief in Afterlife Trait.</color>
Japanese: {0} が死んだ。<color=#FFD201>（特性「来世信奉者」）</color>
Russian: {0} умирает, но ваша паства верит в загробную жизнь
French: {0} nous a quittés mais votre culte croit en la réincarnation.
German: {0} ist gestorben, aber dein Kult glaubt an ein Leben im Jenseits.
Spanish: {0} ha muerto, pero tu secta cree en la vida más allá de la muerte.
Portuguese (Brazil): {0} morreu, mas seu Culto acredita no pós-vida.
Chinese (Simplified): {0}死亡了，但你的教会相信有死后世界。
Chinese (Traditional): {0}死亡了，但你的教會相信有死後世界。

description: A notification that you have buried a dead follower.
Japanese: {0} が埋葬された。
Spanish: El cuerpo de {0} ha sido enterrado.

description: A notification that you have murdered one of your followers in broad daylight with in sight of everyone else.
Japanese: {0} を真っ昼間に殺した。
Russian: {0} гибнет от ваших рук у всех на виду
French: Vous avez tué {0} en pleine journée.
German: Du hast {0} am helllichten Tag ermordet.
Spanish: Has matado a {0} a plena luz del día.
Portuguese (Brazil): Você matou {0} em plena luz do dia.

description: A notification that you have murdered at night where there are no witnesses.
English: You murdered {0} at night. Less witnesses.
Japanese: {0} を夜中に殺した。目撃者は少ない。
Russian: {0} гибнет от ваших рук почти без свидетелей
French: Vous avez tué {0} durant la nuit. Moins de témoins.
German: Du hast {0} in der Nacht ermordet. Weniger Zeugen.
Spanish: Has matado a {0} durante la noche. Menos testigos.
Portuguese (Brazil): Você matou {0} à noite. Menos testemunhas.
Chinese (Simplified): 你夜间杀害了{0}，没有目击者。
Chinese (Traditional): 你夜間殺害了{0}，沒有目擊者。
Korean: 당신은 밤에 {0} 추종자를 죽였습니다. 아무도 보지 못했습니다.

description: A notification that you have sacrificed a follower.
English: You sacrificed {0}. Your Followers are uneasy about it.
Japanese: あなたは {0} を生贄に捧げた。信者は不安を感じているようだ。
Russian: {0} приносится в жертву, и вашим последователям это не нравится
French: Vous avez sacrifié {0}. Vos adeptes sont troublés.
German: Du hast {0} geopfert. Deine Anhänger sind deswegen beunruhigt.
Spanish: Has sacrificado a {0}. Tus adeptos están un poco inquietos.
Portuguese (Brazil): Você sacrificou {0}. Seus Seguidores estão preocupados.
Chinese (Simplified): 你献祭了{0}。你的教徒都对此感到不安。
Chinese (Traditional): 你獻祭了{0}。你的教徒都對此感到不安。
Korean: 당신은 {0} 추종자를 제물로 바쳤습니다. 당신의 추종자들이 이에 달가워하지 않습니다.
PolskI: Poświęciłeś {0}. Twoi wyznawcy są tym zaniepokojeni.

description: A notification that you have sacrificed a follower, they are happy because you have a belief in sacrifice trait
English: Your Followers rejoice the Sacrifice.<color=#FFD201> Belief in Sacrifice Trait.</color>
Japanese: 生贄に信者たちは喜んでいる。<color=#FFD201>（特性「生贄信奉者」）</color>
Russian: Ваши последователи радуются жертвоприношению (<color=#FFD201>особенность «Вера в жертвы»</color>)
French: Vos adeptes se réjouissent du sacrifice qui a eu lieu. Croyance <color=#FFD201>Don de soi</color>.
German: Deine Anhänger frohlocken über das Opfer.<color=#FFD201> Eigenschaft: Glaube ans Opfer</color>
Spanish: El sacrificio llena los corazones de tus adeptos de regocijo. <color=#FFD201>Rasgo Fe en el sacrificio</color>.
Portuguese (Brazil): Seus Seguidores celebram o Sacrifício.<color=#FFD201> Aspecto Crença no Sacrifício.</color>
Chinese (Simplified): 你的教徒为献祭欢欣鼓舞。<color=#FFD201>信仰献祭特质。</color>
Chinese (Traditional): 你的教徒為獻祭歡欣鼓舞。<color=#FFD201>獻祭信念特質。</color>
Korean: 추종자들이 번제에 기뻐합니다.<color=#FFD201> 번제 신앙 특성.</color>
PolskI: Twoi wyznawcy radują się z ofiary. <color=#FFD201>Cechą jest Wiara w Ofiarę.</color>

description: A notification that you have sacrificed a follower, they are upset because you have an against sacrifice trait
English: {0} is horrified that you sacrificed a Follower.<color=#FFD201> Against Sacrifice Trait.</color>
Japanese: あなたが信者を生贄にしたことで {0} は恐怖を感じている。<color=#FFD201>（特性「反生贄主義」）</color>
Russian: {0} в ужасе оттого, что вы принесли последователя в жертву (<color=#FFD201>особенность «Бесцельность жертв»</color>)
French: Vous avez scandalisé {0} en sacrifiant un adepte. Croyance <color=#FFD201>Clémence</color>.
German: {0} ist entsetzt, dass du einen Anhänger geopfert hast.<color=#FFD201> Eigenschaft: Gegen Opfer</color>
Spanish: {0} está en shock porque has sacrificado a un adepto. <color=#FFD201>Rasgo Oposición al sacrificio</color>.
Portuguese (Brazil): {0} se horrorizou ao ver que você sacrificou um Seguidor.<color=#FFD201> Aspecto Repúdio ao Sacrifício.</color>
Chinese (Simplified): {0}对你献祭教徒感到恐惧。<color=#FFD201>反对献祭特质。</color>
Chinese (Traditional): {0}對你獻祭教徒感到恐懼。<color=#FFD201>反對獻祭特質。</color>
Korean: {0} 추종자는 당신이 다른 추종자를 제물로 바쳤다는 것에 대해 겁에 질렸습니다. <color=#FFD201> 번제에 반대함 특성.</color>
PolskI: {0} jest przerażony, że poświęciłeś wyznawcę. <color=#FFD201>Cechą jest Przeciw Ofierze.</color>

description: A notification that you have butchered a dead follower and taken their meat
English: You butchered the meat of a Follower.
Japanese: あなたは信者の肉をはぎ取った。
Russian: Вы пустили тело последователя на мясо
Spanish: Has descuartizado el cadáver de un adepto.
Portuguese (Brazil): Você retirou a carne de um Seguidor.
Chinese (Simplified): 你肢解了一位教徒的肉身。
Chinese (Traditional): 你支解了一位教徒的肉。

description: A notification that you have imprisoned a follower who was not dissenting against you, and so was innocent
English: You imprisoned a loyal Follower who was not dissenting.
Japanese: あなたは離反していない忠実な信者を投獄した。
Russian: Вы заключили в тюрьму верного последователя, не впавшего в инакомыслие
French: Vous avez emprisonné un adepte fidèle et innocent.
German: Du hast einen loyalen Anhänger eingesperrt, der sich nicht abgekehrt hatte.
Spanish: Has encarcelado a un adepto fiel que no había disentido.
Portuguese (Brazil): Você aprisionou um Seguidor leal que não estava se rebelando.
Chinese (Simplified): 你囚禁了一位并未反教的忠诚教徒。
Chinese (Traditional): 你囚禁了一位並未反教的忠誠教徒。
Korean: 당신과 반대하지 않는 충성스러운 추종자를 감옥에 수감시켰습니다.
PolskI: Uwięziłeś wiernego wyznawcę, który nie buntował się.

description: A notification that you have a follower but you have the Original Sin trait which means you are above the law and folloers will not be upset
English: You imprisoned a loyal Follower, but you have the <color=#FFD201>Original Sin trait.</color>
Japanese: あなたは忠実な信者を投獄したが、<color=#FFD201>特性「原罪主義者」</color>がある
Russian: Вы заключили в тюрьму верного последователя, но у вас есть <color=#FFD201>особенность «Первородный грех»</color>
French: Vous avez emprisonné un adepte fidèle, mais vous avez la croyance <color=#FFD201>Péché originel</color>.
German: Du hast einen loyalen Anhänger eingesperrt, aber du hast die <color=#FFD201>Eigenschaft: Ursünde</color>.
Spanish: Has encarcelado a un adepto fiel, pero tienes el <color=#FFD201>rasgo Pecado original</color>.
Portuguese (Brazil): Você aprisionou um Seguidor leal, mas possui o <color=#FFD201>Aspecto Pecado Original.</color>
Chinese (Simplified): 你囚禁了一位忠诚教徒，但你有<color=#FFD201>原罪特质。</color>
Chinese (Traditional): 你囚禁了一位忠誠教徒，但你有<color=#FFD201>原罪特質。</color>
Korean: 당신은 충성스러운 추종자를 감옥에 수감시켰지만, 당신에게는 <color=#FFD201>원죄 특성</color>이 있습니다.
PolskI: Uwięziłeś wiernego wyznawcę, ale masz cechę <color=#FFD201>Grzech Pierworodny.</color>

description: A notification that a follower has come out of prison and is no longer dissenting against you
Japanese: {0} が離反をやめた。

description: A notification that you have built a new building
English: You have constructed a new building.
Japanese: 新しい建築物を作った。
French: Il y a une nouvelle construction à la base.
German: Du hast ein neues Gebäude gebaut.
Chinese (Simplified): 你建造了一座新建筑物。
Chinese (Traditional): 你建造了一座新建築物。

description: A notification that you have placed a decoration
English: You have constructed a new decoration.
Japanese: 新しい装飾品を作った。
French: Il y a une nouvelle décoration à la base.
German: Du hast eine neue Dekoration gebaut.

description: A notification that you have indoctrinated a new follower
English: You have a new Follower. Your flock grows...
Japanese: 新しい信者が加わり、教団が大きくなった。
French: Vous avez un nouvel adepte. Le troupeau s'agrandit...
German: Du hast einen neuen Anhänger. Deine Herde wächst …
Spanish: Tienes un nuevo adepto. Tu rebaño crece...
Portuguese (Brazil): Você tem novos Seguidores. Seu rebanho cresce...
Chinese (Simplified): 你多了一位新教徒。你的教众更加壮大……
Chinese (Traditional): 你多了一位新教徒。你的徒眾更加壯大……
Korean: 당신에게 새로운 추종자가 생겼습니다. 당신의 무리가 늘어납니다...
PolskI: Masz nowego wyznawcę. Twoje stado rośnie...

description: A notification that you do not have enough beds for your followers
English: There are not enough beds for all your Followers.
Japanese: 信者の数に対してベッドが不足している。
French: Il n'y a pas assez de lits pour tous vos adeptes.
German: Es gibt nicht genug Betten für alle deine Anhänger.
Spanish: No hay camas suficientes para todos tus adeptos.
Portuguese (Brazil): Não há camas suficientes para todos os seus Seguidores.
Chinese (Simplified): 床数不足，无法供所有教徒使用。
Chinese (Traditional): 床數不足，無法供所有教徒使用。
Korean: 모든 추종자들을 위한 침대가 충분하지 않습니다.

description: A notification that you have now built enough beds for your followers
English: You now have enough beds for your Followers.
Japanese: 信者全員が寝られる数のベッドがそろった。
French: Il y a maintenant assez de lits pour tous vos adeptes.
German: Du hast jetzt genug Betten für alle deine Anhänger.
Spanish: Ahora ya tienes suficientes camas para tus adeptos.
Portuguese (Brazil): Agora há camas suficientes para todos os seus Seguidores.
Chinese (Simplified): 你拥有的床数现在够所有教徒使用。
Chinese (Traditional): 你擁有的床數現在夠所有教徒使用。
PolskI: Masz już wystarczająco dużo łóżek dla wyznawców.

description: A notification that your followers are starving
Japanese: 信者が腹を空かせている！
Portuguese (Brazil): Seus Seguidores estão morrendo de fome!

description: A notification that your followers are no longer starving
English: Your Followers are no longer starving.
Japanese: 信者は腹を満たした。
Spanish: Tus adeptos ya no se mueren de hambre.
Portuguese (Brazil): Seus Seguidores não estão mais morrendo de fome.

description: A notification that a follower has eaten a meal made of grass
Japanese: {0} が雑草料理を食べた。
Spanish: {0} se ha comido un plato de hierba.

description: A notification that a follower has eaten a meal made of grass but they have a trait that means they like it
English: {0} ate a grass meal. <color=#FFD201>Grass Eater trait</color>
Japanese: {0} が雑草料理を食べた。<color=#FFD201>（特性「草食」）</color>
French: {0} qui a la croyance <color=#FFD201>Végétarisme</color> a mangé un plat d'herbes.
Spanish: {0} se ha comido un plato de hierba. <color=#FFD201>Rasgo Herbívoro</color>.
Portuguese (Brazil): {0} comeu uma refeição de mato. <color=#FFD201>Aspecto Pastoreio</color>

description: A notification that a follower has eaten a meal made from other follower's meat and is disgusted!
English: {0} ate a meal made of other Followers!
Japanese: {0} がほかの信者の肉から作られた料理を食べた！
Russian: {0} съедает блюдо, приготовленное из мяса других последователей
French: {0} a mangé un plat à base de chair d'adepte !
German: {0} hat eine Mahlzeit aus anderen Anhängern gegessen!
Spanish: ¡{0} se ha comido un plato hecho de otros adeptos!
Portuguese (Brazil): {0} comeu uma refeição feita de outros Seguidores!
Chinese (Simplified): {0}吃了其他教徒的肉制成的餐点！
Chinese (Traditional): {0}吃了其他教徒的肉製成的餐點！
Korean: {0} 추종자는 다른 추종자로 만든 음식을 먹었습니다!

description: A notification that a follower has eaten a meal made from other follower's meat but has the 'cannibal' trait and so liked it
English: {0} has the <color=#FFD201>Cannibal trait</color> and ate a meal made of other Followers!
Japanese: <color=#FFD201>特性「カニバリスト」</color>持ちの {0} がほかの信者の肉から作られた料理を食べた！
Russian: {0} съедает блюдо, приготовленное из мяса других последователей (особенность <color=#FFD201>«Каннибализм»</color>)
French: {0} qui a la croyance <color=#FFD201>Cannibalisme</color> a mangé un plat à base de chair d'adepte !
German: {0} hat die <color=#FFD201>Eigenschaft: Kannibale</color> und hat eine Mahlzeit aus anderen Anhängern gegessen!
Spanish: {0} tiene el <color=#FFD201>rasgo Caníbal</color> ¡y se ha comido un plato hecho de otros adeptos!
Portuguese (Brazil): {0} tem o <color=#FFD201>Aspecto Canibal</color> e comeu uma refeição feita de outros Seguidores!
Chinese (Simplified): {0}有<color=#FFD201>同类相食特质</color>并吃了其他教徒的肉制成的餐点！
Chinese (Traditional): {0}有<color=#FFD201>同類相食特質</color>並吃了其他教徒的肉製成的餐點！
Korean: {0} 추종자에게는 <color=#FFD201>식인 특성</color>이 있으며 다른 추종자로 만든 음식을 먹었습니다!
PolskI: {0} ma cechę <color=#FFD201>Kannibal</color> i zjadł posiłek z innych wyznawców!

description: A notification that a follower has eaten a great meal
Japanese: {0} が最上級料理を食べた
Spanish: {0} se ha comido un plato delicioso.

description: A notification that a follower ate a delicious fish meal
Japanese: {0} が上質な魚料理を食べた
French: {0} a mangé un succulent plat de poisson.
Spanish: {0} se ha comido un plato de pescado delicioso.
Portuguese (Brazil): {0} comeu uma refeição de Peixe deliciosa
Korean: {0} 추종자는 아주 맛있는 물고기 요리를 먹었습니다.

description: A notification that you have completed a quest
Japanese: クエストを完了した。

description: A notification that you have failed a quest
Japanese: クエストに失敗した。

description: A notification that you have recruited a follower who is naturally skeptical
Japanese: 新しい信者は<color=#FFD201>特性「懐疑主義者」</color>持ちだった。
French: La nouvelle recrue a la croyance <color=#FFD201>Scepticisme</color>.
German: Der Neuling hat die <color=#FFD201>Eigenschaft: Geborener Skeptiker</color>.
Spanish: El nuevo recluta tiene el <color=#FFD201>rasgo Escepticismo nato</color>.
Portuguese (Brazil): O novo Recruta tem o <color=#FFD201>Aspecto Cético por Natureza.</color>
Chinese (Simplified): 新入教者有<color=#FFD201>天性多疑特质。</color>
Chinese (Traditional): 新入教者有<color=#FFD201>天性多疑特質。</color>

description: A notification that you have recruited a follower who is naturally obedient
Japanese: 新しい信者は<color=#FFD201>特性「従順」</color>持ちだった。
French: La nouvelle recrue a la croyance <color=#FFD201>Obéissance</color>.
German: Der Neuling hat die <color=#FFD201>Eigenschaft: Natürlicher Gehorsam</color>.
Spanish: El nuevo recluta tiene el <color=#FFD201>rasgo Obediencia nata</color>.
Portuguese (Brazil): O novo Recruta tem o <color=#FFD201>Aspecto Obediente por Natureza.</color>
Chinese (Simplified): 新入教者有<color=#FFD201>天性服从特质。</color>
Chinese (Traditional): 新入教者有<color=#FFD201>天性服從特質。</color>

description: A notification that you declined a quest
Japanese: クエストを辞退した。

description: A notification that an elderly follower was killed but this follower hates old people so it's OK
English: An elderly Follower was killed. <color=#FFD201>Good Die Young Trait</color>
Japanese: 高齢の信者が殺された。<color=#FFD201>（特性「善人は若死にす」）</color>
Russian: Вы убили пожилого последователя (<color=#FFD201>особенность «Ненависть к старикам»</color>)
French: Un adepte âgé a été tué. Croyance <color=#FFD201>Nouvelle génération</color>.
German: Ein Ältester wurde getötet. <color=#FFD201>Eigenschaft: Die Guten sterben jung</color>
Spanish: Un anciano ha sido asesinado. <color=#FFD201>Rasgo Los buenos mueren jóvenes</color>.
Portuguese (Brazil): Um idoso foi morto. <color=#FFD201>Aspecto Os Bons Morrem Jovens</color>
Chinese (Simplified): 有年长教徒被杀了。<color=#FFD201>好人不长命特质</color>
Chinese (Traditional): 有年長教徒被殺了。<color=#FFD201>好人不長命特質</color>
Korean: 노인 추종자 하나가 살해당했습니다. <color=#FFD201>선한 자는 단명한다 특성</color>
PolskI: Starszy wyznawca zginął. <color=#FFD201>Cechą jest Dobrzy Umierają Młodo.</color>

description: A notification that an elderly follower died naturally but you have the 'hates old people' trait so it's OK
English: An elderly Follower died of natural causes. <color=#FFD201>Good Die Young Trait</color>
Japanese: 高齢の信者が寿命で死んだ。<color=#FFD201>（特性「善人は若死にす」）</color>
Russian: Последователь пожилого возраста умирает (<color=#FFD201>особенность «Ненависть к старикам»</color>)
French: Un adepte âgé est mort d'une cause naturelle. Croyance <color=#FFD201>Nouvelle génération</color>.
German: Ein Älterer ist an natürlichen Ursachen verstorben. <color=#FFD201>Eigenschaft: Die Guten sterben jung</color>
Spanish: Un anciano ha muerto por causas naturales. <color=#FFD201>Rasgo Los buenos mueren jóvenes</color>.
Portuguese (Brazil): Um idoso morreu de causas naturais. <color=#FFD201>Aspecto Os Bons Morrem Jovens</color>
Chinese (Simplified): 有年长教徒自然死亡了。<color=#FFD201>好人不长命特质</color>
Chinese (Traditional): 有年長教徒自然死亡了。<color=#FFD201>好人不長命特質</color>
Korean: 노인 추종자 하나가 자연사했습니다. <color=#FFD201>선한 자는 단명한다 특성</color>
PolskI: Starszy wyznawca zmarł z naturalnych przyczyn. <color=#FFD201>Cechą jest Dobrzy Umierają Młodo.</color>

description: A notification that a follower has reached old age which is good because you have the 'love elderly' trait
English: {0} has reached old age. <color=#FFD201>Respect Your Elders Trait</color>
Japanese: {0} が高齢者になった。<color=#FFD201>（特性「年上は敬うべし」）</color>
French: {0} a atteint la vieillesse. Croyance <color=#FFD201>Respect des aînés</color>.
German: {0} hat ein hohes Alter erreicht. <color=#FFD201>Eigenschaft: Respektiere deine Ältesten</color>
Spanish: {0} ha llegado a la vejez. <color=#FFD201>Rasgo Respeta a tus mayores</color>.
Portuguese (Brazil): {0} atingiu a velhice. <color=#FFD201>Aspecto Respeito aos Idosos</color>
PolskI: {0} osiągnął sędziwy wiek. <color=#FFD201>Cechą jest Szanuj Starszych.</color>

description: A notification that you performed the mushroom ritual and you have the 'substances encouraged trait'
English: Performed a Brainwashing Ritual for your Followers. <color=#FFD201>Substances Encouraged trait</color>
Japanese: 信者たちに洗脳の儀式を行った。<color=#FFD201>（特性「キノコ推奨論者」）</color>
Russian: Вы провели ритуал промывания мозгов (<color=#FFD201>особенность «Влечение к веществам»</color>)
French: Vous avez accompli un Rituel de lavage de cerveau. Croyance <color=#FFD201>Dépendance</color>.
German: Du hast ein Ritual der Gehirnwäsche für deine Anhänger durchgeführt. <color=#FFD201>Eigenschaft: Substanzen erlaubt</color>
Spanish: Has celebrado un ritual de lavado de cerebros para tus adeptos. <color=#FFD201>Rasgo Toxicología</color>.
Portuguese (Brazil): Realizou um Ritual de Lavagem Cerebral para seus Seguidores. <color=#FFD201>Aspecto Incentivo a Substâncias</color>
