Chinese (Traditional): {0}睡在生病的教徒旁邊後生病了。<color=#FFD201>懼怕細菌特質
Korean: {0} 추종자가 병든 추종자 옆에서 잠을 자서 병에 걸렸습니다. <color=#FFD201>결벽증 특성
PolskI: {0} zachorował śpiąc obok chorego wyznawcy. <color=#FFD201>Cechą jest Germofob

English: {0} became Ill sleeping next to an ill Follower. <color=#FFD201>Coprophiliac trait
Japanese: 病人の隣で寝ていたことで {0} が病気になった。<color=#FFD201>（特性「糞尿愛好症」）</color>
Russian: {0} заболевает после сна рядом с больным <color=#FFD201>(особенность «Копрофилия»)</color>
French: Dormir à côté d'un adepte malade a rendu {0} malade. Croyance <color=#FFD201>Dolorisme</color>.
German: {0} hat neben einem kranken Anhänger geschlafen und ist erkrankt. <color=#FFD201>Eigenschaft: Koprophil
Spanish: {0} ha enfermado por dormir cerca de un adepto enfermo. <color=#FFD201>Rasgo Coprofilia</color>.
Portuguese (Brazil): {0} adoeceu ao dormir perto de um seguidor doente. <color=#FFD201>Aspecto Coprofilia
Chinese (Simplified): {0}睡在生病的教徒旁边后生病了。<color=#FFD201>恋脏乱癖特质
Chinese (Traditional): {0}睡在生病的教徒旁邊後生病了。<color=#FFD201>戀髒亂癖特質
Korean: {0} 추종자가 병든 추종자 옆에서 잠을 자서 병에 걸렸습니다. <color=#FFD201>호분증 특성
PolskI: {0} zachorował śpiąc obok chorego wyznawcy. <color=#FFD201>Cechą jest Koprofila

English: You woke {0} up and disturbed their sleep for the night.
Japanese: 夜中に寝ていた {0} をあなたが起こした。
French: Vous avez interrompu le sommeil de {0}.
German: Du hast {0} geweckt und vom Schlafen abgehalten.
Spanish: Has despertado a {0} y has interrumpido su descanso.
Portuguese (Brazil): Você acordou {0} e perturbou o seu sono esta noite
Chinese (Simplified): 你吵醒了{0}，打扰了对方今晚休息
Chinese (Traditional): 你吵醒了{0}，打擾了對方今晚的睡眠
Korean: 당신은 {0} 추종자가 밤에 잠을 잘 때 깨웠습니다.
PolskI: Obudziłeś {0} i przeszkodziłeś mu spać przez noc.

Japanese: {0} が疲労状態になった。
{0} の疲労がなくなった。
French: {0} a profité d'un repos bien mérité.

English: You woke everyone and disturbed their sleep for the night.
Japanese: 夜中に寝ていた信者全員をあなたが起こした。
Russian: Все неохотно просыпаются по вашему требованию
French: Vous avez interrompu le sommeil de tous vos adeptes.
German: Du hast alle geweckt und vom Schlafen abgehalten.
Spanish: Has despertado a todos y has interrumpido su descanso.
Portuguese (Brazil): Você acordou a todos e perturbou o seu sono esta noite
Chinese (Simplified): 你吵醒了所有人，打扰了大家今晚的睡眠
Chinese (Traditional): 你吵醒了所有人，打擾了大家今晚的睡眠
Korean: 당신은 밤에 자는 모두를 깨워 잠을 방해했습니다.
PolskI: Obudziłeś wszystkich i przeszkodziłeś im spać przez noc.

English: Everyone is exhausted from being woken up during the night.
Japanese: 夜中に起こされたことで、信者は全員疲労状態だ。
Russian: Все чувствуют усталость после бессонной ночи
French: Vos adeptes sont épuisés car ils ont été réveillés dans la nuit.
German: Alle sind erschöpft, weil sie in der Nacht geweckt wurden.
Spanish: Todos están sin energías por haberse despertado por la noche.
Portuguese (Brazil): Todos estão com exaustão por serem acordados à noite
Chinese (Simplified): 所有人都因为夜里被吵醒而觉得疲惫
Chinese (Traditional): 所有人都因為夜裡被吵醒而覺得疲憊
PolskI: Wszyscy są wyczerpani z powodu przebudzenia w nocy.

English: Everyone has recovered from being exhausted.
Japanese: 信者の疲労状態がすべて解消した。
French: Vos adeptes ont profité d'un repos bien mérité.
German: Alle haben sich von der Erschöpfung erholt.
Chinese (Simplified): 所有人的疲惫感都消除了
Chinese (Traditional): 所有人的疲憊感都消除了

Japanese: {0} が過労で死んだ。
French: {0} a perdu connaissance à cause de la fatigue.

description: A follower has died from deadly meal. Where {0} is the followr name
English: {0} has died from eating a deadly meal.
Japanese: {0} がゲキマズ料理を食べたことで死んだ。
German: {0} ist durch eine tödliche Mahlzeit gestorben.
Spanish: {0} ha muerto por tomar un plato mortal.
Portuguese (Brazil): {0} morreu por comer uma refeição letal

description: When your Follower dies of old age
Japanese: {0} が寿命で死んだ。

description: When your Follower becomes old.
Japanese: {0} が高齢者になった。

description: When you go to a new location for the first time
Japanese: 新たな行き先を発見した。

description: When NPCs pledge themselves to you
English: More have pledged themselves to you.
Japanese: あなたに忠誠を誓う者が増えた。
French: Quelqu'un s'est engagé à vous suivre.
German: Es haben sich noch mehr zu dir bekannt.
Spanish: Más adeptos se han unido a tu causa.
Portuguese (Brazil): Mais pessoas juraram lealdade a você
Korean: 더 많은 이들이 당신에게 충성을 맹세했습니다.

description: When followers lose respect (from bowing to cult leaders)
Japanese: 信者たちがあなたへの尊敬を失った。
French: Vos adeptes ne vous respectent plus.
Spanish: Los adeptos te han perdido el respeto.

description: When the player dies in the dungeon
English: Your death has made your Followers think you are weak.
Japanese: あなたが死んだことで、信者たちはあなたに落胆したようだ。
French: Votre mort a fait naître le doute chez vos adeptes.
German: Dein Tod hat bei deinen Anhängern den Eindruck erweckt, dass du schwach bist.
Spanish: Tus adeptos piensan que eres débil porque te has muerto.
Portuguese (Brazil): Sua morte fez os Seguidores questionarem sua força
Chinese (Simplified): 你的死亡使教徒认为你软弱
Chinese (Traditional): 你的死亡使教徒認為你軟弱
Korean: 당신의 죽음으로 추종자들이 당신이 약하다고 생각합니다.
PolskI: Twoja śmierć sprawiła, że wyznawcy uważają cię za słabego.

description: When the player kills a mini boss
English: Followers are inspired by your successful crusade.
Japanese: あなたが聖戦を見事成し遂げたことで、信者たちは触発されたようだ。
French: Votre victoire dans un donjon inspire vos adeptes.
German: Die Anhänger sind von deinem erfolgreichen Kreuzzug inspiriert.
Spanish: Tus adeptos se sienten motivados por tu éxito en la cruzada.
Portuguese (Brazil): Os Seguidores ficaram inspirados com sua cruzada bem-sucedida
Chinese (Simplified): 你成功完成圣战激励了教徒
Chinese (Traditional): 你成功完成聖戰激勵了教徒
PolskI: Wyznawcy są zainspirowani twoją udaną krucjatą.

description: When the player kills a boss
English: Followers are inspired by your victory against a <color=#FFD201>Bishop! </color>
Japanese: あなたが<color=#FFD201>司教</color>に勝利したことで、信者たちは触発されたようだ！
French: Vous avez un vaincu un <color=#FFD201>Prélat</color> ! Vos adeptes sont impressionnés.
German: Die Anhänger sind von deinem Sieg gegen einen <color=#FFD201>Bischof</color> inspiriert!
Spanish: ¡Tus adeptos se sienten motivados por tu victoria contra un <color=#FFD201>obispo</color>!
Portuguese (Brazil): Os Seguidores ficaram inspirados com sua vitória contra um <color=#FFD201>Bispo! </color>
Chinese (Simplified): 你战胜<color=#FFD201>主教</color>激励了教徒！
Chinese (Traditional): 你戰勝<color=#FFD201>主教</color>激勵了教徒！
Korean: 추종자들이 <color=#FFD201>주교</color>를 목표로 한 당신의 성공적인 성전으로 감명받았습니다!
PolskI: Wyznawcy są zainspirowani twoim zwycięstwem nad <color=#FFD201>Biskupem!</color>

description: When a bed collapsed
Japanese: ベッドが壊れた。
French: Un lieu de repos est devenu inutilisable.

description: Shown when you unlock a new building, usually through when you buy a decoration at a shop or find one in the dungeon
English: You have unlocked a new building.
Japanese: 新しい建築物をアンロックした。
French: Vous avez débloqué une nouvelle construction.
German: Du hast ein neues Gebäude freigeschaltet.

description: A notification that you have built a new building
English: You have constructed a new building.
Japanese: 新しい建築物を建築した。
French: Il y a une nouvelle construction à la base.
German: Du hast ein neues Gebäude gebaut.
Chinese (Simplified): 你建造了一座新建筑物。
Chinese (Traditional): 你建造了一座新建築物。

description: Shown when you perform a fight pit ritual
Japanese: <color=#FFD201>死闘</color>の儀式を行った。
French: Vous avez accompli le <color=#FFD201>Rituel de l'arène</color>.
German: Du hast das Ritual der <color=#FFD201>Kampfgrube</color> durchgeführt.
Spanish: Has celebrado el ritual <color=#FFD201>foso de pelea</color>.

description: Shown when you loot the corpse of a follower
Japanese: あなたは死体を漁った。

description: Two followers have become enemies. Where {0} and {1} are the names of the followers.
Japanese: {0} と {1} が敵になった。

description: Two followers have become friends. Where {0} and {1} are the names of the followers
Japanese: {0} と {1} が友達になった。

description: Two followers have fallen in love. Where {0} and {1} are the names of the followers.
Japanese: {0} と {1} が恋愛関係になった。

description: A follower was killed in a fight. Where {0} is the follower that was killed and {1} was the killer.
English: {0} was killed during a fight by {1}
Japanese: {0} が {1} と戦って殺された。
French: {0} nous a quittés lors d'un combat contre {1}.
German: {0} wurde von {1} in einem Kampf getötet.
Spanish: {0} ha muerto en una pelea a manos de {1}.

description: A structure has started an effect where {0} is the type of effect
Japanese: 建築物効果： <color=yellow> {0} </color> が開始した！

description: A structure has ended an effect where {0} is the type of effect.
Japanese: 建築物効果： <color=yellow> {0} </color> が終了した！

description: when a folloower has eaten some rotten food which can make them ill. Where {0} is the name of the follower.
Japanese: {0} が腐った料理を食べた！
French: {0} a mangé de la nourriture pourrie !
Spanish: {0} ha comido algo en mal estado.

description: Follower is dissenting against your faith and spreading falsehoods. <- Stopped dissenting as above Where {0} is the name of the follower.
English: {0} is dissenting against your faith and spreading falsehoods.
Japanese: {0} が教団に離反し、ホラ話を言いふらし始めた。
Russian: {0} впадает в инакомыслие и распространяет лживые слухи
French: {0} se rebelle et répand des mensonges sur vous.
German: {0} hat sich von deinem Glauben abgekehrt und verbreitet Unwahrheiten.
Spanish: {0} ha disentido y está divulgando mentiras.
Portuguese (Brazil): {0} está se rebelando contra a sua fé e espalhando mentiras.
Chinese (Simplified): {0}正在反对你的信仰并散播谎言。
Chinese (Traditional): {0}正在反對你的信仰並散播謊言。
Korean: {0} 추종자가 당신과 대립하며 거짓된 복음을 전파하고 있습니다.
PolskI: {0} buntuje się przeciwko twojej wierze i szerzy fałszywe informacje.

description: When a follower becomes sick, and will die soon if not treated. Where {0} is the name of the follower.
English: {0} has become gravely ill and will die in a few days if not rested.
Japanese: {0} が重い病気にかかった。休ませなければ数日のうちに死ぬだろう。
Russian: {0} тяжело заболевает и нуждается в лечении, чтобы не умереть
French: {0} est gravement malade et a besoin de repos de toute urgence pour survivre.
German: {0} ist schwer erkrankt und wird ohne Bettruhe in wenigen Tagen sterben.
Spanish: {0} ha enfermado gravemente y morirá en unos días si no descansa.
Portuguese (Brazil): {0} ficou gravemente doente e morrerá em poucos dias se não descansar.
Chinese (Simplified): {0}生重病了，不休养的话几天之内将死亡。
Chinese (Traditional): {0}生重病了，不休養的話幾天之內將死亡。
Korean: {0} 추종자가 점점 몸이 좋지 않아 휴식하지 않으면 며칠 내로 사망할 것입니다.
PolskI: {0} poważnie zachorował i umrze za kilka dni, jeśli nie otrzyma odpoczynku.

description: When your Follower becomes old. Where {0} is the name of the follower.
Japanese: {0} が年を取り高齢者となった。

description: When a follower becomes sick. Where {0} is the name of the follower.
English: {0} has become ill. They will deteriorate if not allowed rest.
Japanese: {0} が病気になった。休ませなければ病状は悪化するだろう。
Russian: {0} заболевает и нуждается в лечении, чтобы не заболеть сильнее
French: {0} est malade et a besoin de repos.
German: {0} ist erkrankt. Ohne Bettruhe wird sich der Zustand verschlimmern.
Spanish: {0} ha enfermado. Empeorará si no descansa.
Portuguese (Brazil): {0} ficou doente, e ficará pior se não puder descansar.
Chinese (Simplified): {0}生病了，不获准休养的话几天之内将恶化。
Chinese (Traditional): {0}生病了，不獲准休養的話幾天之內將惡化。
Korean: {0} 추종자가 병에 걸렸습니다. 휴식하지 않으면 악화될 것입니다.
PolskI: {0} zachorował. Będzie się pogarszał, jeśli nie odpocznie.

description: Usage will be "Follower Name" has died. Where {0} is the name of the follower.
Japanese: {0} が死んだ。

description: A follower has become more devout <- meaning they are more invested & loyal in the Cult now. Where {0} is the name of the follower.
Japanese: {0} が病気で死んだ。

description: When your Follower dies of old age. Where {0} is the name of the follower.
Japanese: {0} が寿命で死んだ。

description: A follower has starved to death. Where {0} is the name of the follower.
Japanese: {0} が餓死した。

description: A Follower was killed during a fight pit ritual. Usage will be "Follower Name" was killed in a fight pit. Where {0} is the name of the follower.
English: {0} was killed during a Fight Pit Ritual.
Japanese: {0} が死闘の儀式で殺された。
Spanish: {0} ha muerto en un ritual de foso de pelea.
Portuguese (Brazil): {0} morreu durante um Ritual de Luta.
PolskI: {0} zginął podczas rytuału Walki na Arenie.

description: When a follower is no longer ill. Where {0} is the name of the follower.
Japanese: {0} の病気が治った。

description: When a follower is no longer starving. Where {0} is the name of the follower.
Japanese: {0} は腹を満たした。
Spanish: {0} ya no se muere de hambre.
Portuguese (Brazil): {0} não está mais morrendo de fome.

description: A follower is starving. Where {0} is the name of the follower.
Japanese: {0} は腹を空かせている。
French: {0} est en train de mourir de faim.

description: Displayed when a Follower is converted to a demon. Where {0} is the follower name.
English: {0} has been converted to a demon.
Japanese: {0} が悪魔に変身した。
French: {0} a subi une transformation en démon.
Spanish: {0} se ha convertido en un demonio.

description: Displayed when a Follower is preserved from a demon. Where {0} is the name of the follower.
Japanese: {0} が悪魔から元に戻った。
Spanish: {0} ha dejado de ser un demonio.

description: Displayed when player has assigned faith enforcer through ritual. Where {0} is the name of the follower.
English: {0} has been assigned as Loyalty Enforcer.
Japanese: {0} が信仰監視係に任命された。
French: {0} a reçu le rôle de Garde de la foi.
Spanish: {0} ostenta el cargo de custodio de la fe.

description: Displayed when player has assigned tax enforcer through ritual. Where {0} is the name of the follower.
English: {0} has been assigned as Tax Enforcer.
Japanese: {0} が寄付徴収係に任命された。
French: {0} a reçu le rôle de Garde des dons.
Spanish: {0} ostenta el cargo de recaudador de impuestos.

description:
Displayed when a Follower has been 
  sacrificed outside of the Cult 
  (for example in key room in dungeon
  with Ratoo). Where {0} is the name of the follower.
Japanese: {0} が生贄に捧げられた。
Spanish: {0} ha sido víctima de un sacrificio.

description: Displayed when Glory Through Toil begins
English: <color=#FFD201>Glory Through Toil</color> has begun. Followers will not stop working for 2 days.
Japanese: <color=#FFD201>労役による栄光</color>の効果が開始した。2日間、信者が疲れることなく作業し続ける。
Russian: Началось действие ритуала <color=#FFD201>«Радость служения»</color>, побуждающего последователей работать 2 суток
French: Le <color=#FFD201>Rituel de l'effort</color> a pris effet. Les adeptes travailleront d'arrache-pied pendant 2 jours.
German: <color=#FFD201>Die Herrlichkeit der Mühsal</color> hat begonnen. Deine Anhänger werden 2 Tage lang ununterbrochen arbeiten.
Spanish: <color=#FFD201>Gloria mediante el trabajo</color> ha comenzado. Tus adeptos no pararán de trabajar en 2 días.
Portuguese (Brazil): A <color=#FFD201>Glória Através do Serviço</color> começou. Seguidores trabalharão sem parar durante 2 dias.
Chinese (Simplified): <color=#FFD201>劳累中求荣耀</color>已经开始。教徒将不停工作 2 天。
Chinese (Traditional): <color=#FFD201>勞累中求榮耀</color>已經開始。教徒將不停工作 2 天。
Korean: <color=#FFD201>노역을 통한 영광</color> 의식이 시작되었습니다. 추종자들이 이틀 동안 일을 멈추지 않습니다.
PolskI: <color=#FFD201>Chwała przez trud</color> się rozpoczęła. Wyznawcy nie przestaną pracować przez 2 dni.

description: Displayed when Glory Through Toil ends
English: <color=#FFD201>Glory Through Toil</color> has come to an end.
Japanese: <color=#FFD201>労役による栄光</color>の効果が終了した。
French: Le <color=#FFD201>Rituel de l'effort</color> a pris fin.
German: <color=#FFD201>Die Herrlichkeit der Mühsal</color> ist zu Ende.

description: A follower has been 'consumed' in a ritual. {0} is the follower's name.
Japanese: {0} が捕食された。

description: A follower has 'ascended' in a ritual. {0} is the follower's name.
Japanese: {0} が昇天した。
French: {0} a atteint l'ascension de son âme.

description: Displayed when Ritual of Enlightenment begins
Japanese: <color=#FFD201>啓示の儀式</color>の効果が開始した。
French: Le <color=#FFD201>Rituel de l'éveil</color> a pris effet.
Spanish: El <color=#FFD201>ritual de la Iluminación</color> ha comenzado.

description: Displayed when Ritual of Enlightenment ends
English: <color=#FFD201>Ritual of Enlightenment</color> has come to an end.
Japanese: <color=#FFD201>啓示の儀式</color>の効果が終了した。
French: Le <color=#FFD201>Rituel de l'éveil</color> a pris fin.
German: Das <color=#FFD201>Ritual der Erleuchtung</color> ist zu Ende.
Spanish: El <color=#FFD201>ritual de la Iluminación </color> ha terminado.

description: Displayed when you perform the enrichment ritual
Japanese: <color=#FFD201>巨富</color>の儀式を行った。
French: Vous avez accompli le <color=#FFD201>Rituel de l'avarice</color>.
German: Du hast das Ritual der <color=#FFD201>Bereicherung</color> durchgeführt.

description: Displayed when the fishing ritual begins
Japanese: <color=#FFD201>海の恵み</color>の効果が開始した。
French: Le <color=#FFD201>Rituel de l'océan</color> a pris effet.

description: Displayed when the fishing ritual ends
English: <color=#FFD201>Ocean's Bounty</color> has come to an end.
Japanese: <color=#FFD201>海の恵み</color>の効果が終了した。
French: Le <color=#FFD201>Rituel de l'océan</color> a pris fin.

description: Displayed when you perform the harvest ritual
Japanese: <color=#FFD201>収穫</color>の儀式を行った。
French: Vous avez accompli le <color=#FFD201>Rituel de la récolte</color>.
German: Du hast das Ritual der <color=#FFD201>Ernte</color> durchgeführt.

description: Displayed when you appointment of the faith enforcer
Japanese: <color=#FFD201>信仰監視係</color>が任命された。
French: Un nouveau <color=#FFD201>Garde de la foi</color> a été nommé.

description: Displayed when you appointment of the tax collector
Japanese: <color=#FFD201>寄付徴収係</color>が任命された。
French: Un nouveau <color=#FFD201>Garde des dons</color> a été nommé.

description: This displays after you have beaten a boss and enemies in the area become stronger
Japanese: {0} に出現する敵が強化された
French: Les ennemis de la zone {0} sont désormais plus féroces.
German: Die Gegner in {0} sind stärker geworden.
Spanish: Los enemigos de {0} se han vuelto más fuertes.
Portuguese (Brazil): Os inimigos em {0} ficaram mais fortes.

description: Displays a notification to the user stating a sermon is ready.
English: The Flock is ready for another Sermon.
Japanese: 信者たちが今日の説教を待っている。
French: Vos adeptes sont prêts à entendre un nouveau sermon.
German: Die Herde ist bereit für eine weitere Predigt.
Spanish: El rebaño está listo para otro sermón.
Portuguese (Brazil): O Rebanho está pronto para outro Sermão.
Chinese (Simplified): 教众已准备好聆听下一场布道。

description:
Quest Item
  When down to zero followers, get a follower or game over!
English: Recruit a Follower, or death will be permanent and the game will end.
Japanese: 永遠なる死、すなわちゲームオーバーを防ぐため、信者を集める
Russian: Найти последователя, чтобы избежать смерти и окончания игры
French: Recrutez un adepte ou vous périrez et le jeu prendra fin
German: Rekrutiere einen Anhänger, oder der Tod wird dauerhaft sein und das Spiel geht zu Ende.
Spanish: Recluta a un adepto o la muerte será permanente y el juego terminará.
Portuguese (Brazil): Recrute um Seguidor, ou sua morte será permanente e o jogo chegará ao fim.
Chinese (Simplified): 请招募一位教徒，不然死亡后将无法复生，游戏将结束。
Chinese (Traditional): 請招募一位教徒，不然死亡後將無法復生，遊戲將結束。
Korean: 추종자를 고용하지 않으면, 죽을 시 게임이 영구적으로 종료된다.
PolskI: Zrekrutuj wyznawcę, inaczej śmierć będzie trwała i gra się skończy.

description:
Title of Objective
  When faith gets down to zero you need to fix it or followers will leave

Japanese: 信者たちが立ち去らないよう、教団の信仰レベルを50%以上まで戻す
Russian: Восстановить уровень веры в поселении не менее чем на 50%, чтобы избежать ухода последователей
French: Augmentez la foi du culte à 50 % ou vos adeptes vous quitteront
German: Bringe den Glauben deines Kults wieder auf mindestens 50 % oder du verlierst Anhänger.
Spanish: Restaura la fe de tu secta al 50 % o más o tus adeptos empezarán a marcharse.
Portuguese (Brazil): Recupere a Fé em seu Culto para pelo menos 50% ou perderá Seguidores.
Chinese (Simplified): 让教会信仰值恢复到至少 50%，否则教徒将会离开。
Chinese (Traditional): 讓教會信仰值恢復到至少 50%，否則教徒將會離開。
Korean: 교단의 신앙을 최소 50%로 회복시키지 않으면 추종자들이 떠난다.
PolskI: Odnów wiarę swojego kultu do przynajmniej 50% albo twoi Wyznawcy odejdą.

Japanese: <color=#FFD201>カニ</color>を釣り上げて漁師に渡す

Japanese: 教会堂内の講壇で<color=#FFD201>王冠の権能</color>をアンロックする
French: Débloquez un <color=#FFD201>Pouvoir de la Couronne</color> sur l'Autel du Temple.

English: Unlock a <color=#FFD201>Fleece</color> from the Altar in your Temple.

French: Débloquez une <color=#FFD201>pelisse</color> sur l'Autel du Temple.
German: Schalte ein <color=#FFD201>Vlies</color> am Altar deines Tempels frei.
Spanish: Desbloquea un nuevo <color=#FFD201>vellocino</color> en el altar de tu templo.
Portuguese (Brazil): Debloqueie uma <color=#FFD201>Lã</color> no Altar do seu Templo.

description: description of the objective to declare a new doctrine at the temple

Japanese: 教会堂内の講壇で新しい<color=#FFD201>教条</color>を宣言する
French: Adoptez la <color=#FFD201>doctrine</color> sur l'Autel du Temple.
German: Verkünde eine neue <color=#FFD201>Doktrin</color> am Altar deines Tempels.
Spanish: Declara una nueva <color=#FFD201>Doctrina</color> en el altar de tu templo.
Portuguese (Brazil): Declare uma nova <color=#FFD201>Doutrina</color> no Altar do seu Templo.
Chinese (Simplified): 使用圣殿祭坛颁布一项新<color=#FFD201>教条</color>。
Chinese (Traditional): 使用聖殿祭壇頒布一項新<color=#FFD201>教條</color>。
PolskI: Ogłoś nową <color=#FFD201>Doktrynę</color> przy Ołtarzu w twojej Świątyni.

description: Quest Item to perform a blessing on a follower
English: Interact with any Follower and perform a Blessing.
Japanese: 信者にインタラクトし、「祝福」する
French: Interagissez avec un adepte et accomplissez un rituel
German: Interagiere mit einem beliebigen Anhänger und gewähre einen Segen.
Spanish: Interactúa con un adepto y bendícelo.
Portuguese (Brazil): Interaja com qualquer Seguidor e realize uma Benção
Chinese (Simplified): 与一名教徒互动并给予祝福
Chinese (Traditional): 與一名教徒互動並給予祝福
PolskI: Wejdź w interakcję z dowolnym Wyznawcą i wykonaj Błogosławieństwo.

description: Collect reward from levelled up follower
English: Collect reward from levelled up Follower.
Japanese: レベルアップした信者から報酬を受け取る
Russian: Получить награду от последователя, получившего новый уровень
French: Acceptez le cadeau de l'adepte qui a gagné un niveau
German: Sammle die Belohnung von einem Anhänger mit erhöhter Stufe ein.
Spanish: Recibe una recompensa del adepto que ha subido de nivel.
Portuguese (Brazil): Colete recompensa de um Seguidor que subiu de nível
Chinese (Simplified): 向已升级的教徒领取奖励
Chinese (Traditional): 向已升級的教徒拿取獎勵

description: Quest Item to perform any ritual
English: Perform any Ritual in your Temple.
Japanese: 教会堂でなんらかの儀式を行う
French: Accomplissez un rituel dans votre Temple
German: Führe ein beliebiges Ritual in deinem Tempel durch.
Spanish: Celebra un ritual en tu templo.
Portuguese (Brazil): Realize qualquer Ritual no seu Templo
Chinese (Simplified): 在圣殿内举行任一仪式
Chinese (Traditional): 在聖殿內舉行任一儀式
PolskI: Wykonaj dowolny Rytuał w twojej Świątyni.

description: Collect reward from levelled up follower
Japanese: <color=#FFD201>戒律石のかけら</color>を見つける
French: Trouvez des <color=#FFD201>fragments de pierre de commandement.</color>
Spanish: Busca <color=#FFD201>fragmentos de piedra de los mandamientos</color>.
Portuguese (Brazil): Encontre os <color=#FFD201>fragmentos da Pedra da Lei</color>.

description: Perform the feast in the temple. Feast rituals give faith plus make everyone full of hunger
Japanese: <color=#FFD201>祝宴</color>の儀式を行う

description:
Title of Objective
  unlock mine station
English: Unlock the <color=#FFD201>Stone Mine</color> using divine inspiration.
Japanese: 神聖なる啓示を使って<color=#FFD201>石材坑道</color>をアンロックする
French: Débloquez la <color=#FFD201>mine</color> grâce à l'inspiration divine.

Spanish: Desbloquea la <color=#FFD201>mina de piedra</color> usando inspiración divina.
Portuguese (Brazil): Debloqueie a <color=#FFD201>Mina de Pedras</color> com inspiração divina
Chinese (Simplified): 使用圣冠灵感解锁<color=#FFD201>采石场</color>
Chinese (Traditional): 使用聖冠靈感解鎖<color=#FFD201>採石場</color>

description: Quest Item: An objective to beat a character a knucklebones. The character's name will appear in {0}
Japanese: Knucklebonesで {0} を倒す
French: Gagnez une partie contre {0} aux Osselets

description:
Custom Objective
 Read a follower's mind
English: Interact with any Follower and read their mind.
Japanese: いずれかの信者にインタラクトし思考を読む
French: Interagissez avec un adepte et lisez dans ses pensées
German: Interagiere mit Anhängern und lies ihre Gedanken.
Spanish: Interactúa con un adepto y lee su mente.
Portuguese (Brazil): Interaja com qualquer Seguidor e leia sua mente.
Chinese (Simplified): 与任意教徒互动并读取他们的想法。
Chinese (Traditional): 與任何一名教徒互動並讀取對方的想法。
PolskI: Wejdź w interakcję z dowolnym Wyznawcą i przeczytaj jego myśli.

description:
Conversation
  If you try to bribe a Follower but you have already done it for the day this text will show
English: You have already been most generous. I couldn't accept another bribe today.
Japanese: あなたの寛大さは十分に理解しています。今日はもうこれ以上、賄賂を受け取ることはできません。
Russian: Я понимаю, что вам хочется проявить щедрость, но второй раз за день меня не подкупишь.
French: Vous avez déjà fait preuve de beaucoup de générosité aujourd'hui, je ne peux pas accepter !
German: Du warst bereits sehr großzügig. Ich kann heute unmöglich noch ein Bestechungsgeschenk annehmen.
Spanish: Ya me has demostrado tu gran generosidad. Hoy no puedo aceptar más sobornos.
Portuguese (Brazil): Sua generosidade comigo já foi enorme. Não poderia aceitar outro suborno hoje.
Chinese (Simplified): 您已经非常大方了。我今天不能再收贿了。
Chinese (Traditional): 您已經非常大方了。我今天不能再收賄了。
Korean: 이미 충분히 관대함을 보여주셨어요. 오늘 더이상의 뇌물을 받을 수는 없어요.
PolskI: Już dziś byłeś bardzo hojny. Nie mogę przyjąć kolejnej łapówki.

description:
Conversation
  If you try do the Extort Tithes command on a Follower but you have already done it for the day this text will show
English: I have already paid my tithes to you today.
Japanese: 今日の分のお金はすでに渡したはずですよ。
French: J'ai déjà payé ma contribution aujourd'hui.
German: Ich habe dir meinen Zehnten heute bereits gezahlt.
Spanish: Hoy ya te he pagado el diezmo.
Portuguese (Brazil): Já paguei o meu dízimo para você hoje.
Chinese (Simplified): 我今天已经向您缴过什一税了。
Chinese (Traditional): 我今天已經向您繳過什一稅了。

description:
Conversation
  If you try do the give a blessing on a Follower but you have already done it for the day this text will show
English: I have already received a blessing from you today.
Japanese: 今日はすでに祝福を受けています。
French: J'ai déjà reçu une bénédiction aujourd'hui.
German: Ich habe heute bereits einen Segen von dir erhalten.
Spanish: Hoy ya he recibido tu bendición.
Portuguese (Brazil): Já recebi uma benção sua hoje.
Chinese (Simplified): 我今天接受过您的祝福了。
Chinese (Traditional): 我今天接受過您的祝福了。
PolskI: Już dziś otrzymałem błogosławieństwo od ciebie.

description:
Conversation
  If you try do the inspire a follower, but you have already done it that day, this will show.
English: You have already inspired me today. Thank you for your guidance.
Japanese: 今日はすでに激励してくださったではないですか。あなたのお導きに感謝いたします。
Russian: Вы сегодня уже меня воодушевили. Спасибо.
French: Vous avez déjà été une grande source d'inspiration pour moi aujourd'hui. Merci, Guide.
German: Du hast mich heute bereits inspiriert. Danke, dass du mir den Weg weist.
Spanish: Hoy ya me has inspirado mucho. Gracias por tu consejo.
Portuguese (Brazil): Você já me inspirou hoje. Agradeço por sua orientação.
Chinese (Simplified): 您今天已经鼓舞过我了。谢谢您的引导。
Chinese (Traditional): 您今天已經鼓舞過我了。謝謝您的引導。
Korean: 이미 오늘 격려를 해주셨어요. 인도해주셔서 감사합니다.
PolskI: Już mnie dzisiaj zainspirowałeś. Dziękuję za przewodnictwo.

description:
Conversation
  If you try to intimidate a follower, but you have already done it that day, this will show.
English: There is no need to do that again today - I am already terrified!
Japanese: 今日はもう勘弁してください…すでに十分恐怖心を抱いていますので！
Russian: Сегодня нет необходимости это повторять. Я и так дрожу от одного вашего вида.
French: Nul besoin de refaire ça aujourd'hui, je ferai tout ce que vous voudrez !
German: Es gibt keinen Grund, das heute noch einmal zu tun – ich zittere bereits vor Angst!
Spanish: Ya tengo mucho miedo, ¡no hace falta que sigas!
Portuguese (Brazil): Não precisa fazer isso de novo hoje. Já estou com muito medo!
Chinese (Simplified): 今天不必再那样做了——我已经很怕了！
Chinese (Traditional): 今天不必再那樣做了——我已經很怕了！
Korean: 오늘 또 그렇게 하실 필요는 없어요. 이미 무서워요!
PolskI: Nie ma potrzeby robić tego ponownie dziś – już się boję!

description:
Interaction Wheel
  This prompt will show if you are doing a decision that could have quite a bit of impact, for example murdering a Follower
Japanese: 本当にいいですか？

Interaction Wheel

description: Interaction Wheel

description:
Interaction Wheel
  No response to AreYouSure

description: Interaction Wheel

description:
Interaction Wheel
  As above, they will keep resting until not sick
Japanese: 病気が治るまで休ませる
German: Der Anhänger ruht sich aus, bis er genesen ist.
Spanish: El adepto descansará hasta que se recupere.

description:
Interaction Wheel
  This will give Followers gold in return for increased faith
Japanese: 買収

description: Interaction Wheel
English: Bribe a Follower with 3 <sprite name="icon_blackgold"> to increase their <color=#FFD201>Loyalty.</color>
Japanese: <sprite name="icon_blackgold"> 3つで信者を買収し、<color=#FFD201>忠誠心</color>を高める
Russian: Потратить 3 <sprite name="icon_blackgold"> на подкуп, чтобы повысить <color=#FFD201>доверие</color>.
French: Graisser la patte d'un adepte en lui donnant 3 <sprite name="icon_blackgold"> pour augmenter sa <color=#FFD201>fidélité</color>.
German: Bestich einen Anhänger mit 3 <sprite name="icon_blackgold">, um seine <color=#FFD201>Loyalität</color> zu erhöhen.
Spanish: Soborna a un adepto con 3 <sprite name="icon_blackgold"> para aumentar su <color=#FFD201>lealtad</color>.
Portuguese (Brazil): Suborne um Seguidor com 3 <sprite name="icon_blackgold"> para aumentar sua <color=#FFD201>Lealdade.</color>
Chinese (Simplified): 用 3 <sprite name="icon_blackgold">贿赂教徒，增加对方的<color=#FFD201>忠诚度。</color>
Chinese (Traditional): 用 3 <sprite name="icon_blackgold"> 賄賂教徒，增加對方的<color=#FFD201>忠誠度。</color>
PolskI: Przekup Wyznawcę za 3 <sprite name="icon_blackgold">, aby zwiększyć jego <color=#FFD201>lojalność.</color>

description:
Interaction Wheel
  This will send a Follower to go build a structure for you if there is building sites available
Japanese: 建築

description:
Interaction Wheel
  As above
Japanese: 建築物の作業を手伝わせる
French: Participer aux travaux de construction en cours.
German: Der Anhänger hilft bei einer im Bau befindlichen Konstruktion.
Spanish: Ayuda con las construcciones que haya en marcha.
Portuguese (Brazil): Ajuda com qualquer construção em andamento.
Chinese (Simplified): 帮忙任何兴建中的建筑物。
Chinese (Traditional): 幫忙任何興建中的建築物。

description:
Conversation
  If you tell a Follower to eat but you have initiated a fasting rtiual this willk be there response
English: I can't eat, I am fasting.
Japanese: 断食中なので食べることはできません。
Russian: Мне нельзя есть, я соблюдаю строгий пост.
French: Je ne peux pas manger, je jeûne !
German: Ich kann nicht essen, ich faste.
Spanish: No puedo comer, estoy de ayuno.
PolskI: Nie mogę jeść, jestem na poście.

description:

  Telling a Follower to go mine a stone in base with a pickaxe
Japanese: 石の採掘

  As above
Japanese: 瓦礫を片付けて石を集めさせる
Russian: Отправить убирать развалины и добывать камень.
French: Miner pour récupérer de la pierre.
German: Der Anhänger räumt Schutt weg, um Stein einzusammeln.
Spanish: Retira los escombros para recolectar piedra.
Chinese (Simplified): 清理石块以便收集石材。
Chinese (Traditional): 清除石塊以便收集石材。

description:

Interaction Wheel

German: Der Anhänger bereitet in der Küche Mahlzeiten zu.

description:

description:
Interaction Wheel
  As above
Japanese: 木を切り倒し木材を集めさせる
Russian: Отправить рубить деревья и собирать брёвна.
French: Abattre les arbres et couper du bois.
German: Der Anhänger fällt Bäume und sammelt Holz ein.
Spanish: Retira los árboles y recolecta madera.

description:
Interaction Wheel
  Followers will farm when you gives this command
Japanese: 農業

Interaction Wheel

description:

Japanese: 激励

description:
Interaction Wheel
  As above
English: Inspire a Follower with dance to increase their <color=#FFD201>Loyalty.</color>
Japanese: 信者と一緒に踊ることで激励し、<color=#FFD201>忠誠心</color>を高める
French: Inspirer un adepte grâce à la danse pour augmenter sa <color=#FFD201>fidélité</color>.
German: Inspiriere einen Anhänger mit Tanz, um seine <color=#FFD201>Loyalität</color> zu erhöhen.
Spanish: Baila para inspirar a un adepto y aumentar su <color=#FFD201>lealtad</color>.
Portuguese (Brazil): Inspira um Seguidor com dança para aumentar sua <color=#FFD201>Lealdade.</color>
Chinese (Simplified): 用舞蹈鼓舞一位教徒，增加对方的<color=#FFD201>忠诚度。</color>
Chinese (Traditional): 用舞蹈鼓舞一位教徒，增加對方的<color=#FFD201>忠誠度。</color>
PolskI: Zainspiruj Wyznawcę tańcem, aby zwiększyć jego <color=#FFD201>lojalność.</color>

description:
Interaction Wheel
  Tells a Follower to go eat a meal
Japanese: を食べる
